column2: BiomeDef.description=A dry region, but not dry enough to become a true desert. Open plains with grasses and bushes give way to scattered groves of trees. Plants are hardy and there is a moderate density of animals.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=干旱的地区，但还未干旱成沙漠的地步。开阔的平原，以草地和灌木为主，树木稀少。植物的适应能力很强，动物数量中等。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=一個乾旱的地區，但沒有乾旱到成為沙漠的地步。這裡有廣闊的平原，稀少的樹叢以及中等密度的動物。只有比較堅強的植物才會生長在這裡，

BiomeDef.description=Forests of coniferous trees. Despite the harsh winters, boreal forests sustain a diverse population of small and large animals, and have warm summers. Snow makes it extremely slow to travel in winter.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=针叶林。尽管寒冬严酷，仍然有多种大型和小型动物的群落繁衍着，也有温暖的夏天。冬季的积雪使得出行变得极为缓慢。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=充滿松樹的北方森林。各類大小型動物克服著寒冷的殘酷環境在這裡生存。冬季的降雪導致在此地的行動非常緩慢。
BiomeDef.description=A very dry area which supports little life. Deserts can be hot, or quite cold.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=非常干旱的地区，动植物数量稀少。沙漠要么很热要么很冷。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=一個非常乾旱，非常炎熱的地區。這裡的生命非常稀少。
BiomeDef.description=An extremely hot, dry area, devoid of almost all living creatures. Immense heat and limited vegetation make it very difficult to survive here, even for well-adapted animals.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=极端炎热干旱的地区，几乎没有生物的痕迹。极高的温度和有限的植物使此处非常难以生存，即使是适应力很强的动物也是如此。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=一個極度炎熱、極度乾旱的地區，只有極少量生物。極端的高溫及稀疏的植被使生存顯得非常困難，即使對原生動物也是如此。

BiomeDef.description=The surface is covered with sheets of ice which can be kilometers thick. No soil, no plants. The only animals here are migrating to somewhere else - or badly lost. Snow slows down travel, but there are ice sheets that provide smooth walking.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=这个地区的地表被几千米厚的冰层覆盖着，这里没有土地，没有植物。这里的动物不是迁移到别的地方了就是在恶劣环境下灭绝了。积雪使得出行变得缓慢，但有冰盖可以提供平坦的路面。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=這個地區的地表被幾千公尺厚的冰層覆蓋著，這裡沒有土地或者岩石，當然也沒有植物。這裡的動物不是遷徙到别的地方了就是在惡劣環境下滅絕了。積雪會減緩行動，但冰蓋提供了平穩的通路。
BiomeDef.description=A large lake. Beautiful to live next to. Not so beautiful to live in.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=一个巨大的湖泊。临泽而居，不亦美乎——但住到水里去就不合适了。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=A large lake. Beautiful to live next to. Not so beautiful to live in.
BiomeDef.description=Open ocean. Great for fish. Not so great for you.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=这里是一片汪洋，鱼儿会很喜欢这里的，你可就不一定了。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=廣闊的的大海，對於魚來說是相當理想的地方，對於您來說就不是了。
BiomeDef.description=Permanent ice sheets floating on water. There is no soil, no plants, no minerals to mine, and very few animals. Travel is very slow due to the deep snow and crevasses.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=洋面上的永久性冰盖。没有土地，没有植物，没有可开采的矿物，以及极少数的动物。由于厚厚的积雪和冰隙，使得出行变得极为缓慢。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=漂浮在海面上的古老冰原，這裡沒有泥土、沒有植物、沒有礦物，只有數量稀少的動物。因為厚雪和冰塹，在冰海上行動非常緩慢。

BiomeDef.description=Forests of deciduous trees interspersed with fertile clearings. Many species of animals move around in the trees and on the plains. Because of snow, it is slow to travel in winter.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=散布着肥沃的土壤落叶乔木林。丛林里和平原上游荡着多种多样的动物群落。冬季的积雪会导致出行变得缓慢。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=一個由森林和肥沃土地統領的地區。在這裡的樹叢和平原中生活著各種奇特的動物。冬季的降雪會減緩通行此地的速度。

BiomeDef.description=A thick, moist jungle. Despite its visual beauty, this is a very dangerous biome. Choking overgrowth, aggressive animals, and constant disease are why some explorers call this the ""green hell"".
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=茂密潮湿的丛林。尽管如此美丽多姿，却实际上是个非常危险的生态区。繁茂到闭塞的植被，富有攻击性的动物，以及阴魂不散的疾病，这就是为什么有些探险者将之称为「绿色地狱」。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=一個樹木茂密又潮濕的地區，雖然視覺上非常美麗，但這裡是非常危險的生態系。極度茂密生長的植物、侵略性的生物和不斷侵襲的疾病是熱帶雨林被探險家們稱為「綠色地獄」的原因。

BiomeDef.description=These mostly-frozen plains bear almost no trees and little vegetation. There are a few small animals interspersed with large herds of migratory grazers and their predators. Snow makes it extremely slow to travel in winter.
BiomeDef.description.zh-cn=被完全冻结的平原上几乎看不到树木和植被。生活着少量小型动物，散布着大群的迁徙性食草动物和它们的捕食者。冬季的积雪使得出行变得极为缓慢。
BiomeDef.description.zh-tw=這個完全被凍結的平原中幾乎找不到任何樹木，連植物都很少見。這裡有一些小型動物和少量的草食性遷徙動物，偶爾也會有一些肉食動物出現。冬季的降雪導致在此地的行動非常緩慢。
BodyDef.label.zh-tw=有爪與尾與臉頰四足動物

ConceptDef.helpText=The alerts at the right edge of the screen tell you about issue that need your attention.

Keep an eye on the alerts.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=屏幕右侧边缘的警报按钮会告诉你需要注意的事情。

记得要留神。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=畫面右側的警報會通知你需要注意的事情。

多加留意！

ConceptDef.helpText=Colonists and colony animals can be assigned to ALLOWED AREAS. This forbids them from taking destinations outside their allowed area.

This can be used to, for example, forbid colonists from going outside.

You can create multiple allowed areas and assign them to different colonists and animals.

Create, delete, and assign allowed areas in the RESTRICT tab.

Paint allowed areas onto the map using the EXPAND ALLOWED AREA and CLEAR ALLOWED AREA designators in the Architect tab.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=殖民者和动物可以通过在「管制」标签页中设置「允许活动区域」来限定活动范围。他们不会在活动区外的地区从事任何活动和工作。

你可以设置多个区域然后给不同的殖民者/动物设置不同的限制方案。

「添加允许活动区」或「移除允许活动区」需要在「建筑规划」菜单中的「区域」菜单栏进行。分配区域需要在「管制」面板中进行。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=活動區規範了居民和寵物的活動範圍，他們不會在活動區以外進行工作。

你可以在選單的「區域」中新增、刪除及規劃活動區。

在「管制」與「動物」中可以自訂各居民及動物的活動區。

ConceptDef.helpText=Manhunting animals generally won't attack doors or inactive turrets.

You can escape them by getting inside or behind a wall. But they'll wait for you.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=猎杀人类的动物通常不会攻击门或者未启用的炮塔，你可以通过躲进屋内来躲避它们。但是它们会等你出来。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=獵殺人類的動物通常不會攻擊門或未啟用的機槍塔。

你可以進到室內躲避獸群攻擊，但牠們會在門外等著你踏出門的那一刻。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can assign colonists to tame a wild animal with the TAME designator.

Colonists will offer the animal food and attempt to tame it.

Beware: some animals can respond violently to failed taming attempts.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过「驯服」命令指派殖民者驯服野生动物。

殖民者会为动物提供食物，然后尝试驯服它们。

当心：有些动物在被驯服时会变得暴躁，攻击你的殖民者。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以派遣居民前去馴養野生動物。

馴養員會提供食物給動物，藉此馴服他們。

注意：有些動物在馴服失敗時會轉為凶暴，反咬居民一口。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can assign a tame animal to be trained in specific skills on its TRAINING tab.

Animals can't be trained continuously; they need time between training sessions.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=在已驯服的动物的「训练」标签中，你可以指派动物进一步接受特定技能的训练。

动物无法连续受训，训练阶段之间需要间隔一段时间。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以在以馴養動物的「訓練」視窗中指定訓練特定技能。

動物不能不間斷地訓練，在兩次訓練之間必須間隔一段時間。
ConceptDef.label.zh-cn=逮捕导致派系关系恶化

ConceptDef.helpText=Warning: The person you are trying to arrest may not go quietly.

If you arrest a non-colonist, their entire faction will become your enemy.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=警告：你所试图逮捕的人可能导致其派系与你敌对！

如果你想和一个派系保持友好，不要逮捕对方派系的人！

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=警告：若你拘捕了某人，他們整個勢力都將成為你的敵人。

若你想要和一個勢力保持友好關係，千萬別拘捕任何一位屬於該勢力的人！
ConceptDef.helpText=To make colonists work at a table, select the table and open the Bills tab. Here, you can say what meals to cook, what things to craft, what creatures to butcher.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=要使得殖民者在工作台前工作，请选择工作台并打开「清单」标签页。在这里，你可以指定要烹饪什么食品，要制作什么物品，要屠宰什么尸体等。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=要讓居民執行工作台的工作，選擇一張工作台後點擊「選單」開啟工作面板。在這裡你可以指定要烹煮何種料理、要打造什麼裝備、要屠宰哪些生物。
ConceptDef.helpText=To send items or silver to orbital traders, you must build an ORBITAL TRADE BEACON and place a stockpile of items near it.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=若想发送物品或白银给轨道贸易商，你必须建立一个「轨道交易信标」然后其旁边设立一个储存区。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=要發送商品或貨幣至宇宙商船處，你需要建造一個軌道信標，並在信標範圍內劃設一片物品儲存區。
ConceptDef.helpText=Move the camera by clicking and dragging the MOUSE BUTTON 3 (middle button) or with the {Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight} keys.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=按住「鼠标中键或右键」并拖拽或者使用{Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight}按键来移动镜头。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=按住滑鼠中鍵並拖曳或使用WASD鍵來移動畫面。
ConceptDef.helpText=Zoom in and out with the MOUSEWHEEL or the {Key:MapZoomIn} and {Key:MapZoomOut} keys.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=通过「鼠标滚轮」或者{Key:MapZoomIn}和{Key:MapZoomOut}来缩放镜头。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=滾動滑鼠滾輪或按T鍵和G鍵以放大/縮小遊戲畫面。

ConceptDef.helpText=When an enemy is downed on the ground but not dead, you can CAPTURE them.

To capture, select a colonist, right-click on the incapacitated enemy, and select Capture.

You'll need an extra bed marked for prisoner use.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=一名敌人无法行动了，你可以「俘虏」他们！
若想俘虏敌人，先选择一名殖民者，然后对不能行动的敌人点击鼠标右键，并选择「俘虏」。

你需要有额外专门设立给囚犯的床位。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=如果有敵人倒在地上而未死亡，你可以俘虜他們。

選擇一名居民，右鍵點擊欲俘虜的對象，再選擇「俘虜」。

你需要一張指定為俘虜專用的空床才可進行俘虜。
ConceptDef.helpText=You can click on the notifications in the top-left of the screen to instantly center the camera on their subject.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过点击出现在屏幕左上方的通知信息来快速切换到目标区域查看详情。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以點擊出現在畫面左上方的通知訊息來快速移動畫面至事件發生地。

ConceptDef.helpText=The most important thing to do in ranged combat is to use cover.

Cover only works if your colonist is touching it, and it is between your colonist and the enemy.

You can also place colonists behind wall corners. They will lean out to shoot.

Most things can be used as cover, but some things are better than others. Hiding behind a tree is better than nothing, but hiding behind sandbags is better than using a tree.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=远程作战第一课：先给自己找掩体。

掩体只有在处于交火路径当中且你的殖民者紧贴着掩体时才生效。

你也可以把殖民者放在墙角后来射击。他们会侧身射击。

大部分物体都可以作为掩体，但是它们的效果并不尽相同，一棵树比没有掩体要强，但是远不如沙袋好使。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=遠距離交火中，掩體是生死關鍵。

掩體必須位在火網之中且緊鄰居民時才有效。

牆角也能作為掩體。

大多物物體都能當作掩體，但效果不一，有棵樹總比什麼都沒有好，但效果遠不及沙包。

ConceptDef.helpText=Items left outdoors will slowly deteriorate.

If you want to store items long-term, keep them under a roof.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=放置在室外的物品会因为淋雨而缓慢损坏。

如果你想长期保留该物品，就把它们挪到屋顶之下。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=某些放在露天之下的物品會持續扣減耐久值。

若你想長期保存這些物件，請記得擺在屋頂之下。

ConceptDef.helpText=Doors open at different speeds depending on what they're made of.

Warning: Stone doors open very slowly. Anyone passing through will be significantly slowed down.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=开门速度的不同取决于用什么材料建造。

警告：石门开启速度非常慢。任何人通过时都会被大幅度地减速。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=門開啟的速度根據門的材質有所不同。

警告：石製門開啟相當緩慢，任何通過門的人都會明顯減慢速度。

ConceptDef.helpText=To control colonists directly for combat, Draft them by selecting them and hitting the DRAFT button.

A drafted colonist will do only what you tell them, and can only take combat actions. Those with weapons will use them when possible.

Don't leave colonists Drafted forever - they'll starve and become unhappy.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=若想直接控制殖民者进行战斗，选择他们并按下「征召」按钮。

被征召的殖民者只会做你命令他们去做的战斗相关的指令，装备有武器的殖民者会自动使用武器。

不要一直保持征召状态，殖民者会挨饿从而变得不开心。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=要直接操控角色進行戰鬥，選擇他們後點擊「徵召」按鈕(快捷鍵R)。

\被徵召的居民只會執行你下達的命令，且只會進行戰鬥相關的工作。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can inspect your colonists' desire to take a drug in their Needs tab.

As long as their need level is at zero, their addiction changes to a ""withdrawal"" state which can have various negative side effects.

However, after long enough in withdrawal, their addiction will end and the drug need will disappear.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以在「需求」面板看到殖民者对成瘾品的渴望程度。

一旦其需求等级降到0，便会进入「戒断」状态，产生诸多负面情绪。

但只要坚持戒断足够长的时间，他们最终会不再成瘾，戒断反应也会消失。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以在角色的需求面板查看他的藥癮需求。

當藥癮需求降至0時，角色會開始出現各種戒斷症狀。

在撐過戒斷症狀發作的期間後，藥癮需求會隨之消失。

ConceptDef.helpText=Drugs can be useful, but can also lead to harmful addictions.

If you want to avoid drugs in your colony, you have the option of burning them at a campfire.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=成瘾品很有用，但也会导致成瘾。

如果你想在殖民地内完全禁用成瘾品，你可以选择在篝火处烧毁成瘾品。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=藥物可以提供正面助益，但經常伴隨著藥癮。

如果你想避免藥物出現在你的殖民地，你可以選擇在營火銷毀藥物。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can assign colonists to take specific drugs on a specific schedule. For example, you can make them take anti-malaria drugs regularly, or drink a beer a day to stay happy.

Open the ASSIGN tab and press the 'Manage drug policies' button. Create a new drug policy. Then, you can assign this policy to colonists.

Colonists can still take drugs not in their policy. You can tell them what to do, but they also follow their own desires!

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以按照规定日程给殖民者指定使用特定的药物或成瘾品。例如定期接种疟疾疫苗或是允许一天一支啤酒来保持快乐。

打开「方案管理」菜单来添加一个用药方针。

但有时你的规定并不那么有效，殖民者会被自己的欲望驱使而无视你的规则！

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以指定居民在預定的時間服用特定的藥物，例如定時服用抗瘧疾藥、一天一次小酌怡情。

開啟分配面板後點擊「管理用藥計畫」，創建新的用藥計畫，這樣就可以將用藥計畫分配給居民了。

有時居民仍然會使用計畫之外的藥物。你可以有你的一套規則，但居民們還是會跟著自己的慾望行動。

ConceptDef.helpText=Your colonists arrived with some weapons. Equip them!

Select each colonist and right-click on the weapon you want them to equip.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你的殖民者在抵达时也带来了武器，装备起来！

选择每一个殖民者并在希望装备的武器上点击右键。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你的居民來到此時是帶著一些武器的，裝備它們！

分別選擇居民並用滑鼠右鍵點擊你想讓他裝備的武器。

ConceptDef.helpText=Fires can easily burn down a colony. To defeat them, you must prepare before they happen.

These design elements can help reduce the damage from fires:

1. Instead of constructing one super-building, build separate buildings with spaces in between.

2. Use less flammable materials. Wood is cheap and fast - but very flammable.

3. Build firebreaks to stop wildfires approaching your base. A strip of concrete floor 3 or 4 cells wide will generally stop an advancing fire.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=火灾能够轻易的摧毁你的殖民地，因此安全防火非常关键，我们推荐以下方法：
1. 不要将一个建筑造的过大，相反的我们可以多造一些小的独立建筑。
2. 尽可能的选用易燃性较低的材料来修建房屋。木材便宜，但是十分易燃。
3. 通过在基地周围铺上一圈3到4格宽的地板可以很好的隔绝野火蔓延到你的基地。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=火災可以輕易的摧毀你的殖民地，未免讓這種災難成為現實，你必須對火災有所防範。

我們提拱以下幾點建議：

1. 以多個小型而獨立的建築取代單一大規模建築。

2. 選用不易燃的建材。木材建造非常快速而且便宜，但是非常易燃。

3. 建立防火帶。舉例來說，在家園及森林之間鋪設至少3格寬的水泥地面，如此就能有效隔絕野火延燒至殖民地內。

ConceptDef.helpText=Colonists will not interact with items marked FORBIDDEN.

Forbidden items have a small red X attached. Select a forbidden item and use the controls at the bottom to UNFORBID it.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=殖民者不能对被标记为「禁用」的物品进行操作。

禁用的物品上会有一个红色的小X，选择禁用物品后，在下方的控制栏内可以「解禁」物品。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=居民們不會和被標記為「已禁止」的物件互動。

選擇帶有小紅X的物件並按F或底部的按鈕以取消禁止狀態。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can FORBID doors so colonists and tame animals won't go through them.

Note that this isn't a door lock. Doors are always locked, so enemies can't pass freely. Forbidding just directs your colonists not to use the door. Colonists who are going crazy might use the door anyway.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过「禁用」门来阻止殖民者以及已驯服的动物穿过特定的门。

注意这样并不等同于给门上锁，只是禁止他们通过，而精神崩溃的殖民者仍有可能使用这扇门。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以將門設為「禁止互動」，如此你的居民及寵物便不會通過那扇門。

注意：禁止互動不等於鎖門，敵人、訪客、野生動物仍然可以通過。對你的居民來說，他們只是得到了不得通過門的命令，而這命令對於不受控制(崩潰發瘋)狀態的居民也是無效的。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can form a caravan to send groups of people traveling across the planet!

In the WORLD tab, select your home base and click the ""form caravan"" button.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以组建远行队以派遣一队人员穿过这颗行星。

在「世界」标签中，选中你的基地并点击「组建远行队」按钮。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以將一群居民組成旅隊，藉此橫跨整顆星球！

於世界面板找到你自己的據點並點擊「組織旅隊」。

ConceptDef.helpText=Friendly fire never occurs if the shooter is close to their ally.

For example, you can safely put a sword-wielding colonist directly in front of a gun-wielding one. The shooter will fire over his friend's shoulder.

This is a good way to combine ranged and melee fighters.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=如果友军距离足够近，就永远不会产生误伤。

紧挨着枪手的近战单位不会被己方的火力误伤，射击者会越过他的肩膀射击。

这是一个近战/远程单位相互配合的好方法。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=在友軍相鄰的情況下，彼此的槍火不會傷到對方。

舉例來說，你可以安排一名持劍者站在另一名持槍者之前，射手會越過同伴的肩膀開火。

這是一個遠近戰相互搭配的好方法。

ConceptDef.helpText=More trader caravans will come to visit you if you're allied with more factions.

If you have no allies, no caravans will ever visit!

You can also pay allies to send trade caravans by calling them on the comms console.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你的盟友越多，贸易商队就越多。

如果你没有盟友，就不会有任何商队前来拜访！

你还可以通过通讯台来呼叫盟友派遣商队，这样的话你需要支付一笔费用。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你的盟友越多，來訪的旅隊也會越多。

如果你沒有盟友，你的殖民地便不會有任何旅隊拜訪。

你可以透過通訊台，支付一點費用呼叫旅隊。

ConceptDef.helpText=To grow food, place GROWING ZONES using the Architect menu.

They can only be placed on fertile ground.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=要种植作物，在「建筑规划」菜单下的「区域」选项里可找到「种植区」。

种植区只能被设立在肥沃的土地上。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=想要種植作物，使用「建設」選單找到種植區。

種植區只能被劃設於肥沃的土地上。
ConceptDef.helpText=You can see a record of your colony's fortunes over time in the HISTORY tab at the bottom of the screen.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过「历史」标签页来回顾殖民地的发展过程和财产积累情况。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以在畫面底部的選項中找到「歷史」面板，這裡紀錄了從殖民地建立以來的所有事件。

ConceptDef.helpText=The HOME AREA tells your colonists which area to clean and where to extinguish fires.

Define the HOME AREA with the Zones category under the Architect menu.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=「居住区」是你的殖民者会清洁以及灭火的区域。

在「建筑规划」面板中的「区域」选项里可以设立「居住区」。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=生活區域規範了你的居民進行清潔和滅火工作的範圍。

用建設選單來劃設一片生活區。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can configure how colonists should automatically respond to threats like predatory animals.

Choose from FLEE, ATTACK, and IGNORE modes in the ASSIGN menu.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以在设置你的殖民者在面临危险时如何自动应对。

在「方案」标签中选择「逃跑」、「反击」或「无视」模式。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以自訂居民在遭遇危險(如掠食動物)時該如何反應

開啟登錄面板，在「逃跑」、「戰鬥」以及「無視」之中選擇一項。

ConceptDef.helpText=The info card shows you detailed statistics about any item, person, or construction.

Select a person or item and open their info card with the 'i' button on the inspect pane.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=任何物品、建筑和角色都可以通过信息卡来查看详细的数据。

通过点击「i」来打开信息卡进入详细信息面板。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=訊息面板顯示了所有物件、人物與建築結構的詳細資訊。

選取一個物件或人物並點選觀察面板上的「i」按鈕以確認更詳細的訊息。
ConceptDef.helpText=You can inspect the impressiveness, wealth, and beauty of individual rooms using the ROOM STATS INSPECT toggle in the bottom right.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过点选屏幕右下角的「开关房间数据显示」开关按钮来展示房间的各种详细属性，例如财富、美观、整洁和感观等等。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以開啟畫面右下方的「查看房間屬性質」以查看滑鼠游標所在的室內空間的觀感、財富和美觀度。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can talk to people with ? over their heads.

Select a colonist and right-click on the character with ? attached to his head.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以和头上有「？」的人物说话。

选择一位殖民者，然后再对头上有「？」的角色点击鼠标右键。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以與頭上帶有「？」標誌的角色交易。

選擇一名居民，然後右鍵點擊帶有？標誌的對象。

ConceptDef.helpText=One of the most important parts of RimWorld is choosing good work settings for your colonists.

Poor work settings can leave essential work unfinished for a long time while colonists waste time on unimportant tasks.

To give more control over what work colonists do, you can use the Manual Priorities mode in the WORK tab.

In this mode, each colonist has a priority number for each work type. Colonists will do priority 1 work from left to right, then priority 2 work from left to right, and so on.

Intelligent use of these setting is essential for a large, well-automated colony.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=Rimworld最核心的就是合理配置你的殖民者各项工作的设置。

在「工作」标签中开启「手动分配工作优先级」模式后，你可以为每一个人的每一项工作设置具体的优先度。

通过鼠标左右键修改优先级数字，标记1为最高优先级，4为最低，如果没有数字则表示不会从事此项工作。

殖民者总是会先进行优先度更高的工作，同样优先度等级的工作会优先处理靠左边的任务。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=設定工作優先度可說是遊玩Rimworld最關鍵的部分之一。

不良的設定可能會導致某些工作遲遲無法完成，而居民們平時總是在忙著做些無關緊要的工作，因此設定合適的工作優先度對於生產力的良好發揮有極大的助益。

勾選「自訂工作優先度」後，每項工作都會分配到一個優先度編號，1為最優先，4為最低，此外，在優先度相同的情況下，左側的工作優先度高於右側的工作。

用心設置工作優先度對於建立一座龐大的自動化基地是不可或缺的。
ConceptDef.label.zh-cn=玩家殖民地的最大数量

ConceptDef.helpText=Warning: RimWorld is designed to be played with one player colony at a time. Though it is possible to have more colonies, this will probably cause performance slowdowns and gameplay imbalances. We recommend that, at least at first, you play the game with a one colony maximum.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=警告：边缘世界被设计为一次只能玩一个殖民地。虽然可以拥有更多的殖民地，但很可能导致性能降低以及破坏游戏平衡性。我们建议你，至少在一开始的时候，只玩一个殖民地。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=警告：RimWorld在設計上是用來在同時間遊玩單一座玩家基地，雖然同時建立多座據點是可能的，但這很可能會導致遊戲運行速度變慢而且破壞平衡性，我們建議，至少在剛接觸遊戲時只玩一座基地就好。
ConceptDef.helpText=To assign a medical operation, like organ harvesting or prosthetics installation, open a colonist's HEALTH tab, then switch to the OPERATIONS sub-tab.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=要进行一次手术，例如器官摘取或者安装假肢，可以打开殖民者的「健康」标签，然后切换至「手术」子标签。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=想要指定一項醫療手術，如器官摘除或義肢安裝，請開啟居民的「健康」面板，並切換至「手術」分頁。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can designate where to mine by opening the ARCHITECT menu and selecting the ORDERS tab.

Some mineable blocks yield STEEL, GOLD, PLASTEEL, and other useful materials.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过「建筑规划」面板中「命令」选项里安排在何处开采岩石。

你可能会开采到「钢铁」、「黄金」、「玻璃钢」或者其他有用的原料。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以使用建設選單裡的「開採」命令指定要開採的地區。

開採礦物可以獲取鋼鐵、金屬、塑鋼與其他有用的材料。
ConceptDef.helpText=To communicate, select a colonist and right-click on the comms console.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=若想进行通讯，选择一名殖民者并对通讯控制台点击鼠标右键。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=要進行通訊，選擇一名居民並右鍵點擊通訊台。

ConceptDef.helpText=Colonists will automatically try to wear the newest, highest-quality apparel they can.

You don't need to manually assign each piece of apparel to colonists (though you can, if you wish).

To assign colonists restrictions on how to dress, open the ASSIGN tab, use the ""Manage outfits"" dialog box to design a new outfit, and then assign the outfit to colonists.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=殖民者总是会尝试穿更新更好的衣服。

你无需手动指派殖民者的每一项穿着设定（如果你想的话当然也是完全可以的）。

通过打开「方案」标签页就可以为你的殖民者设计/安排着装方案了，

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=居民會自動找尋品質最高、最新(耐久度)的衣服穿著

你無須自訂居民的每一項穿著設定(當然，若你想要這麼做當然也是可以的)。

欲指定居民穿著什麼服裝，點擊畫面底部的「分配」，然後點選「編輯」

ConceptDef.helpText=Hit {Key:TogglePause} to pause or unpause the game.

You can give orders while paused.

Remember this - if things get hectic, just hit {Key:TogglePause}!

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=点击{Key:TogglePause}来暂停/继续游戏。

你可以在暂停时下达指令。

当你忙得不可开交时，按{Key:TogglePause}就对了！

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=按下空白鍵可以暫停或繼續遊戲。

你可以在暫停期間規劃指令。

記住，當事情變得繁瑣如麻時，按下空白鍵就對了！

ConceptDef.helpText=Look in a prisoner's 'Prisoner' tab to set how they'll be treated.

You can set whether they'll be recruited, ignored or executed, whether they eat, and what kind of medical care they get.

Colonists with the Warden work type will interact with the prisoner.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=查看一名囚犯的「囚犯」选项卡，以决定如何对待他们。

你可以设置是否招募、忽视或处决囚犯。你可设置他们是否被送上食物以及接受何种程度医疗。

你需要指派一名殖民者为看守来照顾囚犯。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=開啟俘虜「俘虜」面板以設定這名囚犯要被如何對待。

你可以選擇對他進行招募、處決或不互動、提供他什麼食物、獲得何種程度的醫療照顧。

分派有獄卒工作的居民會依照設定執行相應的處置。
ConceptDef.helpText=After an encounter, you can easily re-form a caravan by using the RE-FORM CARAVAN command in the World view.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以在「世界」视图中通过「重组远行队」命令对相遇的远行队进行重组。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=在遭遇地圖之後，你可以使用世界畫面的重組旅隊指令輕鬆地重新組織旅隊。

ConceptDef.helpText=To rescue a wounded person, select a healthy colonist and the right-click on the wounded one.

If you rescue a non-colonist, they won't necessarily join your colony. They may simply walk away after healing. If you want to guarantee that they join, capture them and recruit them.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=要对一名殖民者实施救援，请选择一名健康的殖民者并对受伤的角色点击鼠标右键。

如果你救援了非本殖民地的外人，他在伤愈之后并不会加入你，而是会选择离开。如果你想招募他，必须先将其俘虏并囚禁。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=想要救援倒地的人員，選擇一名能夠行動的居民，再右鍵點擊救援對象。

如果你救援的不是殖民地的居民，他們不會加入你的殖民地，而是在恢復行動能力後離開。如果你希望他加入殖民地，選擇俘虜後再招募他。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can set what to plant in a growing zone. You can even grow trees!

Just select the growing zone, open the Growing tab, and click the 'plant' button.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以决定在种植区里种植的作物，还可以种树！

选择一个种植区，再点击「种植」按钮，然后选择一种植物。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以選擇要在種植區種些什麼，種樹也沒問題！

只要選擇一個或多個種植區，點選作物圖案按鈕，選擇要種植的植物。

ConceptDef.helpText=Shield belts stop ranged attacks from coming in or out. They have no effect on melee attacks.

To fight against shield belts, either concentrate a lot of gunfire on the target, or fight hand-to-hand.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=护盾腰带能够阻止远程伤害，但是对近战攻击不起效果。

面对装备有护盾腰带的敌人时，可以选择用火力压制或是肉搏。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=Shield belts stop ranged attacks from coming in or out. They have no effect on melee attacks.

To fight against shield belts, either concentrate a lot of gunfire on the target, or fight hand-to-hand.

ConceptDef.helpText=You can see the exact calculations behind the accuracy of any shot.

To do so, select the shooter, then rest the mouse over the target. The tooltip will show the chance to hit, and a breakdown of the contribution of various to-hit chance multipliers.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以查看殖民者每一枪的射击命中率。

选择一位枪手，将鼠标移动到他的目标之上，命中率乘数和修正因素都会显示出来。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以查看角色開火的命中率。

選擇一名射手，接著移動滑鼠游標至目標位置，命中率及細節便會顯示出來。

ConceptDef.helpText=Most foodstuffs will spoil after a relatively short time.

To prevent this, you can build a walk-in freezer.

To build a freezer, construct a closed room, and put one or two coolers into the wall. Set the coolers to a negative target temperature.

Frozen foods won't ever spoil.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=大部分的食物在短时期后就会过期腐烂。

你可以将一间房间做成冷藏室来避免这种情况发生。

在一个房间中安装一到两台制冷机，再将目标温度设置为零下即可。

被冷冻的食物不会腐烂。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=大多數食物在短時間內會腐敗，這就是你需要一個冷凍庫(冰箱)的原因。

要建立一個冷凍庫，首先要準備一個密閉非露天的房間，在牆上設置一台或多台冷氣，並將目標溫度調至零下。

冷凍狀態的食物永遠不會腐敗。

ConceptDef.helpText=Your colonists need somewhere to store items. Designate a STOCKPILE for them to store things.

Find the stockpile in the ZONES section of the ARCHITECT menu in the lower-left.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你的殖民者们需要一块地方来储存物品，规划一片「储存区」来存放物资吧。

你可以在「建筑规划」的面板中找到「区域」——「储存区」来设置。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你的居民需要一些儲存區才能存放資源，替他們設置一些儲存區以存放資源。

從畫面左下處「建設」選單中的「區域」子選單中找到「儲存區」項目。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can configure stockpiles and storage buildings by selecting them and opening the STORAGE TAB above the bottom-left inspector pane.

In the storage tab of a stockpile, you can expand categories to allow or deny specific items. Click the triangles to the left of category names.

You can change the PRIORITY of storage. Colonists will fill higher-priority storage first, and move items from lower to higher priority.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过点击储存区或者仓库面板左下角的「储存筛选」按钮来进行详细设置。

你可以扩大/减少该储存区允许堆放的物品种类。

也可以更改当前区域的「优先级」，殖民者总是会优先向优先级更高的储存区和仓库搬运东西。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以透過選擇儲存區和儲存建築並開啟在觀察面板上方的儲存選單來自訂它們的儲存設置。

ConceptDef.helpText=Note: This only designates that a colonist should flick the switch.

Nothing will actually happen until a colonist (with the Flicker work type) comes and flicks the switch by hand.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=注意：这仅仅只是指定一个开关需要殖民者进行操作。

在殖民者（分配了「开关」工作类型）过来并手动操作开关前，不会有任何变化。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=提示：切換開關必須由居民執行。

在擁有「控制」技能的居民前來切換開關前，裝置將保持原來的狀態。
ConceptDef.helpText=You can modify what time of day colonists should do different activities using the RESTRICT tab.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以在「管制」标签页中调整殖民者每日的活动安排。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以在「管制」中規劃每名居民一日中的作息與活動區。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can speed up time.

Try controlling time with the {Key:TimeSpeedNormal}, {Key:TimeSpeedFast}, and {Key:TimeSpeedSuperfast} keys, or with the time controls in the bottom right.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以加速时间流逝。

尝试通过{Key:TimeSpeedNormal}，{Key:TimeSpeedFast}和{Key:TimeSpeedSuperfast}按键来控制时间，或是点击屏幕右下方的按钮。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以加快、減慢遊戲速度甚至是暫停遊戲於使用畫面右下方的時間控制板。
ConceptDef.helpText=To send items or silver to orbital traders, you must build an ORBITAL TRADE BEACON and place a stockpile of items near it.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=若想发送物品或白银给轨道贸易商，你必须建造「轨道交易信标」，并在其边上划定物品的储存区。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=欲送出商品或白銀至宇宙商船處，你必須建立一座軌道交易信標，並於其周圍設置一片可接受商品的儲存區。
ConceptDef.helpText=Sick people can watch TV while laying in bed.
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=如果你想为卧床不起的病号们找点乐子，可以在他们看得到的地方安装一台电视机。
ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=病患臥床時可以看電視，增加娛樂值。

ConceptDef.helpText=You can set each colonist's work settings in the WORK tab at the bottom left of the screen.

They will always do the highest priority work that they can find.

If nobody has a certain work type assigned, or if they are busy with higher-priority tasks, it will never get done.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以在屏幕左下角的「工作」标签页中来分配各殖民者的工作优先级。

他们总是会先进行优先级更高的任务。

如果某项工作没有任何人被安排从事，或是总有优先级更高的事情需要处理，那么这些工作将永远不会被完成。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以在「工作」面板中個別分配每位居民的工作內容。

他們將優先執行優先度最高的工作。

若有工作沒有被分配給任何人，或所有人都忙著進行優先度更高的工作，那麼該項工作將不被完成。

ConceptDef.helpText=Zoom with the MOUSE WHEEL or {Key:MapZoomIn} and {Key:MapZoomOut} keys.

Pan with the {Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight} keys, or by MIDDLE-CLICKING and DRAGGING.

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=使用「鼠标滚轮」，或使用{Key:MapZoomIn}和{Key:MapZoomOut}键缩放。

使用{Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight}键平移，或者按住「鼠标中键（滚轮）」并「拖拽」。

ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=使用滑鼠滾輪或{Key:MapZoomIn}/{Key:MapZoomOut}縮放畫面

使用滑鼠滑動、{Key:MapDollyUp}{Key:MapDollyLeft}{Key:MapDollyDown}{Key:MapDollyRight}鍵來移動畫面，或者按住滑鼠中鍵後拖曳畫面。
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been shot to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been bitten to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been beaten to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has died in an explosion.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been shot to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been crushed to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been cut to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been EMPed to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been executed by cutting.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been torn to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been stabbed to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been stunned to death.
DamageDef.deathMessage={0} has been bitten to death.
DesignationCategoryDef.description=Entertaining or pleasurable things for colonists to enjoy.
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=提供居民娛樂的建設與裝置。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=对特定的目标向你的殖民者下达一个特定的指令。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=對指定的物件下達特殊命令。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=发电、输电和管理电网的设施。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=生產、傳輸和管理電力的設施。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=防卫和战斗相关的工事、设施。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=你逃离星球所必需的飞船零部件。
DesignationCategoryDef.description=Structural constructions like walls and power cables.
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=通过建造墙壁和门来搭建房间。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=結構性的建築，例如牆壁和門。
DesignationCategoryDef.description=Designate zones and areas where colonists will do certain activities.
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=指定殖民者做某些事情的区域。
DesignationCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=為居民的各種活動規劃區域。

DifficultyDef.description=For players on their first game, or casual players who still want a challenge.

Threats are dangerous but not brutal.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=为新手或者那些想要一些挑战的休闲玩家而准备。

会有一些挑战，但是无关痛痒，几乎可以无视。
DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=推薦給初次接觸RimWorld的玩家，以及想簡單進行遊戲而仍然想保持一定挑戰性的玩家。襲擊的規模較小。危險性較低。

DifficultyDef.description=A significant challenge.

Succeeding at this level requires a solid and well-rounded understanding of survival strategies, and some luck.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=极具挑战的游戏模式。

此难度等级需要足够的战略、战术和运气来生存。这种RimWorld模式意味着是你被游戏玩，而不是你玩游戏。
DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=相當有挑戰性的難度，你需要全面的戰術、策略以及運氣才有辦法生存下來。

DifficultyDef.description=It's a rough planet.

Threats can be quite dangerous. Not recommended until you've got some experience with the game.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=这是一个狂暴的星球。

威胁事件会非常危险，并且殖民者心情和作物产量没有额外的加成。
DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=在這個星球上生存可不是什麼輕鬆的事，襲擊可能非常致命。建議在獲得足夠遊戲經驗前不要輕易嘗試。

DifficultyDef.description=For those who want to relax and build a colony in a sandbox-like environment.

Major threatening events are disabled, but colonists can still get grumpy and animals can still go crazy from time to time.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=类似沙盒模式环境下专注于殖民地建设的休闲难度。

禁用了大威胁事件，但殖民者仍然可能不开心，动物也还会时不时地发疯。

DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=提供給單純想在沙盒世界中建造基地的玩家。

大規模攻擊事件將被隱藏，但人物仍可能會有暴力行為，也可能出現動物發狂事件。

DifficultyDef.description=For those who want to build a colony with a taste of danger.

Major threats appear, but they're weakened. Some of the extremely dangerous events are disabled.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=类似沙盒模式环境下专注于殖民地建设的休闲难度。

会触发大威胁事件，但被削弱。一些危险的随机事件已经被禁用。
DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=提供給單純想在沙盒世界中建造基地的玩家，只有相當微弱的襲擊，某些危險的隨機事件將被隱藏。

DifficultyDef.description=As hard as a diamond-bladed dagger.

Enemies are numerous, prices are poor, food is scarce, and colonists are grumpy. For those who enjoy digital suffering.

DifficultyDef.description.zh-cn=刀山火海的难度。

敌人很强大、物资售卖价格低、食物匮乏，并且殖民者脾气暴躁。为喜欢被电脑折磨的受虐狂所准备。
DifficultyDef.description.zh-tw=如同一把鑽石匕首般的堅韌，敵人十分強大、物價非常嚴苛、食物相當匱乏、居民們悶悶不樂。推薦給喜愛極端生存的玩家。
FactionDef.description.zh-cn=通常具有攻击性与侵略性的昆虫。
FactionDef.description.zh-tw=通常具有攻擊性和侵略性的蟲族。
FactionDef.description=A hive of ancient self-replicating machines.
FactionDef.description.zh-cn=能自我复制的远古机械体的巢穴。
FactionDef.description.zh-tw=一群可以自我量產的古老機器人組織。

FactionDef.description=These people have lived here for decades or centuries, and have lost most of the technology that brought them to this world. They usually work with simple mechanical tools and defend themselves with advanced gunpowder weapons.

They are concerned with the practical matters of trade, trust, and survival.

FactionDef.description.zh-cn=这些人可能已经在这里生活了数十年甚至上百年，之前所掌握的大部分科技成果基本都已经失传了。他们现在通常使用简单的机械工具，并使用高级的火药武器来防御自己。

他们比较关心诸如贸易、信任以及生存等更为实际一些的事情。

FactionDef.description.zh-tw=一個由生還者組成的小團體。

這些人在這裡生活了幾十年了。他們失去了絕大多數它們帶來的科技，他們主要使用簡單的機械工具，建造簡單的建築結構並用進階火藥時代的武器來自衛。

它們本身既不好戰也不懦弱，他們主要關心日常交易、信任和生存等等實際的問題。

FactionDef.description=A gang of bandits.

Pirates don't sow, they don't build, and they rarely trade. They enrich themselves mostly by raiding and robbing the more productive groups in the area.

Their technology level depends mostly on who they've managed to steal from recently. Mostly they carry gunpowder weapons, though the luckier ones may have advanced energy weapons, and some may just like to stab people at close range.

FactionDef.description.zh-cn=一个强盗组织。

海盗们不播种，不建设，也很少会做贸易。他们基本靠掠夺与抢劫区域内的其他活跃组织使自己变为富有。

他们的科技水平取决于最近成功地偷了谁。大部分时间下他们使用火器，有些幸运儿可能会使用更高级的能量武器，还有一些可能更喜欢近身用刀捅人。

FactionDef.description.zh-tw=一群強盜組成的無恥之徒。

海賊們從不播種食物，不建造房子也很少交易。他們的財富來自於掠奪與搶劫那些更有生產力的人們。

他們的科技等級主要取決於他們最近都偷到些什麼。他們主要攜帶火藥武器，部分運氣好的人擁有高级的能量武器，也有海賊只有捅人用的刀。
FactionDef.description.zh-cn=这是你自己的社区团体。
FactionDef.description=People from the distant reaches of space.
FactionDef.description.zh-tw=來自宇宙各個角落的人。
FactionDef.description=People from the distant reaches of space.
FactionDef.description.zh-tw=來自宇宙各個角落的人。

FactionDef.description=These people have been here a very long time. Maybe their ancestors crashed here a thousand years ago. Maybe they survived some cataclysm that destroyed a technological civilization here. In any case, the tribals are mostly nomadic people who live off the land using primitive tools and weapons.

Some tribes are more aggressive than others; many are open to trade and alliances, even with strange peoples like yourselves. Close cooperation or recruitment will be very difficult because of the vast sociotechnological and linguistic gap between the tribals and yourselves.

Despite their apparent technological weakness, the tribals can be dangerous enemies and valuable friends because of their skill with low-tech warfare, their numbers, and their hardiness.

FactionDef.description.zh-cn=这些人们在这里已经存在了很长时间了。也许他们的祖先于千年以前在这里坠毁过，也可能是从某场毁灭文明的大灾难中所幸存下来的。不管怎样，这些部落原住民大部分是生活于这里的游牧民族，他们使用着原始的工具和武器。

有些原住民比其他的更具备攻击性，而大部分都愿意做贸易往来以及结盟，即便是同你这样的陌生人。由于你和他们在社会结构上差别迥异，并且语言交流也存在障碍，使得密切合作或者招降他们变得极为困难。

尽管他们的科技发展非常弱，但原住民依然可能是危险的敌人或者是有价值的盟友，因为毕竟他们对低端武器非常熟练，人还多，而且十分坚强。

FactionDef.description.zh-tw=這些人已經在這裡生存了很久很久了。或許它們的祖先在一千年前就墜毀在了這裡，或許他們挺過了一場摧毀一切文明科技的大災難。這些部族的人主要由使用原始工具和武器的流浪者組成。

有些部族比其它部族更有攻擊性；很多部族都喜欢交易和結盟，就算和你們這樣的陌生人也一樣。和他們密切合作或者招募他們會因為社會科技和語言差異而變得很麻煩。

儘管他們有明顯的科技劣勢，它們頑強的性格、極多的人數以及在低科技武器的精湛技術讓他們隨時都可能成為危險的敵人。
GameConditionDef.description=A multi-year climate cycle due to an elliptical orbit.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=由于此星球的公转轨道为椭圆形，因此气候循环需要花费数年。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=A multi-year climate cycle due to an elliptical orbit.
GameConditionDef.description=An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一股罕见的寒流正在冻结这片区域。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.
GameConditionDef.description=An eclipse is shadowing the surface. It will be dark, even during the daytime.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一个天体的影子投在了这个星球上，造成了一场日蚀。日蚀期间即使在白天也会很暗。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=An eclipse is shadowing the surface. It will be dark, even during the daytime.
GameConditionDef.description=Extreme amounts of lightning are hitting a small region.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=极少量的闪电击中一个小区域。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=Extreme amounts of lightning are hitting a small region.
GameConditionDef.description=An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一股温度极高的热浪正在烘烤这片区域。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.
GameConditionDef.description=An interstellar planetkiller weapon is approaching this planet. When it hits, it will destroy all life.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一个星际歼星武器正在接近这颗星球。当其命中时，所有生命将会被毁灭。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=An interstellar planetkiller weapon is approaching this planet. When it hits, it will destroy all life.
GameConditionDef.description=A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are driving people towards insanity.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一个在遥远地区的强大AI正在发射能让人发疯的心灵波。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are driving people towards insanity.
GameConditionDef.description=A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are calming people and stabilizing their minds.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一个在遥远地区的强大AI正在发射能让人平静和安定的心灵波。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are calming people and stabilizing their minds.
GameConditionDef.description=A solar flare is hitting the planet. This creates extreme electrical interference and prevents most electrical devices from working.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=一场太阳耀斑正在冲击这个星球，这将产生强大的电磁干扰并让绝大多数电气设备无法运转。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=A solar flare is hitting the planet. This creates extreme electrical interference and prevents most electrical devices from working.
GameConditionDef.description=A plume of toxic dust from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region of the planet. Anyone not under a roof will be slowly poisoned.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=从遥远地域弥漫过来的毒尘正在星球的整个区域慢慢沉淀。任何不在屋顶下的人类和动物都会慢慢中毒。
GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=A plume of toxic dust from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region of the planet. Anyone not under a roof will be slowly poisoned.
GameConditionDef.endMessage=The worst of the toxic fallout has settled.
GameConditionDef.endMessage.zh-tw=The worst of the toxic fallout has settled.

GameConditionDef.description=The atmosphere is choked with volcanic particles, significantly reducing the amount of light which reaches the surface. Temperatures will be colder and plants will grow slower.
GameConditionDef.description.zh-cn=大气层被火山灰遮蔽，到达地面的阳光减弱。气温下降，植物生长速度减缓。

GameConditionDef.description.zh-tw=The atmosphere is choked with volcanic particles, significantly reducing the amount of light which reaches the surface. Temperatures will be colder and plants will grow slower.
GameConditionDef.endMessage=Most of the volcanic ash has settled.
GameConditionDef.endMessage.zh-tw=Most of the volcanic ash has settled.
HediffDef.label.zh-tw=情緒亢奮(路西法強化劑)
HediffGiverSetDef.hediffGivers.4.letter=NAME's brain injury has caused HIM to develop strange savant-like abilities.
HediffGiverSetDef.hediffGivers.4.letter.zh-cn=NAME因为大脑受伤，获得了某种奇怪的天才般的能力。
HediffGiverSetDef.hediffGivers.4.letter.zh-tw=NAME的腦部損傷使他莫名的獲得了專家般的能力。

IncidentDef.letterText=A grove of the mysterious ambrosia bush has sprouted nearby! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest the delicious, pleasurable, and slightly addictive fruit.
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=附近有一片神秘的仙馐树发芽了！如果你等这些植物长成，你可以收获美味的、令人愉悦的、成瘾性轻微的果子。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=A grove of the mysterious ambrosia bush has sprouted nearby! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest the delicious, pleasurable, and slightly addictive fruit.
IncidentDef.letterText=Your caravan has been ambushed by {0} from {1}!
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=你的远行队被来自{1}的{0}的伏击了！
IncidentDef.letterText=Your caravan has been ambushed by {0} from {1}!
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=你的远行队被来自{1}的{0}的伏击了！

IncidentDef.letterText=An unusual cold snap has set in.

Cold snaps can quickly kill by hypothermia. Be sure to build a heated space to survive, wear appropriate apparel, and try to harvest crops before they freeze and die.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一场罕见的寒流开始了。

寒流中，低温病是致命的。确保室内的热量才能生存下去，穿上合适的衣物，并且设法在作物冻死之前进行收获。
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一波不尋常的寒流正在凍結這個地區，注意保暖，並且注意作物的狀況。
IncidentDef.letterText=One of the moons of this planet has orbited in front of the sun. An eclipse has begun.
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=这个星球的月亮挡在了太阳和星球之间。日蚀已经开始。
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=這個星球的其中一顆衛星阻擋在星球與太陽之間，一場日蝕開始了。
IncidentDef.letterText=Extreme amounts of lightning are hitting a small region. This can cause massive fires.
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=极少量的闪电击中一个小区域。这会引起巨大的火灾。
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一場閃電雨正在密集轟炸這個地區，這可能會導致大規模的火災。

IncidentDef.letterText=An unusual heat wave has begun.

Heat waves can kill quickly if people start getting heatstroke. Stay cool by building a cooler or getting deep under a mountain.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一场罕见的热浪开始了。

在热浪中如果中暑，极易死亡。建造冷却器来降温或呆在清凉的山洞深处。
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一波極端酷熱的熱浪正在烤熟這片地區，小心別中暑了。

IncidentDef.letterText=A bug hive has emerged!

It will slowly spawn bugs as well as produce additional hives. If you don't want it to infest the whole area, muster your forces and destroy it. But beware - the bugs will defend their hive.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一个虫巢出现了！

它会慢慢繁殖出巨型昆虫和新巢穴。如果你不想让它遍布整个地区，请聚集军队摧毁它。但要小心，这些虫子会保护它们的巢穴。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=有蟲族的巢穴冒了出來！

它會緩慢的產生蟲子以及新的蟲巢，如果你不希望蟲巢蔓延整個區域，召集你的戰力消滅它！但可別忘了，蟲族也是會保衛自己的巢穴的。
IncidentDef.letterText=Your caravan has been ambushed by manhunting {0}!
IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=你的远行队被猎杀人类的{0}伏击了!

IncidentDef.letterText=A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

It is leaking toxic material and will kill all plants in an expanding circle around itself.

Destroy it as soon as possible.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一艘古老的飞船在附近坠毁了。

从残骸中蔓延的毒气会毒死附近的植物。

尽可能快地摧毁它。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一大塊遠古星艦的碎片掉落到了附近。

它會釋出有毒物質，殺死它周圍的所有植物。

盡早摧毀這塊碎片！

IncidentDef.letterText=A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists can feel it in the back of their mind, exhorting unspeakable acts. It must have an onboard AI persona with psychic projection ability. And this AI is not friendly.

Destroy it as soon as possible.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一艘古老的飞船在附近坠毁了。

殖民者感应到一种不可未知的危险。飞船残骸中肯定有个拥有心理投射能力的人工智能。看起来这个人工智能还不太友善。

尽可能快地摧毁它。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一大塊遠古星艦的碎片掉落到了附近。

你的居民們感覺到有一股聲音迴盪在腦海裡，引誘他們做出無法言喻的舉動。這塊碎片裡肯定有一枚搭載AI核心的干擾電波發送裝置，而且顯然它並不友善。

盡早摧毀這塊碎片！

IncidentDef.letterText={0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

Apparently bandits based in a nearby camp have been raiding their caravans. They've asked us to destroy it, which means eliminating all enemies and turrets.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward:

{3}

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn={2}的{1}，{0}，给我们发送了一条消息。

附近一个营地中的匪徒基地袭击了他们的远行队。他们请求我们将其摧毁，这意味着要消灭所有敌人和炮塔。

成功后，关系将会得到提升，并且他们会发送给我们以下报酬：

{3}

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw={0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

Apparently bandits based in a nearby camp have been raiding their caravans. They've asked us to destroy it, which means eliminating all enemies and turrets.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward:

{3}

IncidentDef.letterText={0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

They've learned that a collection of valuable items have been left for the taking not far from us. The collection consists of:

{3}

Unfortunately, it won’t last - others will take the items in {4} days if we don't.

Valuables tend to attract danger, so beware.

{5}

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn={2}的{1}，{0}，给我们发送了一条消息。

他们了解到一批贵重物品在离我们不远处被留了下来等待接收。这批物品包含：

{3}

遗憾的是，时间并不充裕——如果我们不接收这批物品，其他人会在{4}天后来接收。

机会往往伴随着风险，务必当心。

{5}

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw={0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

They've learned that a collection of valuable items have been left for the taking not far from us. The collection consists of:

{3}

Unfortunately, it won’t last - others will take the items in {4} days if we don't.

Valuables tend to attract danger, so beware.

{5}

IncidentDef.letterText=A solar flare has begun.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

It should pass in about a day.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一场太阳耀斑开始了。

极强的辐射让所有电气设施无法运转。

它应该会在一天内结束。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一場太陽閃焰開始了。

強大的脈衝會讓所有電器無法運作。

閃焰的影響大約會持續一天。

IncidentDef.letterText=A distant chemical fire has released a plume of poison over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic dust settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a season.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=遥远地方的一起化学品火灾释放的有毒尘埃弥漫了整个地区。

不在屋顶下的人类和动物都会慢慢被有空气中的有毒粉尘致病。

毒雾会持续在几天或超过一个月。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=遠方一場激烈的化學作用釋放出危險的毒素到這個區域。

任何暴露在露天之下的人類與生物將會被毒素緩慢侵蝕。

有毒的大氣至少會瀰漫在整個區域數日，甚至長達一個月以上。

IncidentDef.letterText=A distant supervolcano has erupted and begun spewing millions of cubic kilometers of ash into the atmosphere.

Ash in the atmosphere will obscure the sun. Temperatures will drop and plants will suffer for lack of sunlight. It could pass in a few weeks, or it might last many seasons.

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-cn=一个遥远的超级火山爆发了，喷出的火山灰散布在数百万平方公里的大气中。

火山灰在大气中遮蔽了太阳。气温下降、植物会缺乏阳光而枯萎。火山灰有可能在几周内散去，或者持续几个月。

IncidentDef.letterText.zh-tw=一個遙遠的超級火山開始了它的噴發，並且釋放出數百萬立方公里的火山灰至大氣中。

大量的火山灰會遮蔽陽光，這個星球的氣溫會大幅下降，植物也會因為缺乏光線而難以生存。火山冬天最快可能會在幾周內結束，最長則可能延續數季。

InstructionDef.text=Great!

Randomize more if you want - but don't try to get the perfect character. Everyone has flaws, and it makes the story more interesting!

You can also re-name the characters by clicking on their names.

Click START when you're ready.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=太棒了！

你可以一直这么玩儿下去，但不会有十全十美的角色。人人都有自己的缺陷，这样故事才更加有趣！

你还可以通过点击人物名称给他们起一个新的名字。

准备好了就点击「开始」吧！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=做得好！

如果你想要，可以多反覆生成幾次，但別試著生成一個完美的角色，每個人都有短處，這使得故事更加精采有趣。

你也可以點擊角色的名字替他們重新命名。

當一切就緒，點擊「開始遊戲」。

InstructionDef.text=Colonists need to be told what to cook.

Cooking orders are added on the stove itself. Once a bill has been created, colonists will do the work automatically.

1. Wait for the stove to be built.
2. Click the stove to select it.
3. Open the BILLS tab.
4. Click ADD BILL.
5. Select COOK SIMPLE MEAL on the context menu.
6. Click the + button to increase the count to 10.

Remember, you can speed up time if building is taking too long.

You can also select a colonist and right-click the stove to prioritize building it.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=现在你可以安排殖民者来做饭了。

对炉子下达特定的烹饪清单后，殖民者们就会开始做饭。

1. 等待炉子建好
2. 在菜单中选择「烹饪简单食物」
3. 将订单数量调整至「10」

记住，你可以随时加速时间流逝速度。你还可以选中殖民者并右击炉灶以优先进行烹饪。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=居民們需要知道要烹煮何種料理。

工作(烹調)指令會直接加在工作設備(爐灶)上，指令下達後，居民便會自動進行工作。

1. 等待爐灶建造完成。
2. 點選爐灶。
3. 點選「工作」以開啟工作指令面板。
4. 點擊「新增工作」。
5. 在面板中選擇「烹調簡單料理」。
6. 點擊「+」按鈕將訂單數量增加至10。

記住，當工作正在進行時，你可以加快遊戲速度以減少等待時間。

你還能夠選擇一名居民，再右鍵點擊未完成的工作來強制進行某項工作。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please add a bill to cook simple meals at your cook stove.

InstructionDef.text=So your pet will sleep inside with you, place an ANIMAL SLEEPING SPOT inside the room.

Sleeping spots aren't real buildings - they're just spots on the ground designated for a sleeping.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你还需要给你的宠物一个睡觉的地方。

动物睡眠点并不是一个真正的设施，只是一个指定的休息地点。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你的寵物也需要地方睡覺。在房間裡放置一個動物睡眠點。

睡眠點並非真正的建築或設施，單純只是個功能性的標記。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please place an animal sleeping spot inside the room.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请给你的宠物指定一个动物睡眠点
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將動物睡眠點放置在房間內。

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build an animal sleeping spot
inside the room
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-cn=请给你的宠物在室内指定一个动物睡眠点
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-tw=將動物睡眠點放置在房間內

InstructionDef.text=Your colonists will now build the room!

Now they need somewhere to sleep. Place three BEDS inside the room.

Find them in the FURNITURE category.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你的殖民者们已经有房间了！

他们需要休息，在房间里放三张床吧。

你可以在「家具」菜单里找到「单人床」。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你的居民馬上會著手建造房間！

現在，他們需要一個睡覺的地方，在房間中放置三張床。

在建築選單的「家具」中找到床的建造項目。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build wooden beds inside the room.
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build three beds inside the room

InstructionDef.text=Excellent!

Now you'll need to make a stove to cook food.

Build a FUELED STOVE inside the room.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=不错！

现在需要造一个炉灶来烹饪。

在之前的房间里造一个燃料炉灶。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=做得漂亮！
現在你需要一個爐灶來烹煮料理。

在房間內建造一座爐灶。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build the fueled stove inside the room you built earlier.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请在你之前建造的房间内造炉灶
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將爐灶建造在稍早建造的房間內。
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build a fueled stove inside the room

InstructionDef.text=Your colonists need sources of joy or they'll get sad over time.

Build a HORSESHOES pin outside, near the room.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你的殖民者需要找点乐子打发时间。

在屋外造一个「马蹄钉」。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你的居民需要一些娛樂方式，否則他們會整天悶悶不樂。

在房間外建造一個馬蹄鐵棒。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please place a horseshoes pin somewhere near the room.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请在房屋附近造一个马蹄钉
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請在室外靠牆處建造馬蹄鐵棒。

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build a horseshoes pin
outside the room

InstructionDef.text=Now just place a DOOR over any one of the room walls.

DOOR is right beside WALL in the ARCHITECT menu.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=在墙的中间放一扇门即可。

门就在墙的菜单栏旁边。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=現在，在牆的任意位置放置一扇門。

門的建築選項就在牆的隔壁。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build a wooden door over one of your room walls.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將木門放置在先前規劃的其中一個牆壁位置上。
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build a door over one wall

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-tw=將木門建造在
房間牆壁位置上

InstructionDef.text=Awesome! Next, we'll build a room.

1. Click ARCHITECT.
2. Click STRUCTURE.
3. Select WALL.
4. Select WOOD as the material.
5. Drag out four walls to form the shape indicated on the map.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=棒极了！接下来让我们来建造一间屋子吧。

1. 点击「建筑规划」
2. 选择「结构」
3. 选择造墙
4. 选择木材
5. 通过拖拽来建造一堵墙

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=太棒了！接著，我們要開始建造房間。

1. 開啟建築選單。
2. 點選「結構」。
3. 選擇「牆」。
4. 選擇「木材」作為材料。
5. 在提示的位置畫出四面牆壁。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build wooden walls along the edges of the highlighted rectangle.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请沿着高亮的区域建造木墙。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請依據提示的位置進行建造。

InstructionDef.text=Great! You've now got a basic colony running! Eventually, enemies will raid your colony. It's time to prepare for that.

Select the SANDBAGS designator and drag the sandbags out at the designated area.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=恭喜你，你的殖民地已经初具规模了，敌人偶尔会来骚扰，你必须做好准备！

请在目标区域建造一些沙包。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=太棒了！你的殖民地已經步上軌道了。很快的將會有海盜襲來，是時候做些準備了。

使用「沙包」工具於提示位置建造沙包。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build sandbags in the highlighted area.

InstructionDef.text=To advance, you'll need to research new technologies.

Build a wooden SIMPLE RESEARCH BENCH inside your room.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=知识就是力量，研究才能进步。

先来建造一个「基础研究台」。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=要使殖民地進步，你需要一張研究桌以開發新科技。

在你的房間裡建造一張木製研究桌。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please place a wooden simple research bench inside the room you built earlier.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请在之前建造的房间中建造一个木制的基础研究台。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將研究桌建造在稍早建造的房間內。

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build a wooden simple research bench
inside the room
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-cn=在之前的房间中建造一个木制的基础研究台。

InstructionDef.text=You'll also want some light inside, or your colonists will get grumpy in the dark.

Build a TORCH LAMP inside the room.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你还需要在室内建设一些光源，殖民者在黑暗中会不快。

在房间里造一个「火把」。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你的房間還需要一點照明，否則居民們在黑暗中會感到不悅。

在房間中建造火把。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please build a torch lamp inside the room.
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Build a torch lamp inside the room

InstructionDef.text=You can control who does what kinds of work using the checkboxes. Colonists will do tasks in order, from left to right.

Try changing some settings now.

Beware - Colonists always follow their work priorities, even if this makes them do dumb things! Setting up a smart work regime is a key skill for success in RimWorld. So set the work settings carefully, and review them often!

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你可以在「工作」面板中来分配每一个殖民者的工作优先级。

他们总是会先进行优先级更高的任务。

如果某项工作没有任何人被安排从事，或是总有优先级更高的事情需要处理，那么这些工作将永远不会被完成。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你可以在「工作」面板控制個別殖民者應該那些工作。居民只會做他們分配到的工作，優先度由左向右遞減。

請嘗試調整一些設定。

請留意，即使優先度設定會讓工作效率低落，居民的工作順序絕對會遵照優先度先後進行，因此，建立一套高效的工作設定是順利遊戲的一大關鍵。請細心設定工作優先度，並且經常根據當下狀況進行調整。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please open the 'Work' tab and change some settings.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请打开工作面板并做一些调整
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請開啟「工作」面板並嘗試調整一些設定。

InstructionDef.text=Here, you choose your landing site.

There are lots of biomes, but for now, let's start with a friendly one.

Click a landing site with temperate forest biome and flat terrain, and click NEXT.

You can use the TERRAIN tab to view information about the selected tile.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=在这里你将选择自己的降落地点。

游戏中有多种不同的生态区，但现在，我们还是从对新手比较友好的生态区开始。

请选择一处温带森林的平原地形的着降落点，并点击「继续」。

你可以通过「地形」标签查看所选中六边形格子的信息。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=在這裡，你可以選擇你將降落的地點。

在這顆星球上有許許多多的生態系，但現在，讓我們先從較容易生存的開始。

選擇一個地形平坦的溫帶森林，然後點擊「選擇著陸點」。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please choose a temperate forest landing site with flat terrain.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请选择一个位于「温带森林」生态区的「平原」来开始游戏。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請選擇地形平坦的溫帶森林生態系。

InstructionDef.text=This is the end of the tutorial!

There's still tons more to learn, including prisoners, hunting, trade, animal taming, and much more. But you've got the basics down.

Random incidents were disabled during this tutorial. To begin the real game:

1. Open the MENU tab in the bottom-right.
2. Select OPTIONS.
3. Click CHOOSE STORYTELLER.
4. Select a storyteller and difficulty level that appeals to you.

Good luck, and have fun.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=教程到此就结束了！

还有许多东西需要学习，比如如何管理囚犯，如何狩猎，如何贸易，但是你已经掌握了所有的基础知识。

在教程模式中，所有的随机事件都已经被禁用，如果你想开启一场真正的游戏

1. 请点击屏幕右下角的「菜单」按钮
2. 选择「选项」
3. 选择「故事叙述者」」
4. 选择一个适合你的难度和故事讲述者。
祝你好运！有更多的疑问可以前往官方维基rimworld.huiji.wiki查阅资料，享受游戏吧！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=遊戲教學已到了尾聲！

遊戲中還有數不清的細節需要學習，關於俘虜、狩獵、交易、馴服動物等等...，但你已經有了一定的基礎。

隨機事件在教學中已被停用，若要開始正式的遊戲：

1. 點擊畫面右下角的「選單」。
2. 點擊「選項」。
3. 點擊「選擇故事敘述者」。
4. 選擇適合你的故事敘述者擊遊戲難度。

祝你好運！更重要的是，玩得開心！
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please choose a storyteller in the Options menu to end the tutorial.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=在「选项」菜单中选择故事叙述者并结束教程
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請選擇故事敘述者以切換至正常遊戲並結束遊戲教學。

InstructionDef.text=You'll want to harvest some wood. Designate some trees to be chopped.

Select the CHOP WOOD designator and designate 10 trees to be chopped down.

(Pro tip: You can drag a box over trees to designate several at once.)

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你需要采集一些木材，规划一些需要砍伐的树木吧

选择「砍伐」命令然后规划10颗需要砍伐的树木

提示：你可以直接框选10棵树而不必一个一个去点

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=如果你想砍些木頭用，指定一些要砍伐的樹木。

使用「砍伐」工具指定10顆樹木。

(小技巧：你可以一次劃過大範圍來指定多棵樹木。)
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please drag the 'chop wood' designator over some trees.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請使用「砍伐」工具指定10顆樹木。

InstructionDef.text=Welcome to RimWorld! This tutorial will teach you how to play the game.

The first step is to generate a world to play in.

This page configures how your world should be generated.

The default settings here are good - go ahead and click GENERATE!

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=欢迎来到Rimworld！这篇教程将指引你逐步熟悉了解游戏的基本操作。

首先我们需要生成一个游戏世界。

教程所使用的默认设置对新手非常友善，无需调整。请点击「生成世界」！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=歡迎來到RimWorld！本教學將會教你如何遊玩本遊戲。

第一步是要創造一個世界(星球)。

在這個畫面，世界是依據你設定的種子碼生成的。

這裡已經有預設的種子碼，點擊「創造世界」即可生成世界！

InstructionDef.text=I've now sent a raider to attack your colony!

1. Pause the game by hitting {Key:TogglePause}!
2. Read the red letter in the bottom-right of the screen.
3. DRAFT your colonists by selecting them and hitting the DRAFT command.
4. Right-click to them to positions inside the sandbag square, touching the sandbags.
5. Unpause.

Colonists must be touching cover to benefit from it. Once you're in cover, wait for the attacker to approach. Your colonists will shoot automatically.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=我派了一些掠夺者来攻打你的殖民地！

1. 按下{Key:TogglePause}暂停游戏
2. 阅读屏幕右侧弹出的红色通知。
3. 将你的殖民者通过「征召」按钮动员起来，准备战斗！
4. 解除暂停

将你的殖民者移动到沙包旁边，只有这样掩体才能生效，一旦敌人进入射程，他们就会自动开火！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=我已經向你的殖民地發派出了一名襲擊者。

1. 按下{Key:TogglePause}暫停時間。
2. 閱讀畫面右下角的紅色信封通知。
3. 選取你的殖民者後，點擊「徵召」按鈕徵召他們。
4. 右鍵點擊將居民派遣至沙包陣地，緊鄰沙包的位置。
5. 解除暫停。

居民必須緊臨掩體才能獲得掩護效果。當居民們就位，等待襲擊者到達。居民們會自動開火攻擊。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please focus on winning the fight!

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Send colonists here
touching sandbags for cover
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-cn=请将殖民者移动到沙包旁边。
InstructionDef.text=Right-click to get out of stockpile designating mode.
InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=点击右键退出规划模式。
InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=點擊滑鼠右鍵退出劃設儲存區狀態。

InstructionDef.text=Have your colonists equip the starting weapons. To equip a weapon:

1. Click a colonist to select them.
2. Right-click the weapon you want to equip.
3. Click 'equip weapon' on the context menu.

Do this for each colonist.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=把你的殖民者武装起来吧。

1. 选择一个殖民者
2. 右键你想装备的武器
3. 选择「装备武器」

给每个人都装备上武器吧

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=讓你的居民裝備上降落時帶來的武器：

1. 左鍵點選一名居民。
2. 右鍵點擊你想讓居民裝備的武器。
3. 選擇「裝備武器」。

重複此步驟替所有居民裝備上武器。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please have your colonists equip weapons.

InstructionDef.text=The BUILD ROOF AREA defines where your colonists will try to build roofs.

It auto-fills when you enclose a new room.

Select the EXPAND BUILD ROOF AREA tool and drag out the shape of a porch roof on the front of the house.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=下面介绍屋顶区域，殖民者会尝试去搭建屋顶的区域。

一般来说当房间建好后会自动创建屋顶区。

你也可以进一步扩建，将你的房屋外围扩建为带有屋顶的区域。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=屋頂區定義了你的居民會架設屋頂的區域。

屋頂區會在新房間落成同時自動添加。

使用「劃設屋頂區」工具替你的房間門外添上一道屋簷。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please expand the build roof area a bit, just for practice.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請劃設一小塊的屋頂區，僅做為練習目的。

InstructionDef.text=Next, you'll learn to expand the HOME AREA.

Colonists will clean floors and extinguish fires in the home area only, and ignore fires or filth outside of it.

The home area is added automatically when you build things - but you can also expand it manually.

Select the EXPAND HOME AREA tool and drag out a new area on the map.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=下一步，你需要学会如何扩大「居住区」。

居住区是你的殖民者会打扫以及灭火的区域。

在「建筑规划」菜单下的「区域」选项里可以设立居住区。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=接下來，你將學到如何擴張生活區。

居民只會打掃生活區內的垃圾、撲滅生活區內的火，並無視生活區外的髒污與火災。

生活區會自動劃設在新的建築或設施周邊，但你也可以手動劃設。

使用「劃設生活區」工具在地圖上劃設新的生活區。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please expand the home area a bit, just for practice.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請劃設一小塊的生活區，僅做為練習目的。

InstructionDef.text=Let's just wait for all your constructions to be built.

Consider using the WORK tab to assign more colonists to Construct.

Also, you can speed up time to shorten the wait.

Once everything's built, I'll send an attacker to test your defenses!

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=让我们先等所有的工作做完吧。

你可以考虑用「工作」标签页中分配更多的殖民者进行建造任务。

你还可以通过加速时间流逝来节约时间。

一旦建造完毕，一波敌人会来考验你的工作成果！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=讓我們稍等直到建造完成。

你可以用工作面板將建造工作分配給更多居民。

別忘了可以加快遊戲速度縮短等待時間。

當一切建造工作完成，我會送出一名襲擊者來測試你的防衛。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please wait for your colonists to finish building the sandbags.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请等待殖民者将沙包建造完毕

InstructionDef.text=The house is being built!

Your colonists will need something to eat, so place a GROWING ZONE as indicated on the map.

This is where your colonists will sow crops.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=房子造好了！

接下来解决吃饭问题！规划一个「种植区」。

你的殖民者会在这里种植作物。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你的房間建造完成了！

你的居民還需要東西吃。依據提示在地圖上劃設一片種植區。

居民們將在這個區域內種植作物。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please make a growing zone on the indicated area.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请在指定的地点规划一个种植区
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將種植區劃設在提示區域內。

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-cn=在这里规划种植区
（拖拽对角线来扩大区域）

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-tw=在此劃設種植區。
(由一角拖曳至對角)

InstructionDef.text=Great!

Now, make a stockpile so your colonists know where to keep items.

1. Click ARCHITECT tab in the bottom left.
2. Click the ZONE/AREA category.
3. Select the CREATE STOCKPILE tool.
4. Click and drag out a square as indicated on the map.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=不错！

现在让我们来规划一片「储存区」来存放物资吧。

你可以在「建筑规划」的面板中找到「区域」——「储存区」来设置。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=做得好！

現在，劃設一個儲存區讓居民知道東西該存放在哪裡。

1. 點擊左下角的「建設」開啟建設選單。
2. 點選「區域」項目。
3選擇「劃設儲存區」工具。
4按壓滑鼠左鍵並拖曳，依據指示劃設儲存區。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please make a stockpile on the indicated area.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-cn=请在标注的地方建立储存区
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將儲存區劃設在提示區域內。

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-cn=请在这里设立
（拉伸对角来选择区域）

InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-tw=在此劃設儲存區。
(由一角拖曳至對角)

InstructionDef.text=Here you are on the surface!

Now try moving the camera around.

Use the {Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight} keys, or click and drag with the middle mouse button.

Try it now!

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=激动人心的游戏就要开始了！

你可以自由的调整镜头视角。

通过{Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight} 或者鼠标在屏幕边缘移动即可移动当前视野！

试试看吧！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=現在你已經降落到地面上了！

現在試著移動遊戲畫面四處看看。

使用{Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight}，或是按住滑鼠中鍵拖曳畫面。

現在就嘗試看看！

InstructionDef.text=Great!

You can also zoom in and out with the mouse wheel, or the {Key:MapZoomIn} and {Key:MapZoomOut} keys.

Try it now!

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=赞！

通过鼠标滚轮滚动或者使用{Key:MapDollyUp}-{Key:MapDollyLeft}-{Key:MapDollyDown}-{Key:MapDollyRight}按键来缩放视野！

试试看吧！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=做得好！

你還可以用滑鼠滾輪縮放畫面，或是使用{Key:MapZoomIn}和{Key:MapZoomOut}達到同樣的效果。

現在就嘗試看看！

InstructionDef.text=Now your colonists will cook some food! Tasty!

Next, you'll want to mine some minerals. I've spawned some mineable steel near your base.

Select the MINE designator and drag over the steel to designate it for mining.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=现在你的殖民者可以做饭了，嗯~真香！

下一步，你得去开采一些矿石，你的基地附近有一些钢铁。

选择采矿然后对着那些有钢铁的矿脉下达「开采」指令吧。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=現在你的居民會自動烹煮料理了，好香阿！

接下來，你可能會想試著開採一些礦物，我已經在你的家園附近生成幾個可以開採的鐵礦，

使用「開採」工具拖曳過以標記你要開採的鐵礦。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please use the 'mine' designator on the compacted steel.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=使用「開採」工具標記要開採的鐵礦。

InstructionDef.text=Excellent! Next, you'll want to select what you want to be researched.

Open the RESEARCH tab.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=太棒了！让我们研究点什么吧！

请打开「研究」面板。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=做得漂亮！接下來要選擇要研究的科技。

開啟「研究」面板。

InstructionDef.text=You can control which colonist does what kind of work.

Open the WORK tab at the bottom of the screen.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你可以控制殖民者进行何种工作

点击「工作」面板

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你可以指定居民該做哪些工作。

開啟畫面底部的「工作」面板。

InstructionDef.text=You can pause time.

This means you never need to rush. You can always pause and take your time to issue orders.

Try pausing with the {Key:TogglePause} key, or by using the time controls in the bottom right.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你可以暂停时间！

点击{Key:TogglePause}来暂停/继续游戏。

当你忙得不可开交时，按{Key:TogglePause}就对了！

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你可以隨時暫停時間。

這表示你永遠不必慌忙地下指令，暫停時間讓你有充足的時間可以應對。

按下{Key:TogglePause}或點擊畫面右下角的時間控制按鈕暫停時間。

InstructionDef.text=Now you'll generate characters!

Try randomizing a character with the RANDOMIZE button.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=现在可以生成角色了！

试试「随机」按钮来随机生成一个殖民者角色。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=現在你將開始生成你的角色！

點選「隨機生成」按鈕重新生成一個角色。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please try randomizing a character first.

InstructionDef.text=Now just choose whatever you want to be researched first.

You might have to wait for the research bench to be constructed, or for trees to be chopped for wood.

If it's taking too long, use the WORK tab to assign more colonists to Construct.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=现在先选择你想要最先研究的项目。

你可能需要等待研究台建造完成，你可以砍一些原木来建造。

如果花费的时间太长，你可以打开「工作」标签，指派更多的人参与建造。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=選擇一項你想研究的科技。

你可能得等待研究桌完工。

如果建造研究桌的進度緩慢或停滯，使用工作面板將建造工作分配給更多人。

InstructionDef.text=You can decide what plant your colonists should sow in a growing zone.

1. Right-click to exit architect mode.
2. Click your growing zone to select it.
3. Click the ""Select plant"" command at the bottom and change it to Rice.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你能决定在地里种什么。

1. 右键退出规划模式
2. 左键选中种植区
3. 在下方的菜单里选择种下「水稻」

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你可以決定種植區該種何種作物。

1. 點一下右鍵退出建築清單。
2. 點一下以選取你的種植區。
3. 點擊位於底部的「選擇作物」將作物調整為稻米。
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage=Please set your growing zone to grow rice.
InstructionDef.rejectInputMessage.zh-tw=請將種植區作物更改為稻米。
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction=Set this growing zone to grow rice
InstructionDef.onMapInstruction.zh-tw=選擇這個種植區來更換作物

InstructionDef.text=You can also speed up time.

Try controlling time with the {Key:TimeSpeedNormal}, {Key:TimeSpeedFast}, and {Key:TimeSpeedSuperfast} keys, or with the time controls in the bottom right.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=你还可以加速时间流逝。

尝试通过{Key:TimeSpeedNormal}，{Key:TimeSpeedFast}，和{Key:TimeSpeedSuperfast}按键来控制时间，或是点击屏幕右下方的按钮。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=你還能夠加速時間。

使用{Key:TimeSpeedNormal}、{Key:TimeSpeedFast}及{Key:TimeSpeedSuperfast}，或是畫面右下角的時間控制按鈕來調整時間流速。

InstructionDef.text=Success! Now UNDRAFT all your colonists using the same command as before.

This will let them return to their own schedules.

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=不错不错！将你的殖民者解散吧。

他们会回归到正常工作当中去。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=成功了！再次按下徵召按鈕解除居民們的徵召狀態。

這能讓他們返回平時的工作崗位。

InstructionDef.text=Now, to allow your colonists to bring your items to the stockpile, you must unforbid the items.

1. Clicking your starting items to select them.
2. Click the TOGGLE FORBIDDEN command to unforbid them.

(Pro tip: Double-click an item to select all on screen of the same type.)

InstructionDef.text.zh-cn=殖民者不能对被标记为「禁用」的物品进行操作。

禁用的物品上会有一个红色的小X，选择禁用物品后，在下方的控制栏内可以解禁。

鼠标双击物品可快速同时选中附近同类物品。

InstructionDef.text.zh-tw=現在，要讓你的殖民者將東西搬運到儲存區，你必須取消物品的禁止互動狀態。

1. 選取你的開局物資。
2. 點擊「切換禁止互動」取消禁止互動狀態。

(小技巧：快速連點兩下可以選取畫面中所有同類型的物件。)

InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Communicated with [other_nameShortIndef], attempting to build rapport."",""logentry->与[other_nameShortIndef]沟通试图建立亲密关系。"",""logentry->向[other_nameShortIndef]釋出善意，嘗試引起牠的注意。""

InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Responded to [other_nameShortIndef]'s friendly communication."",""logentry->回应[other_nameShortIndef]的友好沟通。"",""logentry->回應了[other_nameShortIndef]的善意。""
InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Was broken up with by [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]抛弃了。"",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]甩了。""

InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Tried to build rapport with [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->尝试与[other_nameShortIndef]建立融洽关系。"",""logentry->向[other_nameShortIndef]交談並展現善意。""

InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Listened to [other_nameShortIndef] build rapport with me."",""logentry->允许[other_nameShortIndef]和自己建立融洽关系。"",""logentry->與[other_nameShortIndef]友好交談。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Had a nice chat with [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->和[other_nameShortIndef]友好交谈。"",""logentry->和[other_nameShortIndef]小聊了一會兒。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Had a deep talk with [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->和[other_nameShortIndef]深入交谈。"",""logentry->和[other_nameShortIndef]深談一番。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Said kind words to [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->对[other_nameShortIndef]说了一些关怀的话。"",""logentry->讚美了[other_nameShortIndef]幾句。""

InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Had kind words bestowed by [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->听[other_nameShortIndef]说了一些关怀的话。"",""logentry->受到[other_nameShortIndef]的讚美。""
InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Was proposed to by [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]求婚。"",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]求婚。""
InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Was nuzzled by [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->享受[other_nameShortIndef]的抚摸。"",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]撒嬌。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Attempted to recruit [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->尝试招募[other_nameShortIndef]。"",""logentry->嘗試招募[other_nameShortIndef]。""

InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Listened to a recruitment pitch from [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->聆听[other_nameShortIndef]的招募游说。"",""logentry->聽[other_nameShortIndef]介紹這座殖民地。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Attempted to woo [other_nameShortIndef] into a romance."",""logentry->向[other_nameShortIndef]求爱"",""logentry->向[other_nameShortIndef]告白。""
InteractionDef.logRulesInitiator.rulesStrings=""logentry->Attempted to tame [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->尝试去驯服[other_nameShortIndef]。"",""logentry->試圖馴服[other_nameShortIndef]。""

InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Watches [other_nameShortIndef] attempt to tame me."",""logentry->观察[other_nameShortIndef]驯服自己。"",""logentry->看著[other_nameShortIndef]嘗試馴服自己。""
InteractionDef.logRulesRecipient.rulesStrings=""logentry->Was trained by [other_nameShortIndef]."",""logentry->被[other_nameShortIndef]训练。"",""logentry->看著[other_nameShortIndef]嘗試訓練自己。""
JobDef.reportString.zh-cn=正在寻找温度安全的地方。
JobDef.reportString.zh-cn=正在将受伤的囚犯TargetA送到床上。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=General-use controls for the architect mode menu.
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建設清單中使用的普通快捷鍵。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""floors"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「地面」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「地面」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""furniture"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「家具」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「家具」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""joy"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「娱乐」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「娛樂」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""misc"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「杂项」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「其他」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""orders"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「命令」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「命令」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""power"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「电力」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「電力」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""production"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「生产」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「生產」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""security"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「防卫」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「防衛」分類的指令配置。

KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「飞船」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「星艦」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Key bindings for the ""structure"" section of the Architect menu
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于建筑规划 - 「结构」分类的快捷键
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「結構」分類的指令配置。

KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「溫度」分類的指令配置。

KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=建築選單中「區域」分類的指令配置。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Controls for developers and modders. Active in development mode only.
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=开发者和Mod制作者相关的按键。只在开发者模式中有效。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=遊戲與模組開發者使用的控制選項，僅可在開發者模式下使用。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Colony mode controls that apply in most situations.
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=在绝大多数情况下的对殖民地的操作按键。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=遊戲進行中大多數情況下可使用的指令。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=用于控制主标签开启与关闭。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Generic controls that are re-used by many items and objects throughout the game.
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=游戏中很多物品重复使用的通用按键。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-tw=在整個遊戲中被複數個道具與物件使用到的快捷鍵。
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description=Special controls reserved for specific functions on specific objects.
KeyBindingCategoryDef.description.zh-cn=为特殊物品的特殊功能预留的按键。
KeyBindingDef.label.zh-tw=允許/解除物件互動限制
KeyBindingDef.label.zh-cn=循环选择同一格中的下一个物体
KeyBindingDef.label.zh-tw=選取同一方格的下一個物件。
KeyBindingDef.label.zh-cn=切换截图模式（界面隐藏/显示）
MainButtonDef.description=Configure how the colony's tame animals should be treated.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=配置如何处理殖民地的已驯服的动物。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=管理屬於殖民地的各種動物。
MainButtonDef.description=Designate where and what colonists should build, farm, store items, and so on.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=指定殖民者在哪里修建何种建筑、种植何种植物、储存何种物品等等。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=指定居民們要在哪裡進行建設、種植作物以及儲存物品等等。
MainButtonDef.description=Configure what each colonist is allowed to wear, and how to react to nearby enemies.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=配置每个殖民者允许穿戴的装备，以及附近有敌人时作出何种反应。管理使用药物或成瘾品的方针。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=管理每位居民該穿些什麼服裝，以及遭遇敵人時該如何反應。
MainButtonDef.description=Review the factions known to the colony and their relationships.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=查看殖民地已知的所有派系和派系关系。
MainButtonDef.description=Review records of the colony's history.
MainButtonDef.description=Change options, save, load, or quit the game.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=改变选项，保存、载入或退出游戏。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=變更遊戲選項、載入、儲存或離開遊戲
MainButtonDef.description=Examine and decide on research projects.
MainButtonDef.description=Restrict colonists to certain activities at certain times of day, or to specific allowed areas.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=指定殖民者在特定时段的活动种类，或限制殖民者的活动区域。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=規劃居民一天的行程，以及限制他們的活動區域。
MainButtonDef.description=Choose which colonist does what kinds of work, and in what priority order.
MainButtonDef.description.zh-cn=指定殖民者进行何种工作，以及各种工作的优先顺序。
MainButtonDef.description.zh-tw=管理居民們該做些什麼工作，以及各項工作的優先度。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0}'s berserk rage has come to an end.
MentalStateDef.beginLetter={0} is pigging out on food.
MentalStateDef.beginLetter.zh-tw={0}正打算殲滅所有的糧食庫存。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} is no longer pigging out on food.
MentalStateDef.beginLetter={0} is on a fire starting spree.
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} is no longer on a fire starting spree.
MentalStateDef.beginLetter.zh-cn={0} 已经放弃并离开殖民地。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} has had a change of heart and is coming back to the colony.
MentalStateDef.baseInspectLine=Mental state: Given up and leaving
MentalStateDef.beginLetter.zh-tw={0}發瘋似的攻擊他所見到的任何人。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0}'s manhunting bloodlust has come to an end.
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage.zh-tw={0}已經從瘋狂的殺戮衝動中清醒。
MentalStateDef.beginLetter.zh-tw={0}發瘋似的攻擊他所見到的任何人。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0}'s manhunting bloodlust has come to an end.
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage.zh-tw=已經從瘋狂的殺戮衝動中清醒。
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} is no longer fleeing in panic.
MentalStateDef.beginLetter={0} has broken down and is wandering around confused.

MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} is no longer hiding in HIS room.
