MentalStateDef.beginLetter={0} is wandering around in sadness.
MentalStateDef.recoveryMessage={0} is no longer wandering in sadness.
NeedDef.description=Beauty reflects how visually pleasing a person has found their surroundings recently.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=美观度反映了人物最近感受的周围环境的视觉愉悦程度。你可以在右下角勾选「开关美观度显示」，来查看鼠标所在位置的平均美观度。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=美觀度顯示這名角色周遭環境的美觀程度。
NeedDef.description=Because of an alcohol addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于酒精成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色已對酒精產生依賴性，因此必須經常使用此藥物以避免戒斷症狀。
NeedDef.description=Because of an ambrosia addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于仙馐果成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=Because of an ambrosia addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description=Because of a go-juice addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于活力水成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色已對能量果飲產生依賴性，因此必須經常使用此藥物以避免戒斷症狀。

NeedDef.description=This person's body is enhanced by luciferium mechanites.

Without regular doses of luciferium, the mechanites will lose cohesion. If this happens, the user becomes continuously, violently insane and eventually dies.

This addiction never goes away.

NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于躯体曾经过路西法合剂纳米机械强化，此人需要持续服用路西法合剂。

如果没有及时服用剂量合适的路西法合剂，会导致纳米机械失调，之后宿主大脑会不断受损发狂最终死亡。

路西法合剂的成瘾性不会消失。

NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色的身體能力已被路西法強化劑的藥效強化，

一旦中斷服用路西法強化劑，成癮者體內的能量將會喪失凝聚力，一旦狀況真的演變至此，成癮者會進入長時間持續的狂暴狀態直到死亡。

路西法強化劑的成癮性是不可消除的。
NeedDef.description=Because of a psychite addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于精神药物成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色已對精神藥物產生依賴性，因此必須經常使用此藥物以避免戒斷症狀。
NeedDef.description=Because of a developed Smokeleaf dependence, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于大麻成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色已對捲菸產生依賴性，因此必須經常使用此藥物以避免戒斷症狀。
NeedDef.description=Because of an wake-up addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=由于清醒丸成瘾，此人需要持续服用成瘾品以避免产生戒断反应。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=此角色已對醒神劑產生依賴性，因此必須經常使用此藥物以避免戒斷症狀。
NeedDef.description=Comfort is gained by sitting in or sleeping on comfortable furniture.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=舒适度可以通过坐在或睡在舒适的家具上获得。当殖民者从事长期工作比如雕塑和研究时，建议你给工作台配张好的沙发。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=舒適度取決於有沒有舒適的家具能夠使用。
NeedDef.description=Food is the amount of nutrition a creature has consumed recently. If it is at zero, a creature will become increasingly malnourished and eventually die.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=饮食值表示了生物最近吃下的营养物的多少。当食物值为零时，生物会逐渐地营养不良直至死亡。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=食物值顯示這名角色或生物的飽足程度，如果數值降為0，這名角色或生物便會不斷受到飢餓傷害。
NeedDef.description=Joy represents the need to do something pleasurable from time to time. Note that repeating the same kind of activity makes it less effective in gaining joy.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=娱乐值表示需要不定期做的愉快事情。请注意，不断重复同样的活动使得获得娱乐值减少。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=娛樂值顯示這名角色的娛樂需求。總是進行同樣的娛樂活動會降低娛樂的效果。

NeedDef.description=Mood represents how happy or stressed someone is. If mood gets too low, the person may suffer a mental break. There are several categories of mental breaks, of differing severities.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=心情值表示了人心理的快乐或紧张程度。当心情值太低时，人可能会精神崩溃。心情较高时还能提高全局工作速度。精神崩溃根据严重程度不同被分为几类。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=心情值顯示這名角色有多麼快樂或多麼難過，如果心情值過低，便有可能發生精神崩潰。
NeedDef.description=Rest is how much sleep a creature has gotten recently.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=休息值表示了生物最近有多少睡眠。休息不足不但会让人头脑不清，还会会严重影响心情。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=休息值顯示這名角色或生物的疲勞程度。
NeedDef.description=Space reflects a sense of being physically free and able to move around. It is harmed by spending extended periods in cramped rooms.
NeedDef.description.zh-cn=空间表示了所处环境所能够四处走动的自由程度。长时间在狭小的房间里会严重影响心情。建议你加宽走廊，扩大餐厅和工作室。
NeedDef.description.zh-tw=寬敞度反映了周遭環境是否寬敞通暢。
PawnColumnDef.headerTip=Follow master while the master is drafted.
PawnColumnDef.headerTip.zh-tw=Follow master while the master is drafted.
PawnColumnDef.headerTip=Follow master while the master is doing field work (hunting or taming animals).
PawnColumnDef.headerTip.zh-cn=当主人从事野外活动（狩猎或驯服动物）时跟随主人。
PawnColumnDef.headerTip.zh-tw=Follow master while the master is doing field work (hunting or taming animals).
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly=They are moving in to help you immediately.
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy=It looks like they want to use sappers to tunnel around your defenses.
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-cn=看来他们想用工程兵挖掘隧道来攻破殖民地的防御圈。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-tw=看來他們打算派出工兵破解你的防衛。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly=They are moving in to help you immediately.

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy=They are attacking immediately.

Watch out - they appear to be unusually clever with their tactics.

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-cn=他们会立即开始进攻。

注意：他们似乎异常聪明地采取了战术。

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-tw=他們會立即開始進攻。

請小心，這次的襲擊似乎有些不尋常。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly=It looks like they want to use siege tactics to help you.
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly.zh-cn=看来他们想用包围策略来支援你。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly.zh-tw=看來他們想用圍攻策略來援助你。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy=It looks like they want to besiege the colony and pound you with mortars from a distance. You can try to wait them out - or go get them.
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-cn=看来他们想包围你的殖民地，然后用迫击炮远远的轰炸殖民地，你可以等他们离开，或者去主动攻击他们。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly=They will prepare for a while before moving in to help you.
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly.zh-cn=他们会在支援你之前准备一段时间。
RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextFriendly.zh-tw=他們會在幫助你戰鬥之前準備一段時間。

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy=They will prepare for a while, then attack.

Prepare a defense or attack them pre-emptively.

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-cn=他们会准备一段时间，然后进攻。

准备好防御或是先发制人去攻击他们。

RaidStrategyDef.arrivalTextEnemy.zh-tw=他們會準備一段時間再進攻。

準備好防禦或是先發制人去攻擊他們。
RecipeDef.description=Makes a creature unconscious by administering an anesthetic.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=通过施用麻醉剂使生物失去知觉。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=透過麻醉使對象失去意識。
RecipeDef.description=Burn apparel to completely destroy it.
RecipeDef.description=Burn apparel to completely destroy it.
RecipeDef.description=Burn drugs to completely destroy them.
RecipeDef.description=Butchers a creature to obtain its meat in usable form.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=屠宰尸体以获取可用的肉。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=屠宰一個動物以獲取可食用的肉與毛皮。
RecipeDef.description=Disassembles a dead mechanoid into its component parts.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=拆解机械体以获取零部件。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將一個損壞的機器人拆解成零件。
RecipeDef.description=Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.

RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将生肉和素食材料组合，烹饪一份相对复杂的食物。

必须同时有肉食和素食。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=用肉和植物組合作為原料烹調一份相對複雜的料理。
RecipeDef.description=Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将生肉和素食材料组合，烹饪一份非常复杂的食物。大部分材料会被浪费。

必须同时有肉食和素食。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=用肉和植物組合作為原料烹調一份非常複雜精緻的料理。絕大多數原料會被浪費掉。
RecipeDef.description=Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用单种材料烹饪一份简单的食物。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=用一種原料烹調一份簡單的料理
RecipeDef.description=Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用单种材料烹饪一份简单的食物。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=用一種原料烹調一份簡單的料理
RecipeDef.description=Cooks a packaged survival meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将生肉和素食材料组合，烹饪一分包装生存食品。大部分材料会被浪费。

必须同时有肉食和素食。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=用肉和植物組合作為原料烹調一份生存食品包，許多營養值會被浪費掉。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-cn=正在烹饪包装生存食品。
RecipeDef.description=Cremate a corpse to completely destroy it.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=把尸体火化以将其摧毁。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將屍體火化以完全摧毀它。
RecipeDef.description=Use heat to destroy unwanted weapons. Faster than smelting, and works on non-smeltable items, but yields no resources.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用强热销毁不想要的武器。比熔炼快，用于不可熔炼的物品，但不产出资源。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=利用高溫將不需要的武器銷毀。速度比熔煉武器更快，並可以銷毀無法熔煉的武器，但無法提煉任何資源。
RecipeDef.label.zh-tw=從金屬碎片中提煉金屬
RecipeDef.description=Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from slag chunks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用强热和电磁铁从钢渣块中提炼出有用的金属。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=利用高溫和電磁鐵將有用的金屬從金屬碎片中提煉出来。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-tw=從金屬碎片中提煉金屬。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=设计复杂的、使用玻璃钢强化的轻型作战头盔。抵抗钝器类武器不太有效。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一顶突出了轻都市、富贵风格的好看的帽子。提升社交影响力。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件好看的、带有纽扣的有领衬衫。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=时髦、粗狂，这顶风格独特的帽子可以为你遮风挡雨，而且带上它的人显得特别有魅力。西部风格着装中最重要的部分。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件长型的防尘大衣，用于沙漠中阻隔阳光、炎热和沙尘。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件坚固的夹克，可以避免擦伤和刮伤，以及在寒冷天气中保持温暖。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件厚重的风雪大衣，即使在最寒冷的温度中也能保持温暖。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=来自先进的闪耀世界行星的动力装甲，通常装备于突击部队。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=动力装甲套装中的一部分，一般装备于重步兵。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=製造一頂動力裝甲頭盔。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一个单人用的能量护盾装置。它能阻挡从一定距离外射来的任何高速运动弹头或能量攻击。但对近战攻击或零距离贴近射击无效。同时也会阻碍穿戴者从内往外的射击。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=提供一定利器攻击防护的简易头盔。抵抗钝器类武器不太有效。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=自动防御烟幕。一旦穿戴者被子弹击中，会释放出厚厚的烟雾云，提供视线遮挡以及防止被炮塔锁定。一次性用品。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件用原始工具制成的衣物。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种柔软、厚实的帽子。非常适合在冬季中保持温暖。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一件在胸口和背部插有装甲板的背心。抵御枪械火力。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一把强力的长弓，射出远距离的重箭。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一把简单的短弓，制作技艺精湛，但是科技水平非常原始。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种薄薄的原料，抽起来会让人精神愉悦，这种东西非常便于制作，有着极强的成瘾性。

RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种合成的作战用药剂，研制用于在早期的行星间战斗中提供给太空陆战队员服用。活力水能够屏蔽服用者的痛觉同时能够提升近战和射击技能。它还能够提升移动速度

但是发明它的军事化学家们却无法消除它的成瘾性。有些人认为这是个缺点，而有些人却认为这是个优点。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=古老的制式军用武器，用于野外或城市作战。三连发射击。射程远，威力较低，高射速。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=古老模式的栓动式步枪。良好射程和威力，射速低。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-cn=正在制作制作栓动步枪。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=弹匣供弹全自动霰弹枪。射程短并且精度非常低，但极具威胁性。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=发射高能电荷弹的步枪。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一把小巧的、泛口径的枪械。射程很短，但着弹点集中、操作性好。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=製造一把重型重型衝鋒槍。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=燃烧弹发射器。可以用来放火。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=製造一把燃燒彈發射器。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种微型冲锋枪。射程短，威力低，但是射速很高。瞄准和开火都非常迅速敏捷。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种多管机枪，极其高的射速。由机械族制作，设计时就没考虑到让人类手持射击。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=样式古老的半自动手枪。火力和射程很弱但是迅速灵敏。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=很古老的设计，杀伤力很强，但是射程很短。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=样式古老的军用狙击步枪。栓动式。射程很远，极高的精确度和威力。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=医疗人员用医药来治疗病人和伤员。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=人类最古老的武器，一根整过形的棍子。棍子的一头较重，用于将敌人击打致死。原始而有效。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种样式古老的短剑。劈砍或戳刺都非常有效。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=人类最古老的武器之一，匕首既是日常工具也是致命武器。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一般由国王拥有的古老武器，长剑可以用来劈砍或戳刺，在合适的人的手里非常致命。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一根精致的棍棒，在挥舞和杀伤上有特别的设计。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种自制的长得像匕首的武器。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种长柄武器，一端带有用于近战中戳刺敌人的尖头。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一捆投矛，投掷出去后就无法重新回收使用。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=由一块汽车大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=由一块成人大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=由一块躯干大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=大麻叶卷成的烟卷。这种烟卷会让人兴奋，但是也会成瘾，减缓使用者的注意力和行动速度，长期使用会产生药物依赖。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种成瘾性极强的兴奋剂，清醒丸能够强化使用者的认知能力，使得服用者在短时期内工作时更加集中，忘记疲劳。但是药物成瘾后会使得精神受损，有时还会导致精神崩溃。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种精细的白色粉末，用鼻子吸入后可以使人高度兴奋，服用者会精神倍增并且能够抑制疼痛。但是却极易成瘾。
RecipeDef.label.zh-cn=用有机物制作化合燃料
RecipeDef.label.zh-tw=以有機物提煉化合燃料
RecipeDef.description=Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting biofuel from organic feedstocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=通过从有机原料中提取生物燃料以制作一组化合燃料。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=以有機物生產生質燃料再提煉出化合燃料。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-cn=正在从有机物中提炼化合燃料。
RecipeDef.description=Make a batch of chemfuel by gasifying wood logs.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=通过气化原木以制作一组化合燃料。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=氣化木頭原料以提煉化合燃料。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-cn=正在从木材中提炼化合燃料。
RecipeDef.description=Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用肉和植物原料制作动物粗饲料。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=混和生肉和作物製成動物飼料。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=生產迫擊砲專用的砲彈。
RecipeDef.description=Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种由肉食和素食混合脱水制成的食物。味道平平。无需冷藏即能保存很长时间。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=混合肉類、作物製作的乾燥加工食品，雖稱不上美味，但可以於常溫存放一年以上。
RecipeDef.description=Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=一种由肉食和素食混合脱水制成的食物。味道平平。无需冷藏即能保存很长时间。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=混合肉類、作物製作的乾燥加工食品，雖稱不上美味，但可以於常溫存放一年以上。
RecipeDef.description=Cuts rock chunks into usable stone blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将岩石块切割成可用的石块。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將石頭加工成有用的石材。
RecipeDef.description=Cuts granite chunks into usable blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将花岗岩块切割成可用的砖块。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將石塊製成花崗岩石材。.
RecipeDef.description=Cuts limestone chunks into usable blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将石灰岩块切割成可用的砖块。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將石塊製成石灰岩石材。
RecipeDef.description=Cuts marble chunks into usable blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将大理石块切割成可用的砖块。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=將石塊製成大理石石材。
RecipeDef.description=Cuts sandstone chunks into usable blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将砂岩块切割成可用的砖块。
RecipeDef.description=Cuts slate chunks into usable blocks.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=将板岩块切割成可用的砖块。
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=使用啤酒花制作麦芽汁。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=以啤酒花作為主要原料製作麥汁。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=拆下機器人的組成部位。
RecipeDef.jobString.zh-cn=正在移除机械身体部件。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=完全關閉機器人的系統。
RecipeDef.description=Use heat and strong electromagnets to break down weapons into useful resources.
RecipeDef.description.zh-cn=用强热和电磁铁将武器分解成有用的金属。
RecipeDef.description.zh-tw=利用高溫和電磁鐵將有用的金屬從武器中提煉出来。
RecordDef.description=The number of animals I have slaughtered.
RecordDef.description=The number of animals I have tamed.
RecordDef.description=The number of artifacts I have activated.
RecordDef.description=The number of bodies I have stripped.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=我剥光的尸体和伤员的数量。
RecordDef.description=The number of cells I have mined out.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=我开采矿石的单元格数。
RecordDef.description=The number of containers I have opened.
RecordDef.description=The number of corpses I have buried.
RecordDef.description=The amount of damage I have dealt.
RecordDef.description=The amount of damage I have taken.
RecordDef.description=The number of fires I have extinguished.
RecordDef.description=The number of headshots I have made.
RecordDef.description=The number of creatures I have killed.
RecordDef.description=The number of animals I have killed.
RecordDef.description=The number of humanlike characters I have killed.

RecordDef.description=The amount of nutrition I have eaten.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=我吃掉的营养膏食品数量。
RecordDef.description=How many medical operations I have performed.
RecordDef.description=How many times I have been medically operated on.

RecordDef.description=How many times I have chatted with a prisoner.

RecordDef.description=The number of things I have uninstalled.
RecordDef.description=Total time spent as a colonist.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=作为一名殖民者所度过的总时间。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent as a prisoner.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=作为一名囚犯所度过的总时间。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent constructing and deconstructing.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=建造和拆除花费的总时间。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent on finding food and eating.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=寻找食物和吃饭的总时间。
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=处理动物花费的总时间。
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=搬运物品花费的总时间。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent in a bed.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=在床上所度过的总时间。
RecordDef.label=time in a bed for medical reasons
RecordDef.description=Total time spent in a bed for medical reasons: awaiting treatment, recovering from injuries or being operated on.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=因医疗原因而在床上所度过的总时间：等待治疗、创伤恢复或者接受手术等。
RecordDef.description.zh-tw=因各種健康因素而臥床的時間：等待治療、養病或接受手術。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent in mental state.
RecordDef.description.zh-tw=處於精神崩潰狀態的時間。
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=开采矿石所花费的总时间。
RecordDef.description=How many times I have suffered a mental break.
RecordDef.description.zh-tw=我精神崩潰狀態的次數。
RecordDef.description=How many times I have been on fire.
RecordDef.description=Total time spent sowing, harvesting and cutting plants.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=播种、收获、收割的总时间。
RecordDef.description=How many medical treatments I have given.
RecordDef.description.zh-tw=我執行醫療行為的次數。
RecordDef.description=How many times I have received medical treatment.
RecordDef.description.zh-tw=我接受醫療照顧的次數。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent treating and feeding patients.
RecordDef.description.zh-cn=照顾和喂食花费的总时间。
RecordDef.description=Total time spent under a roof.
RecordDef.description=The number of traps I have rearmed.
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build air conditions to cool rooms in the heat, or to keep freezers.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造空调，炎热时给房间降温，或维持冷冻库的低温。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build autodoors which open to permit movement without slowing anyone down.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「自动门」，人通过时不会被减速。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造自動門，使人通過門時不需減速。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「蓄电池」以储存电力。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造能夠儲存電力的電池。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build a brewery to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「酿造台」。将啤酒花酿成美味的啤酒。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=讓你可以建造釀酒工作台，將啤酒花釀造成美味的啤酒。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to build carpets to increase the quality of their environments.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「地毯」，用来提升居住环境的品质。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民製作地毯来改善環境。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Understand the secrets of pulse-charged energy/projectile munitions. Allows you to build the charge rifle.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=研究采用脉冲充能的高能能量弹药的秘密。解锁制作「电荷步枪」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=理解能量脈衝彈藥的秘密，解鎖生產光束步槍。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造装饰性的彩色落地灯。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民製作裝飾性的彩色燈。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Sew complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=缝制复杂的服饰，比如裤子、防尘大衣、牛仔帽等。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖部落生產複雜的衣物，如褲子、大衣以及牛仔帽。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build the Component Assembly Bench, where colonists can make components from simple materials.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「零部件装配台」，用于将简单的材料加工成零部件。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造電子零件生產台，讓居民只需要簡單的原料就能夠生產電子零件。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of suspended animation.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「低温休眠舱」，可使其内的生命体进入生理上的暂停状态。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民建造冷凍休眠艙，可讓其中的生物進入冷凍休眠狀態。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build deep drills for extracting resources from deep underground. You'll need a ground-penetrating scanner to find the resources.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=允许你建造「深钻井」，来开采深埋在地表之下的资源。你必须先用地质扫描仪来进行勘探。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造採掘機，可以從地下深處開採礦物。你需要礦脈聲納才能找出礦物位置。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields a valuable plant fiber.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁种植「恶魔菇」，一种生长非常缓慢的蘑菇，可提取得到贵重的织物：魔菇布。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖種植魔鬼菇，生長緩慢，但可以收穫相當珍貴的植物纖維布料。
ResearchProjectDef.description=The basics of drug preparation and synthesis. Allows creation of the drug lab. Further research is required to make specific drugs.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=成瘾品制备与合成的基础技术。允许建造药物实验台。需要进一步研究以制作特定的成瘾品。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=製造藥物的前提科技，解鎖建造藥物合成台，需要進一步研究才能實際製造藥物。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「电力火化炉」，可焚烧尸体和无用的衣物。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造能將屍體與衣物徹底燒毀的火化爐。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Generate and use electricity for cooking and other simple tasks.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=研究如何发电，并将电力用于烹饪和其他简单的作业。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖部落使用電力及各類用電設備。

ResearchProjectDef.description=Build electric smithy and smelters.

The electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.

ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「电力锻造台」和「电熔炼器」。

电力锻造台不需要燃料。电熔炼器用高温和强磁从钢块渣和其他物品中提炼有用的金属。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造金屬提煉器。金屬提煉器可以透過高溫和電磁鐵將金屬碎片中有用的金屬提煉出來。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows the construction of firefoam poppers; fire-safety buildings which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「泡沫灭火器」，一种消防设备，感应到火焰时喷出大量的能扑灭火灾的泡沫。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造泡沫滅火裝置，一種可以噴出大量泡沫以滅火的設備。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「地热发电机」，建造在蒸汽间歇喷泉上，提供不间断的电力。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖你在蒸氣間歇泉上建造地熱發電機，一種源源不絕的電力來源。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to produce the synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug go-juice.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=学会制作这种名为「活力水」的合成的战斗增强兴奋剂。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=研究如何製造複合型戰鬥能力強化藥物。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build ground-penetrating scanners that can detect drillable resources deep under the surface.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=允许你建造「地质扫描仪」，来勘探可用深钻井开采的地底资源。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造礦脈聲納，可探測位在地底的可採掘礦物資源。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows the production of automated gun turrets.
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「医疗床」，提高医疗工作的质量和成功率。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造醫療床，在醫療床上可增加醫療工作成功的機率。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「水栽培植物盆」，在室内快速种植作物，不受土壤贫瘠和室外天气的影响。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造水培設施以在室內進行快速種植。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to build improvised explosive device-based traps from mortar shells.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「爆炸陷阱」，以迫击炮炮弹为材料制作的简易爆炸装置。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民用砲彈製造一種爆裂性的地雷裝置。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from mortar shells.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「燃烧陷阱」，以迫击炮炮弹为材料制作的简易燃烧爆炸装置。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民用砲彈製造一種會炸出火焰的地雷裝置。

ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows the construction of long-range mineral scanners which automatically detect precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which the scanners were built).

The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles.

Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.

ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「远距离矿物扫描仪」，可自动探测附近区域（非扫描仪所在区域）的稀有矿物，比如黄金或翡翠。

半径30格地图内，发现矿物块的频率为平均每30天一次。

在同一区域内或临近区域建造多于一个扫描仪对效率影响不大。

ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=Allows the construction of long-range mineral scanners which automatically detect precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which the scanners were built).

The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles.

Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery or disassemble dead mechanoids.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「机械加工台」，用于制作枪支和机械，或者拆解死亡的机械体获得高级的材料。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造能將損壞的機器人拆解為有用金屬的設備。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Produce medicine from herbal medicine, neutroamine, and cloth.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=将草药、中性胺和布制成「医药」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造製藥實驗桌，能夠從藥草、中性胺與衣物中提煉成分製成藥物。

ResearchProjectDef.description=The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench, comms console, and other research projects like tube televisions, and cryptosleep caskets.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=用精密复杂的电子进行工作的基础。解锁建造「高级研究台」、「通讯台」，以及其他研究项目，比如「显像管电视」、「低温休眠舱」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=更加精密，更加複雜的電子技術。解鎖建造高科技研究桌、通訊台，和新的研究計劃。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows the construction of moisture pumps, which turn wet ground dry.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「排水泵」，一种能将潮湿土地变干的装置。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造排水泵，一種能將潮濕土地乾燥化的裝置。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「迫击炮」，可越过墙抛射炮弹，射程非常远。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造能夠將炮彈拋過牆壁的重炮。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to build multi-analyzers which increase research speed, and allow higher-level research projects, if placed near a research bench.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「多元分析仪」，提高研究速度，以及解锁更高级的研究项目，必须建造在高级研究台旁。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造多重分析裝置，可用來加快研究速度、解鎖更高階的科技。必須安裝在高科技研究桌附近。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「营养膏合成机」，能自动将生食高效地合成为营养膏。用于应对食物短缺。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造營養膏生產機，可自動將原料製成營養膏。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to produce packaged survival meals, a preserved and sealed food that never goes bad. Great for traveling.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁生产「包装生存食品」，密封储存且不会变质的食品。非常适合用于旅行中。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=Learn to produce packaged survival meals, a preserved and sealed food that never goes bad. Great for traveling.
ResearchProjectDef.description=Make passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=允许殖民者建造「蒸发制冷器」，一种不需要通电即可降温的工具。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造簡易冷卻器，一種用於室內，不需電力的設備。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁制作「干肉饼」，由肉食和素食混合制成，保质期很长。居家旅行必备。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖居民用肉類和作物製作肉餅，一種不易變質，可長期存放的食品。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=学会制作「佩诺西林」，一种疾病防治药物。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=研究如何製造盤諾沙林，一種能夠預防疾病的藥物。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Neuro-memetic robotics and advanced plasteel weaving technologies allow you to build the power armor and power armor helmets.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=神经元机械和先进的玻璃钢加工技术，解锁制作「动力装甲」和「动力头盔」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=神經機械和先進的塑鋼塑形技術解鎖你生產動力裝甲以及動力裝甲頭盔。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric drug psychite.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=允许殖民者对精神叶进行精炼，制作「薄片」和「呀呦粉」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=研究從迷幻草中提煉成分的技術，用來製成薄片及Y他命，兩種不同的精神藥物。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build refineries to make chemfuel from wood.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=建造精炼设备用于从木材提炼「化合燃料」。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造煉油器，可從木頭中提煉化合燃料。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Momentum-repulsion field technology allows you to build shield belts, which block ranged attacks coming in or going out.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=动能排斥立场技术让你能够制作「护盾腰带」，可阻挡远程攻击，包括从外向内和从内向外的。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=排斥力場技術讓你能夠生產護盾腰帶，可以阻隔來自護盾內外的遠程攻擊。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to start researching more advanced shipbuilding technologies and eventually build a ship to escape the planet.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁研究更多高级的飞船建造技术，最终能够建造出载人逃离这个星球的飞船。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖你研究更多關於建造星艦的科技以建造一艘逃離這個星球的星艦。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows coercing an existing AI persona into a usable AI computer core for ship guidance.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁强制将现有的AI伪人格核心装入用于飞船导航的人工智能电脑核心中。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖你將一個已經存在的AI系統裝入一個用於導航星艦的電腦核心裡。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to construct ship cryptosleep caskets for transporting cryptosleeping colonists between the stars.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「飞船低温休眠舱」，用于星际交通中殖民者休眠。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=允许你建造用於星際旅行的休眠艙。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to construct an engine for a ship.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖你使用反物質牽制核心來建造一個反物質推進器。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to build a reactor to power a ship.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁使用反物质约束核心建造用于给飞船提供动力的反应炉。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖你使用反物質牽制核心來建造一個可以驅動整艘星艦的反應堆。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build smithies for crafting metal weapons and tools.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「锻造台」，将金属打造成武器和工具。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=用來鍛造金屬武器和工具的工作台。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Learn to build smokepop belts which can provide an automatic defensive smokescreen.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁制作「烟罐腰带」，可提供自动防御烟幕。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖煙霧腰帶，能夠自動產生一道煙霧障壁保護使用者。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build solar panels for electrical generation.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「太阳能板」，用于发电。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造太陽能發電板，能在陽光下產生電力。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「切石桌」，将岩石堆切成可用的石块。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造石材加工桌，可以用來將沒用的石頭加工成有用的石材並可用於建築。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to launch people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=建造可发射的「运输舱」，可以远距离发射你的人和物资越过行星表面。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造次行星軌道運輸艙，讓你能夠快速進行長距離的人員及物資輸送。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows the production of tube televisions.
ResearchProjectDef.description=Allows colonists to build vitals monitors which increase patients treatment quality if placed next to medical beds.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=解锁建造「生命体征监测仪」，将其放在医疗床旁，提高病人的治疗质量。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=解鎖建造生命體徵檢測器，可增加醫療效果，必須安裝在醫療床旁邊。
ResearchProjectDef.description=Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug.
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-cn=学会制作「清醒丸」，清醒丸可以延长殖民者的工作时间，使其忘却疲劳，但是带有一些副作用。
ResearchProjectDef.description.zh-tw=研究如何生產醒神劑，一種能強化工作能力的藥物。

ScenarioDef.description=The three of you awake in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
ScenarioDef.description.zh-cn=你们三人在刺耳的警报声与金属碎裂声中从低温休眠舱内醒来，然后勉强在飞船四分五裂前钻进了逃生舱内。随后不久，你们降落到了这个充满未知的边缘世界上。

ScenarioDef.description.zh-tw=你們三人在休眠艙休眠時突然被警報和金屬的撕裂聲吵醒。你們好不容易在星艦分解成碎片之前逃到了逃生艙。

不久，你們降落在了這個未知邊緣世界上。

當星艦殘骸還在你們身邊不斷墜毀時，你們已經開始在思考生存的計畫了。
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary=Three crashlanded survivors - the classic RimWorld experience.
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-cn=三名迫降生还者 - RimWorld经典的开局模式。
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-tw=三名星艦事故的倖存者 - 經典RimWorld體驗。

ScenarioDef.scenario.description=The three of you awake in your cryptosleep sarcophagi to the sound of sirens and ripping metal. You barely get to the escape pods before the ship is torn apart. Some time later, you land on this unknown rimworld.
ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-cn=你们三人在刺耳的警报声与金属碎裂声中从低温休眠舱内醒来，然后勉强在飞船四分五裂前钻进了逃生舱内。随后不久，你们降落到了这个充满未知的边缘世界上。
ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-tw=你們三人在休眠艙休眠時突然被警報和金屬的撕裂聲吵醒。你們好不容易在星艦分解成碎片之前逃到了逃生艙。不久之後，你們降落在了這個未知邊緣世界上。

ScenarioDef.description=Your tribe was destroyed by the great blood machines sent by the gods. Five of you managed to escape. Now, it's time to build up a new home.

Note: Since you'll start poor and research slowly, this is a difficult scenario.

ScenarioDef.description.zh-cn=神明派出大量极度残暴的机械体毁灭了你的部落。你们五人死里逃生。现在是时候建造一个新的家园了。

注意：你的开局会很穷并且研究很慢，这是个高难度的剧本。
ScenarioDef.description.zh-tw=你的部落遭到神明無情的摧毀，只有你們五人從屠殺中僥倖逃脫。現在，是時候建立一個新家了。
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary=Five lost tribespeople attempt to rebuild. Difficult.
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-cn=五个幸存的部落人顽强重建家园。高难度。
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-tw=與五名部落遺民合力建立新家園。

ScenarioDef.scenario.description=Your tribe was destroyed by the great blood machines sent by the gods. Five of you managed to escape. Now, it's time to build up a new home.

Note: Since you'll start poor and research slowly, this is a difficult scenario.

ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-cn=神明派出大量极度残暴的机械体毁灭了你的部落。你们五人死里逃生。现在是时候建造一个新的家园了。

注意：你的开局会很穷并且研究很慢，这是个高难度的剧本。
ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-tw=你的部落遭到神明降下的殺戮機器無情的蹂躪，只有你們五人從屠殺中僥倖逃脫。現在，是時候建立一個新家了。

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.14.text=The gods were very angry. The blood machines came at night. They swept through your village, cutting and burning your people with their blades and devil-fire.

Only a few of you escaped. Now, after a harrowing journey on foot, with no close friends to turn to, you must build a new home in the wilderness, like your ancestors did.

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.14.text.zh-cn=神，非常愤怒。血腥的机械体在漆黑的夜晚降临。他们席卷了你的村庄，用他们的镰刃收割着生命，用他们的魔焰焚烧着大地。

你们中只有少数几人逃了出来。现在，经过了悲痛的旅程后，无依无靠，你们必须像你的祖先那样，在荒野中建设你们的家园。

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.14.text.zh-tw=神明非常憤怒。殺戮機器降臨的那個夜晚，它們用刀刃掃蕩整個部落，用火焰焚燒你的同胞。

倖存的僅有你們幾人，而現在，經歷了一段艱辛的徒步旅程，在沒有其他盟友的幫助下，你必須在這片新的土地上建立新家園，如同你遙遠的先祖所做的一般。

ScenarioDef.description=People called you crazy for leaving your glitterworld home, but you always yearned to explore the stars - outside the neurosimulator. Now you're at the end of your long journey in cryptosleep, landing on an unknown rimworld to see what it's like.

Note: Since your starting character will lack some skills, this is an especially difficult scenario in the early game.

ScenarioDef.description.zh-cn=离开了你在闪耀世界的家，大家都说你疯了，但你一直渴望丢掉虚拟头盔，而在真正的星际间探险。现在你从漫长的低温休眠旅程中苏醒过来，降落在一个未知的边缘世界上，那就看看到底如何吧。

注意：你的初始角色会缺少部分技能，这是个在游戏早期特别高难度的剧本。
ScenarioDef.description.zh-tw=當你離開你閃耀世界的家，人們都認為你瘋了，但你嚮往著天上的星星，渴望真實的冒險，而不是全像模擬的虛假體驗。現在，經過了數十年漫長的宇宙航行，你從休眠艙中甦醒，降落在這片未知的邊緣世界上，冒險正在前方等待著你！
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary=One rich explorer out to experience the universe. Extra difficult.
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-cn=一个富有的探险家在宇宙中前所未有的经历。特别高难度。
ScenarioDef.scenario.summary.zh-tw=一名富有探險家的宇宙大冒險。

ScenarioDef.scenario.description=People called you crazy for leaving your glitterworld home, but you always yearned to explore the stars - outside the neurosimulator. Now you're at the end of your long journey in cryptosleep, landing on an unknown rimworld to see what it's like.

Note: Since your starting character will lack some skills, this is an especially difficult scenario in the early game.

ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-cn=离开了你在闪耀世界的家，大家都说你疯了，但你一直渴望丢掉虚拟头盔，而在真正的星际间探险。现在你从漫长的低温休眠旅程中苏醒过来，降落在一个未知的边缘世界上，那就看看到底如何吧。

注意：你的初始角色会缺少部分技能，这是个在游戏早期特别高难度的剧本。
ScenarioDef.scenario.description.zh-tw=當你離開你閃耀世界的家，人們都認為你瘋了，但你嚮往著天上的星星，渴望真實的冒險，而不是全像模擬的虛假體驗。現在，經過了數十年漫長的宇宙航行，你從休眠艙中甦醒，降落在這片未知的邊緣世界上，冒險正在前方等待著你！

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.12.text=The neurosimulations, holo-games, and free-orgies were never enough for you. You wanted more - the grit and consequence of real life, like they talk about in the history books. You wanted to know what real challenge and consequence feel like.

Now, after a journey of decades in cryptosleep, you're landing on this unknown rimworld. Real consequences await you.

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.12.text.zh-cn=无论是神经模拟器、全息游戏，还是放纵的酒会都无法满足你，你想要的更多，你想感受人生的坎坷和因果机缘，就像历史书里描述的那样。你希望了解真正的挑战与后果是什么。

而此刻，经过了数十年的低温休眠，你降落在了这片未知的边缘世界上。真实的挑战正等待着你。

ScenarioDef.scenario.parts.12.text.zh-tw=神經模擬、全像遊戲和無盡的宴會從來不能滿足你，你渴望更多關於勇氣與奮鬥的真實生活。如同歷史書所記述的，你希望知道真正的挑戰與奮鬥是什麼感覺。

現在，經過了數十年漫長的宇宙航行，你從休眠艙中甦醒，降落在這片未知的邊緣世界上，冒險正在前方等待著你！
ScenPartDef.description=Cannot sow plants on the ground.
SiteCoreDef.description.zh-cn=一个贵重物品的藏匿点。
SiteCoreDef.description=A location in the world which contains nothing special.
SiteCoreDef.description.zh-cn=世界中的一个位置，没有什么特殊的东西。
SiteCoreDef.description.zh-tw=A location in the world which contains nothing special.
SiteCoreDef.description=A mineable lump of precious resources.
SiteCoreDef.description.zh-tw=A mineable lump of precious resources.
SkillDef.description=Taming, training, managing, and controlling animals.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=驯服、训练、管理、控制动物。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=馴養、訓練、管理及控制動物。
SkillDef.description=Better constructors build structures and furniture faster and of higher quality.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=更好更快的建造结构和家具。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=能力越高的建築工能更快速的完成工作並達成更佳的品質。
SkillDef.description=Crafting general items including weapons and tools.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=制作一般物品，包括武器和工具。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=打造武器、裁縫衣物、加工石材。
SkillDef.description=Sowing, caring for, and harvesting crops.
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=播種、照護以及收穫作物。
SkillDef.description=Investigating evidence, making connections, calculating and using logic.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=调查取证、建立关联、计算以及使用逻辑。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=發掘證據、建立關聯、計算並運用邏輯。
SkillDef.description=Treating wounds and diseases and doing surgery.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=治疗伤口和疾病以及执行医疗手术。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=治療創傷、醫治疾病及操刀手術。
SkillDef.description=Use of all kinds of melee weapons as well as unarmed combat.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=使用各种类型的近战武器以及徒手战斗。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=各種搏擊武器的應用及徒手戰鬥。
SkillDef.description=Digging tunnels and extracting mineral or buried resources.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=挖掘隧道，开采矿产或埋藏资源。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=挖掘隧道、探採礦物與各種被埋藏的資源。
SkillDef.description=Use of all kinds of ranged weapons.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=使用各种类型的远程武器。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=各種射擊及投擲武器的應用。
SkillDef.description=Negotiating, convincing, manipulating, leading, and cheering up others.
SkillDef.description.zh-cn=谈判、说服、操纵、领导和激励其他人。
SkillDef.description.zh-tw=談判、說服、操縱、領導及鼓舞他人。
SpecialThingFilterDef.description=Allow dead former strangers and enemies.
SpecialThingFilterDef.description.zh-cn=允许死亡的陌生人和敌人的尸体。
SpecialThingFilterDef.description=Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
SpecialThingFilterDef.description.zh-cn=允许与未收割的植物一样的食物，像干草。
SpecialThingFilterDef.description=Allow organic things which have started to rot.
SpecialThingFilterDef.description.zh-cn=允许已经开始腐烂的有机物。
StatCategoryDef.label=Multipliers when equipment made of this
StatCategoryDef.label.zh-cn=以此材料制作的装备属性乘数
StatCategoryDef.label.zh-tw=以此素材製成裝備的效果倍率
StatCategoryDef.label.zh-cn=以此材料制作时属性乘数
StatCategoryDef.label.zh-cn=以此材料制作时属性偏移量
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在远距离范围内的精度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=在遠距離下的射擊命中率。
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在中等距离范围内的精度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=在中距離下的射擊命中率。
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在近距离范围内的精度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=在短距離下的射擊命中率。
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在贴近范围内的精度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=在貼身距離下的射擊命中率。
StatDef.description=How long it takes to strike after aiming.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=瞄准后开火所花费的时间。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=開火之前所必須耗費的瞄準時間。
StatDef.description=The speed at which this person milks, shears, and otherwise gathers resources from animals.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人挤奶、剪毛，以及其他从动物身上收集资源的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行諸如擠奶、剃毛等等收穫畜產的速度加成。
StatDef.description=The percentage yield someone receives when they shear, milk, or otherwise gather resources from a living animal. Higher percentages reduce the chance of wasting the product.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=剪毛、挤奶，或其他从活着的动物身上收集资源时会得到的百分比产出。更高的百分比将减少产物的浪费几率。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行諸如擠奶、剃毛等等從活的動物身上收穫資源時的產量加成。越高的倍率越能避免產品的浪費。
StatDef.description=Armor against blunt damage like club attacks, rock falls, and explosions.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=护甲抵御钝器伤害的几率，比如棍棒攻击、落石和爆炸。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=能防禦住鈍器攻擊的機率。如：錘擊、石塊與爆炸。
StatDef.description=Armor against electric damage like EMP pulses.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=护甲抵御电能伤害的几率，比如电磁脉冲（EMP）。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=能防禦住電磁相關傷害的機率。如：電磁脈衝。
StatDef.description=Armor against temperature-related damage like burns.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=护甲抵御温度相关伤害的几率，比如燃烧。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=能防禦住溫度相關傷害的機率。如：燃燒。
StatDef.description=Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=护甲抵御利器伤害的几率，比如子弹、刀剑穿刺，以及动物的抓咬。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=能防禦住利器攻擊的機率。如：子彈、刀劍與利牙。
StatDef.description=How enjoyable an object is to be around and look at.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=一个物品放在周围时给人视觉上的愉悦程度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這個物件能給周圍環境帶來的的美觀程度。
StatDef.description=How fast people sleeping on this gain rest.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在这上面休息的人恢复精力速度的系数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這張床所能提供的休息效率。
StatDef.description=Multiplier on damage with blunt attacks for items made of this material.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=这种材料所制作物品的钝器伤害的乘数。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person brews beer.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在酿造啤酒时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行釀造工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=Multiplier on the amount of meat produced when butchering flesh creatures.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在屠宰生物尸体时获得肉的数量乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行屠宰工作時的成品生產效率加成。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person butchers flesh creatures.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在屠宰生物尸体时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行屠宰工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=Multiplier on the amount of materials yielded when this person disassembles a dead mechanoid.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在拆解机械体尸体时获得材料的数量乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行拆解工作時的成品生產效率加成。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person can disassemble a mechanoid.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在拆解机械体尸体时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行拆解工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=The amount of stuff this creature can carry in its hands, mouth, or other manipulators.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=这个角色用手、嘴或其他机械装置携带的物品的数量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這個單位能夠同時搬運的最大數量。
StatDef.description=How comfortable an object is to sit or lay on.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=一个物品在被坐上或躺下时给人的舒适程度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=坐或躺在這個物件上的舒適程度。
StatDef.description=Above this temperature, characters will be unhappy. Significantly above this temperature, they will develop heatstroke and eventually die.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=高于这个温度，角色会不开心。大幅高于这个温度时，角色可能会中暑甚至死亡。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當溫度高於此標準，角色的心情值將會降低。若氣溫遠高於此標準，會導致角色中暑甚至死亡。
StatDef.description=Below this temperature, characters will be unhappy. Significantly below this temperature, they will develop hypothermia and frostbite and eventually die.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=低于这个温度，角色会不开心。大幅低于这个温度时，角色会得低温症、冻伤甚至死亡。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當溫度低於此標準，角色的心情值將會降低。若氣溫遠低於此標準，會導致角色體溫過低、凍傷，甚至死亡。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person constructs and repairs buildings.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在建造与修理建筑物时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行生產工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=The chance that this person will succeed in constructing something. Failing means wasting time and resources.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人建造时的成功几率。失败意味着浪费时间和资源。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=The chance that this person will succeed in constructing something. Failing means wasting time and resources.
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person cooks meals.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在烹饪食物时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行烹飪工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=The rate at which this item deteriorates when left outside, in average hit points of damage per day. Things deteriorate faster than normal in some weather, like rain.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=放在室外时，物品的老化率，平均每天损失的耐久值。在某些天气下老化速度会比正常情况更快，比如雨天。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此物件暴露在室外時的衰敗速度，而在雨中會衰敗得更加快速。
StatDef.description=The speed at which the door opens.
StatDef.description=How fast this character produces drugs.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人制作药物和成瘾品的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色製作藥物的工作速度。
StatDef.description=The maximum energy a shield belt can have at one time. More energy can absorb more damage.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=护盾腰带所能拥有的能量最大值。更多的能量可以吸收更多的伤害。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=護盾腰帶能維持的最大能量值，越多的能量能夠抵禦更多的傷害。
StatDef.description=The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=只要护盾不破，护盾不断获得能量的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當護盾尚未被突破時每秒的能量補充值。
StatDef.description=How effectively this item entertains people and gives them joy.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=娱乐人们并增加快乐值的效果系数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此裝置娛樂人們的效果。

StatDef.description=The chance that this person will successfully repair a broken down building using a component. Failing means wasting time and resources. Note that this only applies to repairing breakdowns, which is different from repairing damage.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人成功地使用零部件修理损坏建筑的几率。失败意味着浪费时间和资源。注意此项仅应用于「损坏」，与修理「损伤」不同。

StatDef.description.zh-tw=The chance that this person will successfully repair a broken down building using a component. Failing means wasting time and resources. Note that this only applies to repairing breakdowns, which is different from repairing damage.
StatDef.description=How easily an object catches fire and how strongly it burns.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=一个物品被点燃的几率和燃烧的规模。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此物件的易燃程度與燃燒時的火焰強度。
StatDef.description=The probability that this character will inadvertently poison a meal they cook.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在烹饪食物时不经意间让饭菜有毒的几率。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色調理出有毒食物的機率。
StatDef.description=When this person gives gifts to another faction, this multiplier is applied to their impact on faction relations.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当此人在给其他派系送礼物时，对派系关系的实际影响的乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當該角色送出禮品給其他勢力時，這個倍率對禮品影響力的影響程度。
StatDef.description=Global learning efficiency for all skills.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=影响所有技能学习效率的全局学习系数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=角色對於學習所有技能的效率倍率。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this character gains immunity to diseases. If this is too slow, the character will die from a disease before developing immunity.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=这个角色对疾病产生免疫的速度。如果速度太慢，角色会在产生免疫之前死于疾病。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此角色在面對疾病與感染時形成免疫力的速度，如果免疫力形成的速度過慢，這名角色就會在免疫力形成之前病重而死。
StatDef.description=Immunity gain speed is multiplied by this value.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=免疫性获取速度会乘以此项的值。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=免疫力形成速度的速度倍率。
StatDef.description=How much this apparel offsets a wearer's minimum comfortable temperature when worn.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=对穿戴者最低舒适温度的修改偏移量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=裝備此裝備後能夠適應的最低氣溫加成。
StatDef.description=How much this apparel offsets a wearer's maximum comfortable temperature when worn.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=对穿戴者最高舒适温度的修改偏移量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=裝備此裝備後能夠適應的最高氣溫加成。
StatDef.description=The amount of leather you will get from butchering this creature.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=屠宰这种生物可获得皮革的数量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=屠宰此生物時可獲得的毛皮數量。
StatDef.description=The market value of an object. The actual trade price will be further modified by negotiation skill, relationship status, and other contextual factors.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=一个物品的市场价值。实际价格会受到派系关系和谈判技能的影响。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這個物件的市價。實際價格將會受到關係狀態與社交技能影響。
StatDef.description=The physical mass of an object.
StatDef.description=The maximum hit points of an object. This represents how much damage it can take before being destroyed.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=一个物品的最大生命值。意味着在被摧毁之前可以承受多少伤害。
StatDef.description=The amount of meat you will get from butchering this creature.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=屠宰这种生物可获得肉的数量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=屠宰此生物時可獲得的生肉數量。

StatDef.description=The likelihood that a character will succeed when attempting to perform an operation on a mechanoid. Failures can result in simple wasted time, or catastrophic damage to the subject.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当角色尝试对机械体执行改装时成功的可能性。改装出错时，轻则浪费时间，重则给对象带来灾难性的伤害。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色拆解機械時的成功率，拆解失敗的結果輕則白費時間，嚴重則可能使對象受到嚴重損害。
StatDef.description=Speed at which the character performs medical operations.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人执行医疗手术的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=角色在執行手術的速度。

StatDef.description=How effective this is when used to heal wounds and diseases, or do surgery. Higher medical potency improves the chances of a doctor treating wounds properly, and reduces the chances of failure during surgery.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=这个物品用于治疗伤口和疾病，或者进行手术时的效力。更高的医疗效力能提高治愈伤口的几率，并且降低手术过程中的事故几率。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=治療創傷、疾病或是執行手術時的效率。越高的醫療效率提升醫生治療傷口的機率，並降低在手術中發生失誤的機會。

StatDef.description=The likelihood that a character will succeed when attempting to perform a medical surgery. Failures can result in simple wasted time and medicine, or catastrophic damage to the patient. This base success chance is also affected by the facilities and medicine used in the operation, and the difficulty of the operation.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当角色尝试执行医疗手术时成功的可能性。手术出错时，轻则浪费时间和医药，重则给病人带来灾难性的伤害。此项基础几率还会受到手术中所使用的设备和医药，以及手术难度的影响。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此角色執行手術時的成功機率，輕微的失誤可能只需要花費更多時間與藥即可彌補，但重大的失誤可能帶給病人災難性的傷害。
StatDef.description=Quality of tending given to patients when acting as a doctor.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=作为一名医生时给予病人治疗的质量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=身為醫生能夠給予病人創傷的治療品質。
StatDef.description=Medical tend quality is offset by this value.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=医疗治疗质量根据此项的值偏移。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=進行醫療行為時的效果倍率。
StatDef.description=Speed at which the character tends to wounds and illnesses as a doctor.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=角色作为一名医生治疗伤患和病人的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=身為醫生處理傷勢、治療疾病時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=Chance to dodge a melee attack that would've otherwise hit. Characters will not dodge while aiming or firing a ranged weapon.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=闪避近身攻击或者其他物理击打的几率。（在瞄准时或使用远程武器开火时，角色无法进行闪避。）
StatDef.description.zh-tw=近身攻擊的迴避機率，但人物在瞄準或射擊時不會閃避。
StatDef.description=Average damage per second in melee combat. This stat ignores target defenses like dodging and armor.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=近战中每秒平均伤害。（未计算目标防御力，比如闪避和护甲。）
StatDef.description.zh-tw=肉搏戰鬥時平均每秒所能造成的傷害。
StatDef.description=Chance to hit a target in melee. The target can still dodge even if we hit.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在近身攻击中命中目标的基本几率。（即使击中，目标仍能闪避。）
StatDef.description.zh-tw=近身攻擊目標的基礎命中率。
StatDef.description=How long it takes to recover after striking with this as a melee weapon.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=近战武器在每次攻击之后所需要的恢复时间。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此近戰武器每次攻擊之間的冷卻時間。
StatDef.description=Damage done per hit in melee combat.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=近战中每次攻击造成的伤害。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此武器每次攻擊所能造成的傷害。
StatDef.description=As long as someone's mood is below this level, they are in danger of having a mental break.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当此人的心情低于这个值时，会有精神崩溃的风险。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當角色的心情值達到這個臨界值，他們就有精神崩潰的危險。
StatDef.description=This creature cannot be tamed, trained, or commanded by anyone with less than this skill in animals.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=如果驯兽技能小于这种动物所需的驯兽技能，将不能驯服、训练或命令这种动物。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=若馴養技能未高於此等級，將無法對此生物進行馴養、訓練或是任何形式的支配。
StatDef.description=A speed at which this person digs at walls and drills for deep resources.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在开采和钻取深层资源时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行採礦工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=The percentage yield a miner will achieve. This applies to both wall mining and deep drill mining. This doesn't affect the rate of mining rock chunks.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=矿工将达到的百分比产出。同时应用于资源块开采和深钻开采。不影响石块开采。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色採礦的產量加成。越高的倍率越能避免產品的浪費。此數值同時作用於地表開採及地下採礦。
StatDef.description=Speed of movement through the world in cells per second.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=每秒可通过的单元格数。斜向移动和水平垂直移动用时相同。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=角色移動時每秒鐘能夠穿越的地圖格數。
StatDef.description=The yield someone gets when harvesting plants. Low yields give a chance that this person will accidentally waste the harvest.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=收获植物时获取的产出。低产出会导致此人有一定几率意外地浪费收获物。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色收穫作物時的產量加成。效率越低的角色越有可能會收穫失敗而破壞作物。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person sows and harvests plants.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在种植与收获植物时的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行種植工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=Multiplier on the impact of psychic phenomena affecting this person.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=各类心灵事件对此人心情的影响的乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=干擾電波對該角色影響程度倍率。
StatDef.description=How long it takes to recover after firing this weapon.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=在每次射击之后所需要的恢复时间。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=此遠程武器每次攻擊之間的冷卻時間。
StatDef.description=Base chance this person will recruit a prisoner.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在招募囚犯时的基本几率。
StatDef.description=This person does research at this speed.
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行研究工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=Speed at which people do research is multiplied by this value.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=进行研究时的速度会乘以此项的值。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=進行研究工作時的速度倍率。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person sculpts. Note: Skill affects the quality of the sculptures created, but not the sculpting speed.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人进行雕刻工作时的速度。注意：技能影响产出雕塑的质量，但不影响雕刻速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行雕刻創作時的效率加成。
StatDef.description=A multiplier on the price at which you can sell items.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=你出售该物品时的价格乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=出售此物件時的售價倍率。
StatDef.description=Multiplier on damage with sharp attacks like cutting or stabbing for items made of this material.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=这种材料所制作的物品的利器伤害（切削/戳刺伤害）的乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=銳利攻擊(如：揮砍與突刺)的傷害加成。
StatDef.description=Base chance to not miss per square of shot distance.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=射击距离内的命中几率。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=對目標遠程射擊的基礎命中率。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person smelts things. Note: Since this is dumb labor, its speed is not affected by any skill.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人熔炼物品的速度。注意：由于这是粗苯的体力劳动，速度不会受到技能影响。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行金屬提煉工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person smiths or crafts weapons, machines, ammunition, and tools. Note: Skill affects the quality of the items created, but not the smithing speed.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人锻造制作武器、机械、零部件、弹药和工具的速度。注意：技能影响产出物品的质量，但不影响锻造速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行鍛造工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=The area obscured when a smokepop belt detonates.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=烟罐腰带触发后的遮蔽区域。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=煙霧腰帶發動時的屏蔽範圍。
StatDef.description=A multiplier on the speed at which this person smooths floors.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在打磨粗糙石面时的速度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行地面打磨工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=When this person interacts socially, this is how much the other person is affected.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当此人在进行社交时，其他角色所受到的影响程度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當該角色發揮社交能力時對其他人所造成的影響程度倍率。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person cuts rough stone into blocks.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人将岩堆切割成岩块的速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行石材加工工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=Speed at which this person makes clothes. Note: Skill affects the quality of the apparel created, but not the tailoring speed.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在进行缝制衣物工作时的速度。注意：技能影响产出衣物放质量，但不影响缝制速度。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行裁縫工作時的工作速度。
StatDef.description=Base chance this person will tame an animal.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在驯服动物时的基本几率。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=成功馴服動物的基礎機率，
StatDef.description=Multiplier on the impact of toxic buildup on this character.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=有毒尘埃对此人造成影响的乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色遭受毒素影響的速度倍率。
StatDef.description=When this person negotiates prices, buy and sell prices are improved by this percentage.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当此人在商议价格时，买卖价格改善的百分数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當該角色議價時，購買或售出貨品的價格將受到這個倍率影響。

StatDef.description=Base chance this person will make progress training an animal on a given attempt. The actual chance for a given attempt will also depend on the animal's wildness, whether it is bonded with the trainer, and so on.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在每次尝试训练动物时，取得进步的基本几率。实际几率还取决于动物的野性，不管是否与训练者有牵绊或者其他关系。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=進行動物訓練的基礎成功機率，實際成功機率是基於動物本身。
StatDef.description=How much damage this trap typically does. The actual damage may vary somewhat.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=触发陷阱所造成的伤害平均值。实际伤害可能有些不同。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這個陷阱大約能夠造成的傷害值，實際情況也許不同。
StatDef.description=The likelihood that the trap will spring when an unaware creature passes over it.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=当生物通过这个陷阱时触发生效的的可能性。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當生物通過這個陷阱的正上方時，陷阱被觸發的機率。
StatDef.description=A multiplier on someone's speed at doing any work.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=此人在做任何工作时的速度乘数。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=這名角色進行任何工作時的速度加成。
StatDef.description=Work speed is multiplied by this value.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=工作速度会乘以此项的值。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=進行工作時的速度倍率。
StatDef.description=The base amount of work it takes to build a structure, once all materials and tools are gathered.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=所有材料和工具齐全后建造这个建筑所需要的工作量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當所有的工具與素材齊全之後，建造這個物件所需的基本建造工作量。
StatDef.description=The base amount of work it takes to make this, once all materials and tools are gathered.
StatDef.description.zh-cn=所有材料和工具齐全后制作这个物品所需要的工作量。
StatDef.description.zh-tw=當所有的工具與素材齊全之後，製造這個物件所需的基本製造工作量。
StorytellerDef.description=Cassandra creates story events on a steadily-increasing curve of challenge and tension.
StorytellerDef.description.zh-cn=卡桑德拉创造的故事会变得越来越紧张，越来越有挑战性。
StorytellerDef.description.zh-tw=卡桑德拉創造的故事都以一個漸漸變陡的曲線變得越來越緊張有挑戰性。
StorytellerDef.description=Phoebe gives lots of time between disasters to relax and build your colony. But beware - at high difficulties, she'll hit as hard as anyone.
StorytellerDef.description.zh-cn=菲比在两次事件之间会给你相当宽裕的时间让你放松地经营殖民地。注意：如果你选择了较高的难度，她会和其他人一样残酷无情！
StorytellerDef.description.zh-tw=菲比不希望傷害任何人。她只喜歡講人們建造殖民地的輕鬆故事。所以她對待你的殖民地會非常友好的。
StorytellerDef.description=Randy doesn't follow rules. He'll generate random events, and he doesn't care if they make a story of triumph or utter hopelessness. It's all drama to him.
StorytellerDef.description.zh-cn=兰迪不遵守任何规矩。他会随机创造各种事件，而不管故事的结局是大获成功还是充满绝望。对他来说只是场戏。
StorytellerDef.description.zh-tw=蘭迪不遵守任何規則。他會隨機想出各種事件。不管這個故事是從頭到尾全是大勝利還是毫無希望的殘酷世界，對他來說都是一場好戲。

TerrainDef.description=Toe-hugging plush carpet in a cool blue color.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=带有蓝色并十分舒适的地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=帶有藍色並十分舒適的地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=看起来很专业的深灰色地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=看起來十分專業的深灰色地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=带有自然感觉的绿色地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=帶有自然感覺的綠色地毯。
TerrainDef.description=Plush carpet in a lovely rose hue.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=带有可爱玫瑰颜色的红色毛绒地毯。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=帶有可愛玫瑰顏色的红毛绒地毯。
TerrainDef.description=Quick-poured concrete. Fast to walk on, cheap, and very quick to pour, but quite ugly.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=迅速浇灌的混凝土。在上面走很迅速，但是比较难看。你需要把地面挖开才能浇灌混凝土。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=迅速澆灌的水泥。在上面行走很迅速，但外觀欠佳。
TerrainDef.description=Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=粗糙切割的岩石地砖。不太好看，但非常适合铺设道路和室外的走道。拆除石板无法回收资源。

TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=粗糙的天然大理石地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=崎嶇的天然大理石地面。
TerrainDef.label.zh-cn=粗糙砍凿的大理石地面
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=粗糙砍凿的天然大理石地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=打磨光滑的天然大理石地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=經打磨的光滑大理石地面。
TerrainDef.description=Metal tiles, for that spaceship look. Pretty, but labor and material-intensive.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=金属的地砖，拥有宇宙飞船般的外表。看起来很好看，就是铺设时的工作量和所用材料有点多。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=金屬的地磚，擁有星艦般的外觀。
TerrainDef.description=Utilitarian concrete tiles. Cheap and quick to move around on, but neutral in terms of looks and slow to build.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=实用的混凝土地砖。在上面走很迅速，但是地砖本身不是很好看，而且铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=實用的水泥地磚。在上面行走很迅速，外觀普通而鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=粗糙砍凿的天然砂岩地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=打磨光滑的天然砂岩地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=經打磨的光滑砂岩地面。
TerrainDef.description=Expensive and slow to build, but very pretty. Fits perfectly into luxurious rooms.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=造价昂贵且铺设缓慢，但非常漂亮。适合所有类型的豪华房间。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=價格高昂，鋪設費時，但是外觀相當華麗，奢華空間的絕配。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=粗糙砍凿的天然板岩地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=打磨光滑的天然板岩地面。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=經打磨的光滑板岩地面。
TerrainDef.description=Sterile tiles help keep the room clean. Very useful in hospitals to prevent patients from getting various infections. Neutral in terms of looks and very slow to build.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=无菌砖有助于保持房间清洁。对医疗室非常有用，可以防止患者受各种感染。美观度一般，铺设速度非常慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=無菌地磚可以保持房間的潔淨，鋪設在醫院空間可有效避免病人受到細菌感染。外觀普通而鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的石质地砖给人以城堡一样的感觉。看起来很漂亮，就是铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=擁有城堡感覺的石質地磚，外觀看起來還不錯，但鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的石质地砖给人以城堡一样的感觉。看起来很漂亮，就是铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=擁有城堡感覺的石質地磚，外觀看起來還不錯，但鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的石质地砖给人以城堡一样的感觉。看起来很漂亮，就是铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=擁有城堡感覺的石質地磚，外觀看起來還不錯，但鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的石质地砖给人以城堡一样的感觉。看起来很漂亮，就是铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=擁有城堡感覺的石質地磚，外觀看起來還不錯，但鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的石质地砖给人以城堡一样的感觉。看起来很漂亮，就是铺设速度较慢。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=擁有城堡感覺的石質地磚，外觀看起來還不錯，但鋪設相當耗時。
TerrainDef.description=Wood plank flooring. For that warm, homey feeling.
TerrainDef.description.zh-cn=木板做的地面，给人一种温馨的感觉。
TerrainDef.description.zh-tw=木板做的地面，给人一種溫馨的感覺。

ThingDef.description=A hyper-advanced computer core that houses a superhumanlike artificial intelligence. In its isolated state, the core is dormant. Installed in a proper support structure, however, it can become a mind of frightening power.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个极先进的电脑核心，装载有类似于超人一般的人工智能。目前处于未连接的休眠状态。一但装在合适的飞船结构梁上，它将变成有着惊人威力的大脑。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個裝有AI人工智慧的先進電腦核心。這個核心本身沒有什麼能力，但如果裝在合適的機體上，它可以支配令人恐懼的力量。
ThingDef.description=A medium-sized ungulate closely related to the llama, the alpaca is often farmed for its remarkably soft wool.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=与大羊驼血缘很近的的中型有蹄类动物，养殖羊驼通常是为了它非常柔软的毛。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種和美洲駝血緣相近的動物，體型中等。人們因牠身上柔軟的毛料而飼養牠們。

ThingDef.description=A large beaver derivative genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=采用基因工程技术衍生出的一种大型海狸，用于伐木作业，具备机器般的效率。当缺乏专门的食物时，这些动物会进入狂躁状态，并不受控制地吃掉所有树木。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種大型海貍已經演化出如機器般收穫樹木的效率，在沒有飼料飼養的情況下，牠們會啃光整株樹木。
ThingDef.description=A soft fruit. Ambrosia has a wonderful smell and taste, and produces a soft chemical high, which increases mood. However, it is slightly addictive if eaten too often.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=软软的果子。仙馐果有奇妙的香味的味道，并产生软性化学亢奋，提升心情。当然，如果吃的多了也会导致轻微的成瘾性。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=A soft fruit. Ambrosia has a wonderful smell and taste, and produces a soft chemical high, which increases mood. However, it is slightly addictive if eaten too often.
ThingDef.description=A traffic management solution from long ago.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=非常久远之前的交通管制设施。
ThingDef.description=This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这个低温休眠舱看起来已经在这里有很长时间了。谁知道这里边装着什么？
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=看起來已經存在了非常久的休眠艙，誰知道裡頭裝了些什麼？
ThingDef.description=Road lighting from long ago. No longer functional.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=非常久远之前的路灯。已经无法工作了。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=古老的道路照明設施，已經失去功能。
ThingDef.description=A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个供动物睡觉的柔软床铺。适合任何类型动物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張給動物睡覺的舒適床鋪，適合任何體型的動物。
ThingDef.description=A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个供动物睡觉的小箱子。适合较小的动物，比如鸡、猫或小狗。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個給動物睡覺的小箱子，適合雞、貓或是小狗等小型動物。
ThingDef.description=Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=在地板上指定一个给动物睡觉的位置。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=指定一個動物的睡眠點，動物會在這裡睡覺。
ThingDef.description=A lightweight combat helmet with a complex design, reinforced with plasteel. Not effective against blunt weapons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=设计复杂的、使用玻璃钢强化的轻型作战头盔。抵抗钝器类武器不太有效。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=A lightweight combat helmet with a complex design, reinforced with plasteel. Not effective against blunt weapons.
ThingDef.description=A good-looking hat which projects a slightly urban, money-loving style. Improves social impact.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一顶突出了轻都市、富贵风格的好看的帽子。提升社交影响力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一頂好看的帽子，投射出一種輕盈的都市拜金風格，能夠增進社交影響。
ThingDef.description=A nice-looking collared shirt with buttons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件好看的、带有纽扣的有领衬衫。
ThingDef.description=Stylish yet rugged, this hat keeps the sun and rain off - and it gives anyone who wears it a bit of extra charm. It is the most important part of traditional western attire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=时髦、粗狂，这顶风格独特的帽子可以为你遮风挡雨，而且带上它的人显得特别有魅力。西部风格着装中最重要的部分。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=風格獨特，優雅並且十分柔軟。被認為是西部風格著裝中最具代表性的部分。
ThingDef.description=A long duster coat for blocking the sun and grit of the desert.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件长型的防尘大衣，用于沙漠中阻隔阳光、炎热和沙尘。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一件用於遮擋沙漠中的陽光和沙塵的風衣。
ThingDef.description=A tough jacket to stop scrapes and bruises, and keep one warm in chilly weather.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件坚固的夹克，可以避免擦伤和刮伤，以及在寒冷天气中保持温暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一件可以避免擦傷和刮痕的高強度夾克。
ThingDef.description=A thick parka for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件厚重的风雪大衣，即使在最寒冷的温度中也能保持温暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=即使在最寒冷的溫度，厚厚的大衣仍能帶給使用者溫暖。
ThingDef.description=Powered armor usually used by assault troops from advanced glitterworld planets.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=来自先进的闪耀世界行星的动力装甲，通常装备于突击部队。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=動力裝甲一般是由從先進世界來的突擊兵所使用。
ThingDef.description=A part of power armor set, mostly used by heavy infantry.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=动力装甲套装中的一部分，一般装备于重步兵。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=動力裝甲套裝的一部分，一般都是重裝步兵在使用。
ThingDef.description=A thin helmet containing finely-tuned sheets of psychically-absorptive foil. Reduces the impact of psychic events.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个轻薄的头盔，内含由「心灵吸收箔」精细调校而成的薄板。降低心灵事件的影响。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這頂薄博的頭盔內含有能夠調整干擾電波影響的裝置，能夠降低使用者受到的干擾電波影響。

ThingDef.description=A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个单人用的能量护盾装置。它能阻挡从一定距离外射来的任何高速运动弹头或能量攻击。但对近战攻击或零距离贴近射击无效。同时也会阻碍穿戴者从内往外的射击。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=單人使用的護盾腰帶，它會阻隔來自遠方的任何攻擊，如子彈或能量彈，但它無法防禦近身攻擊或來自護盾內的射擊，而它同時也阻止護盾內朝外部的射擊。
ThingDef.description=A simple helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=提供一定利器攻击防护的简易头盔。抵抗钝器类武器不太有效。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=A simple helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons.

ThingDef.description=An automatic defensive smokescreen. It will release a thick cloud of smoke if the wearer is hit by a projectile, providing line-of-sight cover and preventing turrets from locking on. Single-use.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=自动防御烟幕。一旦穿戴者被子弹击中，会释放出厚厚的烟雾云，提供视线遮挡以及防止被炮塔锁定。一次性用品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=單人使用的自動煙霧屏障。當使用者被子彈擊中時會釋出一陣煙霧，阻隔敵人的視線或自動機槍塔的鎖定。
ThingDef.description=A garment crafted without machines using neolithic tools.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件用原始工具制成的衣物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一件直接以動物皮毛為原料，用石器時代的工具製作的外衣。
ThingDef.description=A soft, thick cap. Great for keeping warm in winter.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种柔软、厚实的帽子。非常适合在冬季中保持温暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種柔軟的毛線帽，給冬天帶來溫暖。
ThingDef.description=A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. Protects against gunfire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一件在胸口和背部插有装甲板的背心。抵御枪械火力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一件在胸口和背部有装甲的防彈衣。可以在槍火中保護使用者。
ThingDef.description=A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个非常大、柔软、舒适的椅子。非常适合休闲放松。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=寬敞又舒適的座椅，十分適合放鬆。
ThingDef.description=Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=迫击炮。可以越墙抛射炸弹。精度非常差但是射程非常远。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=發射高爆弹的迫擊砲。可以將炸彈隔牆射擊出去。精度很差但是射程非常遠。
ThingDef.description=Mortar launcher. Lobs EMP bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=迫击炮。可以越墙抛射电磁脉冲（EMP）炮弹。精度非常差但是射程非常远。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=發射電磁脈衝彈的迫擊炮。可以將電磁脈衝彈隔牆射擊出去。精度很差但是射程非常遠。
ThingDef.description=Incendiary mortar launcher. Lobs fire-starting bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=迫击炮。可以越墙抛射燃烧弹。精度非常差但是射程非常远。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=發射燃燒彈的迫擊炮。可以將燃燒彈隔牆射擊出去。精度很差但是射程非常遠。
ThingDef.description=Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=分隔房间。电力运转，人穿过门不会减速。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=將房間分隔開來。有通電時會在人們通過時自動開啟，讓人無須減速即可通過。
ThingDef.description=Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when exposed to rain or fire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=储存多余的电力并在电力供给不足时释放电力。警告：充满的电池在暴露于雨水或火焰中时极易爆炸。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=儲存多餘的電力並在電力供給不足時釋放電力。警告：充滿的電池容易在高温或潮濕時爆炸。
ThingDef.description=A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一张单人床，在框架上铺了舒适的床垫和床单用于休息。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個鋪了舒適的床墊和床單的床架。
ThingDef.description=The first beverage besides water ever consumed by mankind. Beer can taste good, but its main effect is intoxication. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol addiction.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=除了水以外人类所消耗的第一饮料。啤酒的味道不错，但它的主要效果是醉酒。过度饮用会导致酒精成瘾。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=啤酒作為僅次於水，人類消耗量最大的飲料。啤酒可以美味的品嘗，然而過量飲用會導致酒精成癮。
ThingDef.description=A soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=是一种用球杆在台上击球、依靠计算得分确定比赛胜负的室内娱乐体育项目。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張表面柔軟的方桌，適合用來遊玩撞球類的遊戲。
ThingDef.description=One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=最精密的手臂替代品之一，赋予使用者爆发出无与伦比的力量。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=以最先進的科技打造出的仿生手臂，給予它的使用者極致的力量。
ThingDef.description=Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=高端科技的产物，仿生眼不仅能完全替代自然眼睛的功能，还能赋予使用者超常的视力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來取代正常眼睛所有功能的高科技仿生眼，同時會賦予使用者看見超自然現象的能力。
ThingDef.description=Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=尖端科技制成的仿生腿，可以给使用者带来极端的步行舒适度和力量。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=仿生腿採用最頂尖的技術在行走上給它的主人極致的舒適度和強度。
ThingDef.description=Blocks of solid granite. Granite is a very hard stone.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的花岗岩砖块。花岗岩是一种非常硬的岩石。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=花崗岩磚。這是一種極堅硬的岩石。
ThingDef.description=Blocks of solid marble. Marble is a soft, beautiful stone, known for being easy to sculpt.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的大理石砖块。大理石是一种较软、美丽的岩石，因易于雕塑而出名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=經過加工切割的大理石方塊。大理石是一種柔軟、美麗的石頭，以易於雕刻聞名。
ThingDef.description=Blocks of solid sandstone. Sandstone is a relatively soft rock and chips easily.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的砂岩砖块。砂岩是一种相对柔软易碎的岩石。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=加工成磚的砂岩。這是一種相對柔軟易碎的岩石。
ThingDef.description=Blocks of solid slate. A dull-looking rock that chips easily.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=坚固的板岩砖块。板岩是一种外表平淡的易碎岩石。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=板岩磚塊。這種外觀暗沉的岩石很容易碎裂。

ThingDef.description=Engineered for chemicals production, the boomalope grows a large sac of volatile chemicals on its back. Though it is weak and fragile for its size, other animals have learned to avoid it because of the huge explosion it produces when it dies.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=专为化工生产的而创造的物种，爆炸羊背上的大囊里有大量不稳定的化学物质。虽然体形纤细脆弱，其他动物还是因为它死亡时会发生大爆炸而学会了避开它。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=被創造來生產化學物質的生物。在爆炸艾洛普背上長出的脆弱囊袋充滿了揮發性化學物質，其它動物已學會避免與之接觸，因為當牠們死亡的那一刻會產生一場壯觀的爆炸。
ThingDef.description=Either by deliberate genetic weaponization, or as an unusual defense mechanism, these rodent-like creatures create a powerful fire-starting explosion when killed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=不论是被蓄意的武器化基因改造，亦或是罕见的自卫机制，这种啮齿类生物在死亡时会产生威力能够引发火灾的巨大爆炸。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=不知是由蓄意的武器化基因修改還是罕見的自衛機制。這種老鼠一樣的生物在死亡時會產生一場威力驚人的爆炸。
ThingDef.description=A powerful greatbow. Fires a heavy arrow long distances.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一把强力的长弓，射出远距离的重箭。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把強力的弓，製作技藝精湛，但是科技水平非常原始。
ThingDef.description=A simple short bow, made with skill, but using only the most primitive technologies.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一把简单的短弓，制作技艺精湛，但是科技水平非常原始。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把短弓，製作技術精湛，但是科技水平非常原始。
ThingDef.description=A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个配备有酿酒设备的工作台。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一組具備所有釀酒所需工具的工作台。
ThingDef.description=A burned tree. Yields no usable wood.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一颗被烧毁的树木。无法收获木材。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=A burned tree. Yields no usable wood.
ThingDef.description=Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=烹饪食物并产生热量。数天后烧尽。和其他热源一样，必须放置在室内封闭空间才能取暖。可以补充燃料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個能夠持續燃燒數天的臨時取暖設備，必須放置在室內才能有效的溫暖空間。
ThingDef.description=The largest natural rodent, the capybara is well-adapted for steaming jungle.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=最大的天然啮齿动物，水豚适合在热气腾腾的丛林中生活。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=現存最大的囓齒類動物，十分適應潮濕的叢林生態。
ThingDef.description=Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=指定一个远行队的组建位置。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=指定旅隊進行裝卸的地點。
ThingDef.description=A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=鹿科物种中的大型成员之一，很好地适应了寒冷气候。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=體型相當龐大的一種鹿，相當適應寒冷的氣候。
ThingDef.description=A large flightless bird with brightly-colored feathers. While it looks beautiful, its kick is vicious.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种不会飞的大型鸟类，又被称为食火鸡，拥有鲜艳的羽毛。虽然看起来很漂亮，但它踢起人来相当凶残。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種擁有閃亮羽毛的大型鳥類，沒有飛行能力。的確，牠看起來很漂亮，但你可會想離牠遠一點。

ThingDef.description=One of mankind's first pets, the cat is a small mammal which hunts vermin. Known for their aloofness, cats are nevertheless popular companions because of their calmness, independence, and fine, pettable fur.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=人类最早饲养的宠物之一，猫是一种捕杀害虫的小型哺乳动物。众人皆知其高贵冷艳，但因其安静、独立，和好看细腻的毛皮，仍然是非常受欢迎的宠物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=人類最早作為寵物的動物之一，是一種小型的哺乳類動物，擅長獵捕某些害獸。貓咪始終是相當受歡迎的寵物，因為牠們冷靜、獨立還有細緻可愛的毛皮。
ThingDef.description=Volatile liquid chemical compound. Used to fuel rockets and other machines.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=挥发性液体化合物。用作火箭和其他机械的燃料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=揮發性的液體化學合成燃料，用於驅動火箭及某些機器。
ThingDef.description=The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=古老的国王游戏。可以有意思地打发几个小时的时间，甚至独自玩耍。需要配备椅子。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=屬於國王的古老遊戲，即使只是一個人玩，也能夠迷上好幾個小時。
ThingDef.description=The most traditional farm bird, the chicken is raised for its eggs and meat.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种最传统的养殖动物，专为它的蛋和肉而被饲养。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=最典型的農場動物，主要生產雞蛋和雞肉。
ThingDef.description=A small but quick rodent famous for its exceptionally soft fur.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个体小而敏捷的啮齿动物，以其异常柔软的毛皮而出名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種小巧靈活的囓齒動物，全身包覆著異常柔軟的毛皮。
ThingDef.description=A delicious preparation of cocoa seeds ground together with sugar and vanilla. Very pleasurable to eat, but not very nutritious.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种美味食品，可可豆与糖和香草一起研磨制成。吃起来让人心情舒畅，但不是很营养。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種用可可，混合了糖與香料製成的美味食品，味道非常可口，但營養價值不高。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=以有機纖維編織而成的布料。
ThingDef.description=A large snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked - it's better to stay away from these creatures.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种大型的蛇类。一旦被激怒就会变得非常有攻击性——最好离这种生物远点。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種巨型蛇類。眼鏡蛇可能具有攻擊性，如果可以，盡量離牠遠一些。
ThingDef.description=Collapsed rocks, packed tightly enough to hold up a roof.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=崩落下的岩石，牢牢地挤压在一起，足以支撑岩顶。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=崩落下的岩石，其強度足以支撐岩頂。
ThingDef.description=Allows radio contact with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=可以通过无线电和遥远的轨道贸易商进行交易。以及和联系其他派系进行外交（发送礼物或呼叫援军）或请求商队交易。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用以和附近的商船與組織談判或交易。

ThingDef.description=Miscellaneous gears, capacitors, circuit boards, tubes, wheels, sensors, wires, chips, processors, and other electronic and industrial parts. Necessary for assembling complex machines or electronics.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=各种齿轮、电容器、电路板、管子、轮子、传感器、电线、芯片、处理器、以及其他电子和工业部件。装配复杂机械或电子产品的必需品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=各種齒輪、電容器、電路板、管子、輪子、傳感器、導線、芯片、處理器以及其他電子和工業零件。用於組裝複雜的機器或電子產品。
ThingDef.description=A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing components from simpler materials.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=配有先进工具的工作台，用于将简单的材料制成零部件。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=配有各種先進設備的工作台，用簡單的原料生產各種零件。

ThingDef.description=An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个能够作为墙体安装的电器设备，可将冷空气吹入房间内，同时外机部分产生大量热量。可以在夏季为房间降温，或者用其建造一个冷库。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種嵌入牆中的電器設備，能將冰涼的空氣送入室內，但會在排氣口產生大量熱能。可以用來調節室內溫度，或打造一座大型冷藏庫。

ThingDef.description=One of the most dangerous big cats, cougars are solitary hunters with long, sharp teeth and claws. They stalk prey from hidden positions before pouncing.

While humans are not their normal diet, they won't turn down a meal of vulnerable human meat.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=最危险的大型猫科动物之一，美洲狮长着长而锋利的牙齿和爪子，是独行猎手。它们会潜伏至猎物附近再发动袭击。

它们的食谱中通常没有脆弱的人类，但也不会拒绝送到嘴边的人肉大餐。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=美洲豹是最危險的大型貓科動物之一，牠們是單獨行動的獵人，鋒利的爪子與尖銳的牙齒是牠們身為頂尖殺手的利器，習慣從隱密的位置朝獵物猛撲上去。

雖然人類不在他們的日常菜單上，可牠們也不會拒絕送上門來的人肉大餐。
ThingDef.description=A very common domestic animal. It can produce large amounts of milk, or be slaughtered for delicious food.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种很常见的家畜。它可以生产大量的牛奶，或被宰杀成为美味食物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種普遍的農業動物，牠們提供非常大量的鮮奶，或者在屠宰後成為桌上佳餚。
ThingDef.description=A place for crafting simple things like shivs or bows.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个制作简单物品的地方，比如大麻烟、小刀和短弓。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個製造簡單刀具或弓箭的地方。
ThingDef.description=A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This one seems to be poisoning the ground around it.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一块从坠毁的飞船上掉下来的神秘残骸。它可能包含稀有材料、电脑、甚至AI角色核心。它似乎在向四周的土地释放有毒物质。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一塊來自墜毀星艦的神秘碎片。它可能包含稀有材料、電腦、甚至AI系統。這塊碎片似乎會毒害它周圍的土地。
