ThingDef.description=A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This kind of technology can be dangerous.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一块从坠毁的飞船上掉下来的神秘残骸。它可能包含稀有材料、电脑、甚至AI角色核心。这种科技可能会带来很大的危险。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一塊來自墜毀星艦的神秘碎片。它可能包含稀有材料、電腦、甚至AI系統。然而這種科技也可能會帶來危險。
ThingDef.description=A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个自主供电的箱子，用于将人维持在生理暂停状态许多年。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個能自行供電的休眠室，能讓裡頭的人進入假死狀態並維持多年。
ThingDef.description=A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个用于开采位于地下深处矿石的钻井装置，使用地质扫描仪来勘探地下资源。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=鑽開地表至地下礦脈採掘礦物的機器。需要先用礦脈聲納找出礦脈位置。
ThingDef.description=A medium-sized herding herbivore. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种中型的素食动物。一般在不被打扰时性情温顺。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種中型的草食動物。在不被打擾的情况下是一種溫馴的動物。
ThingDef.description=Fabric spun from microfibers extracted from silk-producing Devilstrand mushrooms. Very tough, but insulates no better than cloth.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=从产丝的恶魔菇中提取的纤维所织成的布。非常坚固，但隔温性不如合成纤维。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=終極強韌的布料，提取自魔鬼菇。
ThingDef.description=A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一张放在桌子前看起来很舒适和招人喜爱的椅子。
ThingDef.description=Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=分隔房间。只能手动开关，会减慢人的速度。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=將房間分隔開來。只能手動開關，人們通過時會减慢速度。
ThingDef.description=A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一张适合两个人使用的普通双人床。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張能夠睡下兩人的簡單雙人床。
ThingDef.description=Adapted to survival in arid environments, this distant cousin of the horse can go weeks without water.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种马的远亲适应了在干旱环境中生存，可以连续数周不喝水。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=能夠生存在極度乾旱的環境，和馬是遠房親戚，可以在沒有水源的情況下行走好幾個星期。
ThingDef.description=A work bench equipped with various containers, heaters, and measurement equipment for producing a variety of drugs.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个配备有各种烧瓶、量杯和加热装置的化学实验台，用于制作各种药物和成瘾品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張配備有各種容器、加熱器及測量設備的工作台，專門用來製作藥物。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized cassowary egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby cassowary. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的鹤鸵蛋。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出鹤鸵仔。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的食火雞蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出食火雞寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized chicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的鸡蛋。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出鸡仔。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的雞蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出小雞。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Unfertilized chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=未受精的鸡蛋。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=未受精的雞蛋。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized cobra egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby cobra. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的眼镜蛇卵。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出眼镜蛇幼崽。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的眼鏡蛇蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出眼鏡蛇寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized emu egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby emu. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的鸸鹋蛋。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出鸸鹋仔。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的鴯鶓蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出鴯鶓寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized iguana egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby iguana. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的鬣蜥卵。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出鬣蜥幼崽。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的鬣蜥蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出鬣蜥寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized ostrich egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby ostrich. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的鸵鸟蛋。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出鸵鸟仔。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的鴕鳥蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出鴕鳥寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized tortoise egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby tortoise. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的乌龟卵。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出乌龟幼崽。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的烏龜蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出烏龜寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description=Fertilized turkey egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby turkey. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=已受精的火鸡蛋。如果一切顺利应该可以孵化出火鸡仔。可以生吃，但是最好烹饪后食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=已受精的火雞蛋。如果順利，蛋將會孵出火雞寶寶。蛋可以生吃，但烹調後風味更佳。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=火化尸体和衣物。电力驱动。
ThingDef.description=Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=从钢渣和其他含有金属的物品中提炼出有用的金属。消耗大量电力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=從金屬碎片中提煉有用的金屬，將消耗大量電力。
ThingDef.description=An electric-powered station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=制作非机械武器和工具的电动锻造台。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=製造非機械式武器和工具的工作台。
ThingDef.description=An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用于烹饪食物的电力炉灶。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來烹飪食物的工作台。
ThingDef.description=A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=带有缝纫机的工作台，快速缝制衣服。在没电时的工作速度只有平时的40%。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來裁縫衣服的工作台，沒電時的工作效率只有原來的40%。
ThingDef.description=The largest unmodified land animal. It can use its tusks as tools for moving objects - or as deadly weapons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=最大的原生陆地动物。它可以用它的长牙作为搬运工具或作为致命的武器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=體型最大的非基改陸地生物，長長的象牙可以用來搬動物品，或是成為致命的武器。
ThingDef.description=An elephant's tusk. Very durable and valuable. Deadly but somewhat unwieldy as a weapon.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=大象的长牙。非常坚固、珍贵。虽然致命但很难作为武器使用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=大象的象牙，非常耐用且珍貴，雖然有些笨重，但作為武器仍然十分致命。
ThingDef.description=A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=鹿科物种中的大型成员之一，很好地适应了寒冷气候。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=大多數的麋鹿已經適應在寒冷地區的生活。
ThingDef.description=A large flightless bird with beady eyes on its ugly face. With its bad attitude, it is the jerk of the natural world.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种不会飞的大型鸟类，丑陋的脸上有着宝石般晶亮的眼睛。习性非常恶劣，是大自然中的流氓。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種不會飛的大型鳥類，有著鈕扣般大的眼睛，外表看來十分不討喜。說到牠的個性，簡直就是自然界中的痞子。(譯註：音同而苗)
ThingDef.description=A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个将麦芽汁发酵成啤酒的桶。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來將麥汁發酵成啤酒的巨大容器。
ThingDef.description=When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=当被火焰触发或手动触发后，会向着四周圆形范围喷出灭火泡沫。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=當遭遇火燒或是人為啟動時，滅火裝置會以它為中心向一個範圍內噴灑消防泡沫，以此撲滅火焰。
ThingDef.description=A flaky substance that can be smoked to induce a short but powerful euphoric state. While it is cheap to produce, it is exceptionally addictive.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种薄片状晶体，在玻璃烟斗中加热成烟雾，抽起来会让人精神愉悦，这种东西虽然易于制作，但有着极强的成瘾性。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種薄片狀藥物，吸食後能觸發強大但短暫的亢奮效果。製作成本低廉，但有強烈的成癮性。
ThingDef.description=A high-tech flat-screen television with crystal-clear image and rich color. More entertaining than a grainy tube TV.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种画面晶莹剔透、色彩丰富的高科技平板电视屏幕。相比画面颗粒感过强的显像管电视能提供更好的娱乐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一台高科技、高解析、高彩度的大尺寸薄型電視機，能提供比顯像管電視更家的娛樂體驗。
ThingDef.description=A small predator adapted for the far north. It usually hunts small game like mice and voles, sometimes burrowing through a meter of snow to reach its prey.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种适应了北极的小型肉食动物。通常捕食鼠类这样的小型动物，有时候为了抓住猎物能挖开一米厚的积雪。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=生活在北極地區的小型動物，擅長狩獵體型比牠小的生物，如老鼠，有時為了狩獵動物，能夠挖穿超過一米深的積雪。
ThingDef.description=A small fox originally from the northern part of Earth's Africa continent. It hunts small creatures and has very large ears.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种小型狐，又叫沙漠狐、迷你狐，源自地球非洲北部。捕食小型动物，有一对非常大的耳朵。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=源自舊地球非洲北部的小型狐狸，有著一對大耳朵，以獵捕小型生物維生。
ThingDef.description=A small solitary canine evolved for hunting small prey in temperate climates.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种小型独居犬科动物，进化适应了在温带气候中捕猎小型猎物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種從犬科動物獨立演化而來的狩獵者，專門狩獵小型生物，生活在溫帶地區。
ThingDef.description=Produces power by consuming wood fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=利用木材燃烧来发电。必须手动添加燃料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=燃燒木材產生電力，燃料需要手動裝填。
ThingDef.description=A wood-fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用木材当燃料的锻造台，用于制作非机械武器和工具。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=製造非機械式武器和工具的工作台，需要消耗木材燃料。
ThingDef.description=A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用木材当燃料的简易炉灶，用于烹饪食物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=燃燒木材烹調食物的工作台。
ThingDef.description=A small, extremely quick antelope known for its amazingly long leap.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种体型较小且行动极为敏捷的羚羊，因惊人的持续跳跃能力而闻名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種體型小而靈活的動物，廣為人知的還有牠令人難以置信的跳耀能力。
ThingDef.description=Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=利用蒸汽间歇喷泉的地热来发电。必须放置在蒸汽间歇喷泉上。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用蒸氣間歇泉來發電，必須建造在噴泉正上方。
ThingDef.description=Advanced medical supplies from a high-tech glitterworld.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=来自高科技的闪耀世界的高级医药。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=來自「閃耀世界」的高科技藥品。
ThingDef.description=A bioluminescent pod produced by giant insects. Glows under its own light for a long time, then dies.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个荧光茧，巨型昆虫的产物。能够长时间照亮一片区域，直到枯死。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=蟲族的照明工具，在開始發光前需要成長一段時間。

ThingDef.description=A synthetic combat drug developed for space marines during the early days of interplanetary warfare. Go-juice blocks pain and increases the user's melee and shooting abilities. It also enhances movement speed.

Military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness. Some saw this as a downside; others saw it as a benefit.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种合成的作战用药剂，研制用于在早期的行星间战斗中提供给太空陆战队员服用。活力水能够屏蔽服用者的痛觉同时能够提升近战和射击技能。它还能够提升移动速度

但是发明它的军事化学家们却无法消除它的成瘾性。有些人认为这是个缺点，而有些人却认为这是个优点。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=在星際戰爭初期開發給宇宙陸戰隊士兵使用的複合型戰鬥能力強化藥物，俗稱能量果飲。能量果飲能夠阻斷痛覺、強化使用者的肉搏與射擊能力，並提升移動速度。

即便是開發出這款藥物的科學家也沒能找出消除成癮性的方法，有些人視此為致命缺陷，有些人則認為是一大優點。

ThingDef.description=The most seductive metal of them all. Millions have died in attempting to feed the endless human thirst for gold. This soft metal is little use on its own, but is strikingly beautiful and very rare.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=世界上最有诱惑力的金属。无数的人因为对黄金的渴望而命丧黄泉。这种黄色的软质金属本身用途不大，但非常漂亮并且极度稀少。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=最吸引人的一種金屬。數不清的人死於對黃金無止境的欲望。這種柔軟的金屬本身的用處不大，但非常美麗、非常稀有。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種非常堅硬的火成岩。
ThingDef.description=Place the dead in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Colonists will visit full graves to gain meditative joy.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=给死者提供一个得体的栖身之所。殖民者会扫墓来获得「冥想」娱乐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=给死者提供一個得體的棲身之所。

ThingDef.description=Huge omnivorous mammals adapted for cold climates. Their thick blubber and fur keep them warm in winter.

While their usual diet consists of fish, berries, honey, and scavenged meat, the grizzly is capable of using its massive strength and deadly claws to kill live prey. They are startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种适应了寒冷气候的巨型杂食哺乳动物。它们厚厚的脂肪和皮毛可以在冬季保暖。

虽然它们平时的饮食包括鱼、浆果、蜂蜜、腐肉，灰熊仍能利用其巨大的力量和致命的爪子杀死活着的猎物。虽然外形如此笨重，但它们却拥有惊人敏捷。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種適應了寒冷環境的大型雜食性哺乳類。厚實的脂肪和皮毛幫助牠們抵抗寒冷。

熊平時的飲食包含魚、蜂蜜、莓果和腐肉，但牠們也能夠使用強大的力量和致命的狩獵動物，以這笨重的體型來說，這種動物擁有驚人的速度。

ThingDef.description=A downward-facing penetrating radar, combined with sonar and magnetic imagers, allows you to detect (but not identify) minerals buried deep under the surface. Requires a huge amount of electricity.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=向下的探地雷达，结合声纳和磁成像，可检测深埋于地底的矿物（但不能判断矿物类型）。需要消耗大量电力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一具朝向地面，專門探測地下礦脈位置(但無法辨別礦物種類)的雷達探測器，備有聲納與回波顯示器。需消耗巨量電力。
ThingDef.description=A general-purpose military weapon for field or urban combat. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=古老的制式军用武器，用于野外或城市作战。三连发射击。射程远，威力较低，高射速。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=制式的軍用裝備，適合原野與城市作戰。此步槍採用三連發式射擊，具備優秀的射程與射速，然而單發殺傷力較弱。
ThingDef.description=Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power, low rate of fire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=古老模式的栓动式步枪。良好射程和威力，射速低。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power, low rate of fire.
ThingDef.description=A magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun. Short range and very low accuracy, but extraordinarily dangerous.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=弹匣供弹全自动霰弹枪。射程短并且精度非常低，但极具威胁性。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=配置彈匣的全自動霰彈槍，射程短精度低但極度致命。
ThingDef.description=Charged-shot blaster for area suppressive fire. Mechanoid-built.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=发射高能电荷冲击弹的范围压制性武器。由机械族制作。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=使用光束衝擊的廣域壓制性武器。產自機器人工藝。
ThingDef.description=Charged-shot rail-assisted lance weapon. Fires a single charged shot at high velocity.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=发射高能电荷标枪弹的轨道加速武器。每次发射单发高速电荷标枪弹。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=具有軌道輔助的光束武器。每回射擊一發高速光束彈。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=发射高能电荷弹的步枪。
ThingDef.description=A single-use rocket launcher for quick retribution.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用作快速反击的一次性火箭发射器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一次性使用的火箭發射器，便於快速打擊。
ThingDef.description=A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一把小巧的、泛口径的枪械。射程很短，但着弹点集中、操作性好。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把高速的大口徑重型衝鋒槍，射程極短，但保證不會讓敵人毫髮無傷的離開。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=燃烧弹发射器。可以用来放火。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=燃燒彈發射器。可以用來放火。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=发射燃烧弹的小型火炮。由机械族制作。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=發射燃燒彈的迷你火炮。產自機器人工藝。
ThingDef.description=A micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种微型冲锋枪。射程短，威力低，但是射速很高。瞄准和开火都非常迅速敏捷。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種小型衝鋒槍，單發威力弱而射程短，但射速高，能夠快速瞄準與射擊。
ThingDef.description=A multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种多管机枪，极其高的射速。由机械族制作，设计时就没考虑到让人类手持射击。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把擁有驚人超高射速的多管機槍。產自機器人工藝。
ThingDef.description=Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=样式古老的半自动手枪。火力和射程很弱但是迅速灵敏。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=古老的自動手槍。火力和射程很弱但是開火速度很快。
ThingDef.description=Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=很古老的设计，杀伤力很强，但是射程很短。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=很古老的設計，殺傷力很強，但射程很短。
ThingDef.description=Ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=样式古老的军用狙击步枪。栓动式。射程很远，极高的精确度和威力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=古老的軍用狙擊步槍。採用栓動式退殼，具有極長的射程與致命的殺傷力。
ThingDef.description=A single-use rocket launcher that fires 3 projectiles in quick succession.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=连射三发火箭弹的一次性火箭发射器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一次性使用的火箭發射器，能在短時間內連續射擊三發。
ThingDef.description=Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=拼凑在炮塔上的一把应急用的机枪。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個簡單連接到砲塔基座上的的無人機槍。
ThingDef.description=A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用于手工缝制衣服的工作台。工作速度只有电动裁缝台的50%。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來裁縫衣服的工作台，工作效率只有電動裁縫桌的40%。
ThingDef.description=This small, solitary herbivore can swiftly hop away from danger.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种小型的独居食草动物在遇到威胁时会迅速跳离。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種獨來獨往的小型草食動物能夠快速跳躍逃離危險。
ThingDef.description=Nutrient-rich grasses and shoots, harvested and compacted for storage. Hay is good animal feed, but inedible for humans.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=营养丰富的草和幼芽，收获并压缩储存起来。干草是很好的饲料，但对于人类来说难以下咽。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=營養豐富的牧草，專門做為動物的飼料，人類無法食用。
ThingDef.description=Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=负责将血液和氧气供给到身体的各个位置。待候新的主人。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=輸送血液和氧氣到身體各個部位。他正等待一個新的主人。
ThingDef.description=An electrical device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个将电能转换成热能的电器设备。它会自动根据当前室内温度开关以达到设定的目标温度。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種電氣設備，能將電能轉化為熱能。它可以自動啟動或關閉，達到期望的目標溫度。
ThingDef.description=A pack of herbal concoctions typically extracted from the healroot plant. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals, but much better than nothing.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一包从草药植物提取而来的草药混合物。比起工业医药效果稍差，但总好过没有。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=成分提取自藥草製成的藥品，效果略遜於工業製藥。
ThingDef.description=A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种配有电脑和电子测量设备的高科技工作台。高科技工具加快了研究速度。需要消耗电力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張備有電腦及電子測量設備的研究桌。高科技設備加快了研究速度，但須消耗電力。
ThingDef.description=A hive of giant insects. Will spawn additional insects and hives over time.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个巨型昆虫的巢穴。随着时间会不断繁殖出巨型昆虫和新巢穴。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=蟲族的巢穴，會緩慢的孳生蟲族並產生新巢穴。
ThingDef.description=Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=储存原料以供如营养膏合成机之类的机器使用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=為營養膏合成機這樣的大型機器儲存原料。

ThingDef.description=A simple ancient game played with a few horseshoes and a large pin in the ground. Players toss horseshoes from a distance and attempt to get them to land close to or around the pin. It's relaxing, and even trains hand-eye coordination.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种用马蹄铁和钉在地上的大钉的、简单的古老游戏。玩家在一定距离外，将马蹄铁尽量投掷得靠近或套住钉子。很轻松，还能训练手眼协调能力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種古老而簡單的遊戲，只需要幾個馬蹄鐵與一根豎立在地面上的大棒子。玩家從一段距離外擲出馬蹄鐵，盡可能的落在接近棒子的位置。這是一種消遣，但也可以訓練手眼協調能力。
ThingDef.description=A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一张专为伤员设计的床。可以增加治疗的成功率。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張為病患特別設計的床。能夠提高各種醫療行為的成功率。
ThingDef.description=A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=普通的人类，绝大多数都没有被基因工程改造，也没有因类地行星上的生存压力而进化。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=普通的人類，絕大多數都沒有被基因修改或因在非地球行星居住而進化。
ThingDef.description=A large, energetic dog with a thick fur coat for remaining comfortable in arctic environments.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种精力充沛的大型犬，因为有一层厚实的毛皮可以在北极环境中保持舒适。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種大型且精力充沛的狗，厚實的毛皮使牠們能夠適應極地環境。
ThingDef.description=Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=在人工培养液中快速种植植物。运行时需要消耗电力，断电后植物会死亡。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來種植作物，水培植物盆能讓植物快速生長。

ThingDef.description=High-tech nano-fibers woven into sheets. It is somewhat heavy, but is incredibly difficult to break. The secrets of its production are known only to the most advanced glitterworld cultures.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=高科技纳米纤维织成的布。稍微有点重，但是几乎不可能破损。其生产技术只有最先进的闪耀世界才掌握。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=以高科技奈米纖維織成，有點厚重，但令人難以置信的難以破壞。

ThingDef.description=The hardy wild ancestor of the domesticated goat. Ibexes live on marginal territory that most antelopes couldn't survive, eating lichens and sparse mountain plants. They're famous for dextrously hopping across bare cliff faces - and for their violent ramming attack.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=家养山羊的野生祖先。野山羊生活在大多数连羚羊都无法生存的边缘地区，以苔藓和稀疏的山地植物为食。它们以能敏捷跳跃穿梭于裸露悬崖之间，以及他们凶悍的角撞攻击而闻名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=圈養山羊的野生祖先，野山羊生活在貧瘠的環境，大多數羚羊都無法生存，以苔癬和稀少的高山植物為食，擅長在陡峭的崖壁上移動。
ThingDef.description=These large lizards normally feed on plant matter. However, when angered, their tough hide and sharp claws make them quite dangerous.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种大蜥蜴一般以植物为食。但在其愤怒时，尖牙利爪会让它们成为一种危险的动物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種大蜥蜴一般以植物為食。在憤怒時牠們的尖牙利爪會讓他們成為一種危險的動物。

ThingDef.description=Jelly stored and used as food by oversized insects. It is smooth, rich, and brings joy to those who consume it. Because of its unique biological properties, it can nourish almost any creature and never rots.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=巨型昆虫储存作为食物的胶状物。如丝顺滑、营养丰富，能给食用者带来愉悦感。由于其独特的生物学特性，它可以滋养几乎任何生物而且不会腐烂。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=蟲族儲存用來作為食物的膠狀物，外表盈滑，營養豐富，而且味道令人滿意。因為獨特的化學特性，它能供幾乎所有的生物食用，而且保存期限：永遠。

ThingDef.description=A hard, green stone. Because of its beauty and rarity, jade is often used for ornaments and decorations. It's hardness and density also makes it a good material for blunt weapons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种坚硬的绿色石头。由于它的美丽和稀有，翡翠经常被用来点缀和装饰。它的硬度和密度也使它成为一种很好的钝击武器材料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種堅硬的綠色礦石，因為它的美觀和高價值，經常被用於飾品和裝飾品。也因為它的硬度和密度，使它成為鈍兵器的好材料。
ThingDef.description=This little brain implant will make you feel happy and relaxed, though you might end up a bit drowsy as a result.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这个小小的大脑植入体会让你感到愉悦和放松。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這個微型的大腦植入晶片可以讓被植入者感到快樂及放鬆。
ThingDef.description=Kibble animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources. Humans can eat it, but they really, really don't like it.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将肉和植物原料混合而成的动物粗饲料。人也能吃，但真的、真的没人喜欢。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=混合肉類與作物製成的動物飼料。
ThingDef.description=Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=过滤并移除血液中的废物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=從血液中過濾和移除廢物。
ThingDef.description=A very versatile, medium-sized dog. Originally bred to retrieve birds shot on the hunt, the lab is also an excellent guard dog, play pal, and family friend.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种极具灵性的中型犬。它最初培育用于在狩猎时找回猎物，拉布拉多也是一种优秀的看门狗，人类玩伴和家庭成员。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種用途廣泛的中型犬。最初被孕育來搜索並尋回打獵中的小型獵物，此外也是相當優秀的護衛犬、玩伴以及家人。
ThingDef.description=A sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种主要由古代海洋贝类外壳相互挤压胶结所形成的沉积岩。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種由古代貝類屍體經過壓縮形成的沉積岩。
ThingDef.description=Plays an important role in metabolism.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=在新陈代谢扮演重要的角色。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=在代謝過程中扮演非常重要的角色。

ThingDef.description=Automatically detects precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which it was built). The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles. Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=自动探查附近区域（除了扫描仪所在区域外）的稀有矿物，比如黄金和翡翠。半径30格地图内，发现矿物块的频率为平均每30天一次。在同一区域内或临近区域建造多于一个扫描仪对效率影响不大。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=Automatically detects precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which it was built). The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles. Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.

ThingDef.description=A concoction of advanced glitterworld mechanites that dramatically improve the body's functioning in all respects. It can even, over time, heal old scarred-over wounds or brain damage. Unfortunately, without the moderating effects of regular doses every five or six days, the mechanites lose cohesion, causing continuous berserk rages and, eventually, death.

After the first dose, there is no way to get the mechanites out, ever.

On the urbworlds, they call Luciferium the 'Devil's Bargain'. Many have been forced to kill friends when no more of the seductive red pills could be found.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=来自闪耀世界的高级纳米机械的混合物，全方位提升能力。甚至随着时间推移，能够治愈旧伤疤和大脑损伤。但不幸的是，如果每隔五六天不能重新摄入剂量合适的同类纳米机械，体内的纳米机械将失去协调能力，导致宿主不间断的发狂直至死亡。

在第一次摄入这种纳米机械后，几乎没有方法能够将其排出体外。

在都市世界里，人们称路西法合剂是「与魔鬼的交易」。许多人在无法得到这些诱人的红色药片后被迫亲手杀死自己的朋友。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=先進的閃耀世界生體機械化藥物，能夠巨幅提升身體各方面的能力。然而，若是沒有每隔5~6日規律服藥，使用者體內的機械化細胞將會失去凝聚力，導致陷入狂暴狀態，直到死亡。

一旦服用了路西法強化劑，就永遠不可能去除機械化。

在城都世界，路西法強化劑又被稱為「魔鬼的交易」，有無數人發狂殺死自己的親友，只因為沒有持續服用這小小的紅色藥丸。
ThingDef.description=Essential part of the respiratory system.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=呼吸系统的重要组成部分。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=呼吸系統中最重要的部分。

ThingDef.description=A wildcat larger than a housecat, but smaller than a cougar. Lynxes survive on a diet of small birds and animals. Their very warm fur keeps them safe from the brutally cold temperatures of their northern territories.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种比家猫大，比美洲狮小的野生猫科动物。猞猁以捕食小型鸟类和动物为生。它们身上异常保暖的毛皮能够在北方地区的严寒下保护它们。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種野生貓科動物，體型介於家貓與美洲豹之間。山貓靠獵捕小型鳥類及動物維生。保暖的毛皮使牠們能夠在極寒的北方領域中生存。
ThingDef.description=Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=指定一个举行结婚仪式的位置。观众可以在任何方向上观看婚礼。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=指定一個固定的結婚儀式舉行地點，觀禮者可以從兩側的任一側觀看典禮進行。
ThingDef.description=A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=选择多种原料，精心烹饪出的一份相对复杂的食物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用肉類和植物組合作為原料烹調出的一份相對複雜的料理。
ThingDef.description=A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=厨艺界的大师级作品，这份食物同时滋养了身体、思想和灵魂。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=廚藝界的大師級作品，這份食物會滋養身體和靈魂。
ThingDef.description=A synthetic mixture of protein, carbohydrates, and vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs, and absolutely disgusting.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种由蛋白质、碳水化合物、维生素、氨基酸和矿物质混在一起的合成物。满足一切身体需要，但是食用起来非常恶心。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種由蛋白質，碳水化合物，维生素，氨基酸和礦物質混在一起的合成物。滿足一切身體需要，但是食用起来非常噁心。
ThingDef.description=A simple meal quickly cooked from a few ingredients.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用少量原料快速烹饪出的一份简单的食物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用一種原料烹調出的一份簡單的料理。
ThingDef.description=A high-quality packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=高品质的包装食品，生产以供极端生存的环境下食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=高品質的包裝食品，生產用於極端生存。

ThingDef.description=Heavy combat mechanoids that glide on dozens of tiny legs. Their heavy armor and firepower makes them very effective against bunched-up static defenders. They are somewhat vulnerable to mobile hit-and-run tactics.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=通过数十条细小的腿爬行的重型作战机械体。它们的重型装甲火力让它们非常适合于对付集群的防御设施。但面对游击战术时较为无力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=以數十條腿爬行的重型作戰機器人。它們的重型裝甲讓它們非常適合對付集團的防御設施。但它們對於游擊戰術來說較為脆弱。

ThingDef.description=Fast, spindly, human-sized combat mechanoids. They usually carry one primary ranged weapon, and their bodies are adorned with two articulated blades to make them deadly in melee combat. They don't use cover. Best handled by concentrated, overwhelming force.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=快速、细长并和人差不多大的机械体。它们一般带有一把主远程武器，并且它们的身体上的一对关节式镰刃让他们在近战中极其恐怖。他们从来不使用掩体。对付它们最好的战术是集中压倒性的火力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=快速、細長並和人差不多大的機器人。它們一般帶有一長距離主武器，他們身體上的尖銳突出物讓他們在近距離戰鬥中非常強大。它們不使用掩體，對付他們最好的戰術是集中火力快速消滅。
ThingDef.description=Medical staff use these supplies to heal the wounded.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=医疗人员用医药来治疗病人和伤员。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=醫療人員會使用醫療包來治療傷患。

ThingDef.description=A large, genetically-engineered beetle. Once the worker caste of an artifical ecosystem of insectoids designed to fight mechanoid invasions, it is now usually seen without its deadlier insectoid cousins. Still, its size and hard shell make it dangerous when it attacks. A eusocial creature, it cannot reproduce individually.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种经过基因改造的大型甲虫。曾经是设计用于对抗机械入侵的人工生态虫巢系统中的工人阶层，现在很难看到其更具致命性的远亲了。但是它的体型和坚固的外壳让它在攻击时依旧十分危险。作为一种真社会性的生物，无法自行繁殖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種基因修改過的甲蟲，原本被用以抵御機器人入侵，一般單獨行動。牠的尺寸和硬殼使牠們成為一種非常危險的生物。
ThingDef.description=A huge, high-tech television. Gigantic, hyper-vibrant images almost leap out of the screen. Very entertaining.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个巨大的高科技电视。巨大、超逼真的图像几乎从屏幕上跳出来。提供非常好的娱乐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一台巨大的高科技電視，超大的清晰化直讓影像裡的東西彷彿要跳出螢幕，太有趣啦！

ThingDef.description=Giant, solitary herbivores. Long extinct after being wiped out by the natives of Earth's American continent, the megasloth was later brought back using advanced cloning and artificial gestators.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=巨型的独居食草动物。巨懒被地球上美洲土著灭绝了很长时间之后，通过先进的克隆技术和人工受精技术重现世间。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=巨型樹懶是一種移動緩慢、單獨行動的草食性動物。雖然牠的祖先已經在遠古地球的美洲大陸上被人類滅絕，但透過克隆技術，巨型樹懶再度被喚醒。

ThingDef.description=Not actually a spider, the megaspider is a genetically-engineered giant insectoid the size of a bear. Designed for heavy work and combat, its thick chitinous armor makes it hard to kill, while its long deadly ripper-blades make it deadly.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=巨型蜘蛛实际上并不是蜘蛛，是一种经过基因改造的巨型昆虫，大小如熊一般。设计用于繁重工作和战斗，厚重的几丁质外壳使它很难被杀死，同时长长的锯齿镰刃让它变得非常致命。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=實際上並非蜘蛛，這熊一般大小的蟲族是基因工程製造出的產物，原本被設計用來進行粗重的工作及戰鬥。厚重的外殼使牠難以被殺死，一對長而鋒利的鐮刀爪使牠在戰鬥中非常致命。
ThingDef.description=The oldest human weapon - a shaped stick, heavy at one end, for bashing enemies to death. Primitive but effective.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=人类最古老的武器，一根整过形的棍子。棍子的一头较重，用于将敌人击打致死。原始而有效。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=最古老的人類武器，將敵人打擊至死，原始但有效。
ThingDef.description=A short sword of ancient design. Good for stabbing or slashing.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种样式古老的短剑。劈砍或戳刺都非常有效。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=古老的短劍，適合砍殺與突刺。
ThingDef.description=One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=人类最古老的武器之一，匕首既是日常工具也是致命武器。
ThingDef.description=The ancient weapon of kings, the longsword can be used for slashing or stabbing and is deadly in the right hands.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一般由国王拥有的古老武器，长剑可以用来劈砍或戳刺，在合适的人的手里非常致命。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=古代國王的武器，長劍適合砍殺與突刺，有了它就如同有了一支致命的右手。
ThingDef.description=A refined club, engineered for efficient swinging and deadly impacts.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一根精致的棍棒，在挥舞和杀伤上有特别的设计。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把精緻的錘子，易於揮舞並帶來致命的殺傷力。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种自制的长得像匕首的武器。
ThingDef.description=A polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents in melee combat.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种长柄武器，一端带有用于近战中戳刺敌人的尖头。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把頂端裝有利器的長矛，用於在肉搏戰中刺向對手。
ThingDef.description=Ancient machinery, compacted over time. Can be mined for useful components.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=经过长时间被压紧的远古机械。可以开采出有用的零部件。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=隨著時間推移被譏埋在地底的古代機械，開採可以獲得可用的電子零件。
ThingDef.description=Ancient compacted rubble rich in plasteel.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=被压紧的富含玻璃钢的远古瓦砾。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=經過地底高壓融合而成，富含塑鋼的石塊。
ThingDef.description=The remains of some ancient, collapsed structure. Rich in steel.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=某个倒塌的远古建筑遗迹。富含钢材。
ThingDef.description=Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=非常缓慢地抽走附近地形的水分，能将沼泽或浅水改造成干燥的土地。不能改造深水。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=緩慢移除周圍的濕氣，將沼澤地與淺水轉換成乾燥地面，但對深水沒有效果。
ThingDef.description=This monkey can use its curly tail to grab on to branches, leaving its hands free to do other things.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种猴子可以用弯曲的尾巴来抓住树枝以空出它们的手来做别的事情。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=猴子可以使用牠捲曲的尾巴抓住樹枝，並空出雙手做其他事。
ThingDef.description=An explosive shell to be fired from mortars. Explodes when damaged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=迫击炮发射的爆炸炮弹。受损时会发生爆炸。
ThingDef.description=A large herding herbivore descended from buffalo and adapted for some exotic environment. Peaceful unless disturbed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种大型的群居素食动物，由水牛演化而来，并且适应特殊环境。在不被打扰时性情温顺。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=由水牛演化而來的一種大型草食動物，對於不少外星環境有良好的適應性，在不被打擾的情况下是一種溫馴的動物。
ThingDef.description=Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near hi-tech research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=提高研究速度，一些高级研究项目所必需的设备。需要放置在高级研究台附近。一个研究台只能连接一个多元分析仪。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=提升研究速度。裝置必須設置於研究桌附近，一張研究桌同時只能與一台多重分析裝置連結。

ThingDef.description=A one-use nanotech trainer device. The neurotrainer is inserted through the orbit of the eye and releases nanomachines into the subject's brain, quickly improving their skills in a specific area.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一次性的纳米技术训练装置。将纳米训练装置注射进眼眶内，它会释放出纳米机械并进入使用者的大脑，在特定领域快速提升使用者的技能。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種一次性使用的訓練裝置。神經技能訓練器透過使用者的眼球釋放奈米機器進入使用者的大腦，迅速提高使用者特定的技能能力
ThingDef.description=A synthetic precursor chemical. Useless on its own, many drugs require neutroamine as an ingredient.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种合成的前体化学品，本身毫无用途，但却是许多合成毒品必不可少的原料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種化學原料，本身不具實用性，但是許多藥物的化合原料。

ThingDef.description=Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将有机原料合成为营养膏。比其他的食物生产方法消耗更少的原料和时间——但没人喜欢吃营养膏。可以处理生食，但无法处理某些的植物材料，比如干草。只有当殖民者缺少食物时，才会从营养膏合成机中拿取营养膏。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=將有機材料合成為營養膏。比起其他的食物調理方式，合成營養高所消耗的物料成本與時間都更低，然而，沒人喜歡吃這黏糊糊的食物。可接受各種生食作為原料，除了牧草這類植物原料。
ThingDef.description=Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=若想和轨道贸易商进行交易，你必须建造一个轨道交易信标。只有信标有效范围内的货物和白银才能用于交易。可以放置于室内，但至少要有一个信标露天，以接收商人发送给你的货物和白银。需要消耗电力。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來進行軌道交易。你只能賣出信標周圍的商品。軌道商人也會將商品丢在這附近。
ThingDef.description=The largest unmodified bird species, ostriches are known for their fast run, huge eggs, and powerful kick.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=最大的原生鸟类动物，鸵鸟以其迅捷的奔跑能力、巨大的蛋和有力的双腿而闻名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=體型最大的非基改鳥類，以飛快的跑速、巨大的蛋以及威力強大的踢擊聞名。
ThingDef.description=This brain implant will make you not feel pain.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种大脑植入体会让你感觉不到疼痛。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這個微型的大腦植入晶片可以讓被植入者感受不到任何類型的痛覺。

ThingDef.description=An agile and powerful big cat native to the jungles of old Earth. As solitary ambush predators, panthers are masters of taking down both large and small prey. Onlookers tend to focus on their graceful movements, while those in closer contact usually notice their skull-crushing strength.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种灵巧凶猛的大型猫科动物，发源于昔日地球的丛林之中。作为独行的潜行肉食动物，黑豹是狩猎大型猎物和小型猎物的大师。目击者倾向于关注他们优雅的动作，但近距离接触过的人才了解它们那足以摧毁颅骨的力量。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=在舊世界中的叢林活動的大型貓科動物。身為獨行的獵人，黑豹擅長撂倒體型與牠一般大及體型較小的獵物。旁觀者往往會把焦點放在牠優雅的動作上，更深入觀察則可以體認到牠們咬碎獵物顱骨的力量有多強。
ThingDef.description=Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=指定一个举办聚会的集合位置。聚会将在周围的区域内举办。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=指定派對舉行的地點，人們將會以派對點為中心進行活動。
ThingDef.description=A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. Will run out and self-destruct after several days.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个传统的制冷器，不需要通电即可运行。通过水蒸发来降温，数天后水分耗尽时会自动消失。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個原始的冷房設備，利用水吸熱蒸發的原理達到冷卻效果。冷卻器在運作壽命結束後會自我消滅。
ThingDef.description=A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种由肉食和素食混合脱水制成的食物。味道平平但又不会让人讨厌。无需冷藏即能保存很长时间。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=將肉類和作物混和後壓扁製成的食品，無須冷藏也能夠長時間保存。

ThingDef.description=A drug for preventing infections from starting. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, and plague. Take every five days. Note: This drug does nothing to cure existing infections - it only prevents new ones.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=预防传染病的药物。阻断疟疾、昏睡病以及瘟疫的感染。五天一服。注意：这种药物对治疗已经感染的疾病没有任何作用——只能用于预防。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=針對瘧疾的預防性藥物。五天打一針，瘧疾不上身。
ThingDef.description=The pig was one of the first animals domesticated by humans. It is commonly raised for meat and leather, and is easy to feed because of its omnivorous diet.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=猪是人类第一批家养动物之一。因它的皮和肉而被广泛饲养，而且由于其杂食性，易于饲养。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=最早被人類馴化飼養的動物之一，主要生產豬肉和豬皮。豬隻非常容易餵養，因為牠們什麼都吃。
ThingDef.description=A bundle of pila, non-reusable throwing spears.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一捆投矛，投掷出去后就无法重新回收使用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把投矛，不可再利用的投擲用矛。
ThingDef.description=A large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=宽大叶子的沙漠植物，花和茎可以食用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=長葉的沙漠植物，花和根莖可以食用。
ThingDef.description=A rarely-sprouting bush which yields the ambrosia fruit. Ambrosia is pleasurable to eat and produces a slightly addictive chemical warmth effect.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种树苗罕见的灌木，可以收获仙馐果。食用仙馐果能使人愉悦并产生成瘾性轻微的化学温暖感效果。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=A rarely-sprouting bush which yields the ambrosia fruit. Ambrosia is pleasurable to eat and produces a slightly addictive chemical warmth effect.
ThingDef.description=A small perennial wildflower that grows in alpine climates.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种小型多年生野花，生长在高原地区。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種在高寒氣候中長年生長的小野花。
ThingDef.description=A short shrub. Does not typically talk.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=低矮的灌木。并不像布什那样爱说话。

ThingDef.description=A large grain plant which produces ears of delicious yellow seeds. Takes a relatively long time to grow, but yields lots of food, and takes a long time to spoil. Needs fertile soil to grow well.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种大型谷类植物，产出美味的黄籽穗。生长时间相对较长，但产量大，很长时间才会变质。需要肥沃的土壤种植。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=生長出一粒粒美味黃色種子的大型作物，需要較長的時間生長，能收穫的糧食非常多，但也需要更長的時間收割。未經烹調的玉米也非常美味。玉米株需要在肥沃的土地上才能良好的生長。
ThingDef.description=Yields cotton, a fine plant fiber used to make cloth.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=产出棉花。一种用于制衣的良好植物纤维。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=長成棉花，用於製作布料。
ThingDef.description=A common small flower. Though it is often considered a weed, it is pleasant to look at.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种常见的野花。因为繁殖迅速一般被当成野草。是一种比较好看的花。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=常見的野花。因為繁殖迅速一般被當成野草。是一種比較好看的花。
ThingDef.description=A beautiful cultivated flower - great for brightening up a drab yard. Must be replanted often.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种漂亮的栽培花卉，将单调的场所变得鲜活起来。必须经常重新种植。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種漂亮的栽培植物，非常適合替單調的院子增添色彩，需要經常重新種植。

ThingDef.description=This fragile mushroom was genetically engineered to produce a silk net of the highest grade. Long rumored to have mystical properties, it owes its name to the greed it inspires in people.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种经过基因工程改造的脆弱蘑菇能够产出最高级的丝质纤维。据传这种蘑菇拥有非常神秘的特性，它的名称源自它在人群中所激发出的贪欲。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種脆弱的蘑菇經過基因改造，能夠生產最頂級的織物纖維。魔鬼菇所具備的神秘特性傳聞已久，因為它的名字，激發出人們的貪婪欲望。
ThingDef.description=Wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=野草，在稍微有点光线和土地的地方就会长出来。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=野草，在稍微有點光線和土地的地方就能發現它的蹤跡。
ThingDef.description=A mixture of nutrient-rich grasses which yield large amounts of hay. Hay is edible for animals, but not humans.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=各种营养丰富的草混合在一起种植，产出大量用于喂养动物的干草。干草是很好的饲料，但对于人类来说难以下咽。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=營養豐富的牧草，做為動物的飼料，人類無法食用。

ThingDef.description=A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.

Healroot was selectively bred for centuries by settlers. It is sometimes also called ""healer's hand"" by tribespeople - a nickname it owes to its five major medicinal virtues.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种生长缓慢的植物，可以收获草药。

已经被殖民者们选择育种了几个世纪。因其五大医疗功效，被部落人誉为「医者之手」。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種植物在幾個世紀間不斷地被星球定居者進行品種改良，收穫時可以獲得藥草。此外，這種藥草擁有的五大療效讓它在部落民之間贏得了「醫師之手」的美名。
ThingDef.description=A flowering plant that yields hops, an essential ingredient in beer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=又名蛇麻草，一种开花植物，产出啤酒花，啤酒原料的必需品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種能夠收穫啤酒花的開花作物，是釀造啤酒不可或缺的重要成分。
ThingDef.description=A wild moss that grows in clumps in areas of low light and high humidity. Very hardy and frost-resistant.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种野生苔藓，在潮湿阴暗的环境下成片生长。适应性强并且十分耐寒。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=苔癬密集生長在低光照且朝濕度的低區，極為耐寒、耐霜凍。
ThingDef.description=A short cactus. So named because it resembles a pincushion.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种矮小的仙人掌。因形似针垫得名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種矮小的仙人掌，因為長得像針墊而得此名。
ThingDef.description=Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=种植装饰性的花朵来提升附近的人的心情。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=農夫會在這裡種植裝飾性的花朵。
ThingDef.description=A simple, highly nutritious tuber. Grows well even in somewhat poor soil. Harvests quickly. A strong, versatile crop.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种简单而营养丰富的块茎植物。即使在比较贫瘠的土地中也能很好地生长。不用多久就能收获。一种强大万能的农作物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種簡單，營養豐富的塊莖作物。在較差的土壤環境中也能正常生長。
ThingDef.description=A leafy plant. Its leaves can be refined into various forms of the psychoid drug.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种多叶植物，叶子可以被精炼制成多种精神药物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種葉片發達的作物，經過提煉成為幾種迷幻藥物的原料。
ThingDef.description=A bushy plant which yields delicious red berries.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=长有好吃的红色浆果的灌木。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種長有可口红莓的灌木。
ThingDef.description=A low grain plant that thrives in rich soil and yields food fast, but is not nice to eat uncooked.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种低矮的谷类植物，肥沃的土壤中茁壮成长，产出粮食很快，但不煮熟的话不好吃。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=在肥沃的土地上生長的小型作物，生長快速，但不適合生食。
ThingDef.description=A beautiful cultivated flower, symbolic of love and romance since ancient times.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种漂亮的栽培花卉，自从远古时代以来就象征着爱情与浪漫。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種漂亮的栽培植物，從遠古時代就是浪漫與愛情的象徵。
ThingDef.description=A large cactus native to arid Earth environments.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=源自地球干旱环境的大型仙人掌。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=源自乾旱地區的大型仙人掌。
ThingDef.description=A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Smokeleaf leaves can be prepared into joints at the crafting spot.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种多叶植物，大麻叶可以在手工加工点处被制成大麻烟。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種葉片發達的藥用作物，有讓人產生心情亢奮的功效。收割下來的菸葉可以在手工製作點加工成捲菸。
ThingDef.description=A fragile but tasty fruit. Delicious even when raw.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种脆弱，但是非常好吃的水果。就算生吃也很可口。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種脆弱，但是非常好吃的水果。就算生吃也很美味，需要肥沃的土地才能正常生長。
ThingDef.description=Wild tall grass. Significantly slows down anyone moving over it.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=野生的高草。任何人从上面走过速度都会明显变慢。
ThingDef.description=A northern tree known for its thin, paper-like bark.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种北方树木，因纸一样的薄树皮而出名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種北方樹種，特色是薄如紙的樹皮。
ThingDef.description=One of the most common rainforest trees. Grows very fast, but yields little usable wood.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=热带雨林里最常见的树之一。生长非常迅速，但产出的可用木材不多。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=最常見的一種熱帶雨林樹木。生長速度非常快。
ThingDef.description=A strong hardwood tree. Slow-going, but its wood is very strong.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种健壮的硬木树。生长缓慢，但是木材非常坚硬。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種硬木樹，生長速度很慢，木材非常堅硬。
ThingDef.description=A softwood tree. Grows fast, but yield little useful wood.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种软木树。生长迅速，但产出的可用木材不多。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種軟木樹，生長迅速，木材較脆弱。
ThingDef.description=A very strong hardwood tree, used in ancient times to build sailing ships.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个非常健壮的硬木树，在远古时用于建造帆船。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種十分堅固的硬木樹，在古代用來建造帆船。

ThingDef.description=A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.

This wild breed of healroot is difficult to cultivate. It is prized by tribespeople in colder climates.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种生长缓慢的植物，可以收获草药。

这种野生品种的药草非常难以培育。在更寒冷的地区为部落民族所重视。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種生長緩慢的植物，採即可獲得藥草。

這種野生品種的藥草難以培育，寒冷地區的部落人民將之視為珍寶。
ThingDef.description=Advanced spacer tech structural material. Plasteel is extremely strong due to its unique molecular structure.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=先进的太空时代结构材料。因其独特的分子结构，玻璃钢拥有极高的强度。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=高科技的航太材料，由於其獨特的分子結構，塑鋼擁有極輕的重量與極高的堅韌度。
ThingDef.description=A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=可以发射单个运输舱的燃料供给端。运输舱发射器可以成组地发射，但必须互相之间紧邻建造。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個附帶燃料槽的發射平台。運輸艙可以批量發射，但發射平台必須相鄰。

ThingDef.description=A great white bear that lives in the far north. Their thick blubber and fur keep them warm in winter.

While their usual diet consists of fish and scavenged meat, the polar bear is more than capable of using its massive strength and deadly claws to kill live prey. They are startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.

ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种生活在极北方的大白熊。它们厚厚的脂肪和皮毛可以在冬季保暖。

虽然它们平时的饮食包括鱼和腐肉，北极熊仍能利用其巨大的力量和致命的爪子杀死活着的猎物。虽然外形如此笨重，但它们却拥有惊人敏捷。

ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種生活在極北方的熊。厚實的脂肪和皮毛幫助牠們抵抗寒冷。

北極熊平時的飲食包含魚和腐肉，但牠們也能夠使用強大的力量和致命的狩獵動物，以這笨重的體型來說，這種動物擁有驚人的速度。
ThingDef.description=Powerful hand replacement consisting of three deadly claws.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种由三个致命利爪组成的强大的手部替代品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=帶有三支致命利爪的強大手臂。
ThingDef.description=A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一组用于传输电力的电缆。可以安装于墙体和其他建筑之下，但不能埋进山体中。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一條用於傳輸電力的電纜線。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=连通/断开电网，决定电流是否能够通过。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=開啟或關閉供電閥切換電源供應。
ThingDef.description=One-use artifact that drives all animals in the region into a manhunting rage.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一次性使用的神器，使当前地区的所有动物进入「猎杀人类」的状态。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個能使全區域的動物都陷入「殺戮」狀態的拋棄式裝置。
ThingDef.description=One-use artifact that drives any character into a berserk state from any distance - even through walls.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一次性使用的神器，能使一个生物进入疯狂状态，没有距离限制——甚至能穿过墙壁。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把能使被擊中者陷入狂暴狀態的拋棄式武器，能從任何地點、任何距離外影響目標，即便有重重牆壁阻隔。
ThingDef.description=One-use artifact that directs psychic disturbances towards one character, dropping them into a state of psychic shock for some time. Large risk of brain damage.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一次性使用的神器，能使一个生物受到心灵冲击，使其进入心灵冲击状态一段时间。有很高几率导致大脑损伤。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一把能對被擊中者在一段時間內產生心靈衝擊的拋棄式武器，有高機率導致被擊中者出現大腦損傷。
ThingDef.description=One-use artifact which gives a temporary mood boost to everyone on the map.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一次性使用的神器，能给当前区域所有人带来暂时的情绪提升。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個能對全區域的人類發送心靈撫慰電波的拋棄式裝置。
ThingDef.description=Raw cut leaves of a psychoid plant.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=从精神叶上收获的新鲜叶子。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=從迷幻草上收穫的新鮮葉片。
ThingDef.description=A small, hardy animal that ranges wide across forests and shrubland. Eats almost anything.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种生存能力很强的小型动物，广泛分布在森林和灌木林间。几乎什么都吃。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種小而強韌的動物，在草原和森林都能發現牠的蹤跡，幾乎什麼都吃。
ThingDef.description=A rodent famous for soiling kitchens and spreading disease. Eats almost anything; lives almost anywhere.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种以污染厨房及传播疾病而闻名的啮齿动物。几乎什么都吃，几乎在哪都能生存下来。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種囓齒類是惡名昭彰的污染來源和傳染病元凶，幾乎什麼都吃，並且無處不在。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=生龙舌兰果。生吃味道很差。
ThingDef.description=Assorted berries. Nice to eat, even when raw.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=各种各样的浆果，就算生吃味道也很好。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=各種各樣的莓果，就算生吃味道也很好。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=生的玉米，味道鮮美，可以生吃。
ThingDef.description=Raw hops. A flavoring and preserving agent that is necessary for making beer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=生的啤酒花。是酿制啤酒时必需的调味剂和保鲜剂。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=生啤酒花。味道糟糕且毫無營養，但卻是釀造啤酒不可或缺的原料。
ThingDef.description=A chemical refining plant. Used to refine wood into chemfuel.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一台大型化工提炼设备。用于从木材中提炼化合燃料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一具化學提煉裝置，用來將木頭提煉加工成化合燃料。
ThingDef.description=This large land mammal is typically quite peaceful, but it will not hesitate to charge with its horn to fend off trespassers.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种大型陆地哺乳动物在绝大多数时候是和平的，但它们会毫不犹豫地用角冲撞并驱赶擅闯领地者。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這個大型陸上哺乳動物通常很溫馴，但牠會毫不猶豫的以其尖角擊退入侵者。
ThingDef.description=A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一张给贵族使用的豪华的，镶金边的床。非常舒适和漂亮。适合双人。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張鑲金的豪華大床，舒適而美觀，給你貴族般的待遇。能夠睡下兩人。
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=作为掩体，降低被远程武器击中的几率。
ThingDef.description=A sedimentary rock composed of sand particles compressed together.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种由砂粒相互挤压胶结所形成的沉积岩。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種由沙粒經過壓縮形成的沉積岩。
ThingDef.description=An ornamented burial receptacle for the honored dead.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=受尊敬的死者用的、装饰华丽的安葬容器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個替光榮犧牲的死者準備的安身之處。
ThingDef.description=A car-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=由一块汽车大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一座汽車大小，使用素材雕刻而成的藝術品。
ThingDef.description=A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=由一块成人大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一座成人高度，使用素材雕刻而成的藝術品。
ThingDef.description=A torso-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=由一块躯干大小的材料塑造而成的艺术品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一座高度及胸，使用素材雕刻而成的藝術品。
ThingDef.description=Hand replacement with a telescoping blade. Scavenged from a dead scyther mechanoid. Not very comfortable, but quite effective as a close-range weapon.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=嵌有镰刃的手部替代品。从机械飞螳上拆下来的。不是很舒服但确实是非常致命的近战武器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用刀片取代手臂，並非非常舒適，但作為一個近戰武器是相當有效的。
ThingDef.description=Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=储存于此的物品即使露天也不会老化。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=儲存在此的物品能夠避免摔壞，無論室內室外。
ThingDef.description=A structural beam around which a ship can be constructed.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一根用来支撑飞船其他部分的结构梁，在其周围能建造飞船。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個用來銜接星艦各部位組件的結構住。
ThingDef.description=A computer core capable of housing a superhumanlike AI who can guide a ship through any challenge.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个电脑核心，装载有类似于超人一般的人工智能，可以带领飞船经受任何挑战。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以搭載星艦導航AI的電腦核心。

ThingDef.description=A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个经过强化可以抵抗太空中威胁的低温休眠舱。可以维持一个人在太空中持续休眠几个世纪并可以安全再入大气层。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以抵抗太空中危險的強化低溫休眠艙。可以维持一個人在太空中持續休眠幾個世纪並可以安全的再次進入大氣層。
ThingDef.description=An engine capable of launching a ship into orbit and on interstellar trajectories.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一台可将飞船送入星球轨道和星际轨道的推进器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以將星艦送入星球軌道和星際轉移軌道的反物質推進器。
ThingDef.description=Powers a ship on its journey through space.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=在太空的漫长旅途中给飞船提供能量。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=供應星艦在漫長星際旅途中所需的能源。
ThingDef.description=A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful steel and components.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=飞船的一部分。可以拆出有用的钢材和零部件。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一塊星艦的殘骸，拆除後可回收鋼鐵和電子零件。
ThingDef.description=This metal is mostly used as a commodity currency. It can also be used for making attractive decorations.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种金属主要用作通用货币。也可以用来制作引人注目的装饰品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種金屬主要被作為貨幣使用，同時也能夠用來製作一些奢華的物品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=簡單而耐用的手臂義肢。
ThingDef.description=Simple prosthesis made to replace missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用来替换缺失的腿的假肢，不是很舒服但是相当有效。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用來取代失去的腿部的義肢，穿戴起來並不是非常舒適，但工作上擁有不錯的效率。
ThingDef.description=A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个配有书写工具和低级科学工具的简易工作台。研究员在这里探索新事物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一張備有書寫工具及簡單研究設備的桌子，研究人員在這裡發掘新事物。
ThingDef.description=A dark-colored metamorphic rock. Its fine layers are emblematic of slaty cleavage.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种暗色的变性岩。岩石上的精细分层是板岩劈理的特征。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種深色的變質岩。明顯的分層是它的象徵。
ThingDef.description=Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=在地板上指定一个给人睡觉的位置。很不舒服。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=指定一個供居民睡覺的地點，睡起來可不怎麼舒服。

ThingDef.description=Smokeleaf leaves prepared in small rolls for smoking. The drug improves mood, but also increases appetite, reduces focus and slows movement. Smokeleaf use can produce a dependency. Can be produced without equipment, at a crafting spot.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=大麻叶卷成的烟卷。这种烟卷会让人兴奋，但是也会成瘾，减缓使用者的注意力和行动速度，长期使用会产生药物依赖。大麻烟可在手工加工点制作。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=將菸葉捲成條狀後吸食。捲菸能提振心情，但會增加食慾、降低專注力與移動速度，並可能上癮。捲菸可在手工製作點徒手製作。
ThingDef.description=Raw cut leaves of a smokeleaf plant. Can be rolled into smokeable joint at a crafting spot.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=从大麻上收获的新鲜叶子，可以在手工加工点处被制成大麻烟。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=從菸草上收割來的菸葉，能在手工製作點加工成捲菸。
ThingDef.description=This hardy animal survives the brutal winters of the north by burrowing through snow and finding prey underneath, or hibernating the worst days away.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种耐寒动物在雪地下钻洞、寻找食物以及在最糟糕的几个月中冬眠，以此在北方残酷的冬天生存下来。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這耐寒的小傢伙透過挖掘積雪至地表覓食，或是躲起來冬眠以度過北方的寒冬。
ThingDef.description=A set of large snowballs piled and shaped to resemble a person.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一组大雪球堆叠在一起，做成类似人的形状。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用幾顆大雪球堆疊成如人的形狀。
ThingDef.description=Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=利用太阳光来发电，在阳光不足时不工作，人工光源无法用作发电。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用陽光發電，但在缺乏陽光時無法工作。
ThingDef.description=A medium-sized bioengineered bug the size of a sheep. The spelopede is the middle caste of a hive, taking care of most work tasks as well as fighting with its claws.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种经过基因改造的中型昆虫，大小如羊一般。穴居阔步虫是虫巢系统中的中级阶层，它的钳子除了战斗，还负责大部分工作任务的处理。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這種生化工程製造出的蟲族有和羊等大的體型。穴行蟲在蟲穴中屬於中層階級，包辦大多數的工作並用牠的爪子保衛蟲巢。
ThingDef.description=One of the many hardy, versatile rodent species that follows humankind everywhere it spreads.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=适应力强并且多才多艺的啮齿动物之一，随着人类被散布到宇宙的各个角落。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=許多由人類帶到宇宙各個地方的鼠類動物之一。
ThingDef.description=Standing lamp that lights an area.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮的落地灯。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以點亮一小塊區域的立燈。
ThingDef.description=Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮成蓝色的落地灯。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以把一小塊區域點亮成藍色的立燈。
ThingDef.description=Standing lamp that lights an area in green.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮成绿色的落地灯。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以把一小塊區域點亮成綠色的立燈。
ThingDef.description=Standing lamp that lights an area in red.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮成红色的落地灯。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以把一小塊區域點亮成红色的立燈。
ThingDef.description=An iron-carbon metal alloy used for building structures, tools, and weapons.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种铁碳合金，可以用来建造建筑、工具或武器的多用途材料。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=加入碳元素提高堅硬度的鋼鐵合金，可用來生產武器、建造建築與設備。
ThingDef.description=A simple platform on which to sit.
ThingDef.description=Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮到足以种植农作物，但需要消耗大量电力。夜晚时会自动关闭。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=為一整片區域提供足以讓植物生長的亮光。
ThingDef.description=Spacer-tech synthetic fabric designed for making ordinary clothes. It is soft, light, strong, and insulates well.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=太空时代的合成纤维，一般用于制作衣物。柔软、轻盈、坚固，并且有很好的隔温性。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=以太空科技合成纖維材料製成的衣物，輕盈、柔軟、耐用，而且絕緣良好。
ThingDef.description=A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个用于将死掉的动物宰成肉块的厚重桌子。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個用來將死亡的動物屠宰成肉塊的重型桌子。
ThingDef.description=People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=当有椅子面对桌子的时候，人们会在桌子上进餐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=人們會坐在對著桌子的椅子上用餐。
ThingDef.description=A work station for assembling and disassembling machinery such as guns or mechanoid corpses.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用于组装和拆解机械装置的平台，比如枪械和机械体尸体。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一套專門在組裝或拆解機械用的桌子與工具。
ThingDef.description=A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个配备有雕刻工具的平台。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=專門進行雕刻工作的桌子。
ThingDef.description=People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=当有椅子面对桌子的时候，人们会在桌子上进餐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=人們會坐在對著桌子的椅子上用餐。
ThingDef.description=A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个配备有切石工具的工作台。用于把不规则的岩石切割成可用的石块。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個裝有切割設備的機床。用於把粗糙的石塊加工成石材。
ThingDef.description=A telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing and fun hobby for a certain kind of person.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个业余的天文望远镜。某一类人作为兴趣爱好和放松心情之用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=提供給天文愛好者觀賞星空的望遠鏡。對於有這類興趣的人來說，這是個輕鬆的消遣。

ThingDef.description=A gigantic creature of unknown origin. The thrumbo is gentle by nature, but extremely dangerous when enraged. Its long fur is exceptionally beautiful and valuable, and its razor-sharp horn is very valuable in most markets. Legends say that an old thrumbo is the wisest creature in the universe - it simply chooses not to speak.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种来源不明的巨型生物。敲击兽生性温和，但被激怒后极其危险。其长毛异常美丽和珍贵，锋利的角在大多数市场中非常贵重。传说古老的敲击兽是宇宙中最聪明的生物，只是选择了不说话。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種起源未知的巨大生物，天性溫和，但其憤怒時極其危險。牠的毛皮美麗且珍貴，鋒利如刃的角在市場中更是無價之寶。傳說獨角獸的長者是宇宙中最具智慧的生物，只是他們選擇了不說話。
ThingDef.description=A thrumbo's horn. It's razor-sharp, very hard and priceless in most markets. This is a true trophy.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=敲击兽的角，锋利、坚固，在大多数市场里都是极为贵重的。这是真正意义上的战利品。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=獨角獸的角，如刀刃般鋒利，至高的無價之寶。最適合做為能力的象徵。
ThingDef.description=Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=提高工作速度。需要放置在工作台附近。一个工作台最多可以同时连接两个工具柜。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=提升工作台工作速度。工具櫃必須設置於工作台附近，一張工作台同時可與兩個工具櫃連結。
ThingDef.description=A wooden torch for lighting an area. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将一片区域照亮的木制火把。能自动添加原木作燃料。产生少量的热。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=用火作為光線來源的設備，需要定期添加木頭燃料，會產生少許熱。
ThingDef.description=This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=这种身披重甲的陆栖爬行动物因他们缓慢的速度和致命的咬击而闻名。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=這個背負著沉重甲殼的陸生爬行動物，以緩慢的移動速度和驚人的狠咬著名。
ThingDef.description=A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=可运输人员、物品和动物的可发射亚轨道远程货运舱。可用于运输、奇袭或者增援战场。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個可以裝載人員、物資及動物的莢艙，可以用來運輸、突襲或支援戰鬥。
ThingDef.description=A suspended spiked weight held up by a delicate trigger. When the victim disturbs the trigger, the weight is released and falls on his head or torso.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用一个巧妙的触发机关将重物悬停在高处。当受害人触发机关时，重物掉下砸在他的头或躯干上。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個敏感的觸發裝置連接著懸吊於高處的尖刺陷阱，當受害者觸發陷阱，陷阱將會從他的頭頂落下。

ThingDef.description=A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用一个自制的触发机关连接到迫击炮炮弹上。当有人触发机关时炮弹会爆炸。简易的机关在触发时会有随机的延迟，可能会让一些灵活的敌人逃走。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一顆砲彈連接著一個自製的觸發裝置，當裝置被觸發，隨即會引爆砲彈。觸發裝置的延遲時機是隨機的，敏捷的敵人有可能藉此逃脫。
ThingDef.description=Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=将炸药与燃烧剂经过混合，然后采用化学引信引爆。这种化学引信简单可靠。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種混合了易燃藥劑的燃燒彈，當受害者觸發了裝置，被點燃的藥劑會立刻四散。因為它不需要強烈的爆炸性，而且只用了簡單的化學反應來觸發，是一種十分可靠的的爆炸裝置。
ThingDef.description=A cathode ray tube display for showing moving pictures with sound. Even on the rimworlds, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=用阴极射线管显示器显示运动图像和声音。即使在边缘世界，也经常有个老旧发射塔发送一些有趣的玩意。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一台用來放映影像及聲音的舊型機器，在RimWorld裡，這算是稍微有趣的娛樂媒介。
ThingDef.description=A short, fat, flightless bird known for its hilarious 'gobbling' call. It has been long domesticated, but also lives in the wild.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种矮胖的不会飞的鸟类，以其滑稽的「咯咯」叫声而闻名。火鸡已经被驯化了很长时间，但也有野生的种群。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種體型小而肥、無飛行能力的鳥類，最大的特色就是牠吵鬧的「咕咕」叫聲。被人類圈養的歷史已非常久遠，但仍可在野外發現牠們的蹤跡。
ThingDef.description=A mortar that launches explosive shells. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个发射高爆炮弹的迫击炮。必须有人操纵。受损严重时爆炸。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個發射炮彈的迫擊炮，必須由人來操縱。被摧毀後會引起爆炸。
ThingDef.description=A mortar that launches EMP bombs. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个发射电磁脉冲（EMP）炮弹的迫击炮。必须有人操纵。受损严重时爆炸。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個發射電磁脈衝炸彈的迫擊炮，對付機器人時特別有效，必須由人來操縱。被摧毀後會引起爆炸。
ThingDef.description=A mortar that launches incendiary shells. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个发射燃烧炮弹的迫击炮。必须有人操纵。受损严重时爆炸。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個發射燃燒炮弹的迫擊炮，必須由人來操縱。被摧毀後會引起爆炸。

ThingDef.description=An improvised turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Explodes when damaged. Its hacked-together AI brain isn't very smart, and can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一台东拼西凑的的机枪炮塔，会自动射击附近的敌人，被摧毁后会爆炸。它所用的拼凑而成的人工智能大脑不是很聪明，也没法被直接控制，因此要当心误伤。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個威力較弱的炮塔，在敵人靠近時會自動開火。被摧毀後會引起爆炸。

ThingDef.description=An extremely hard, dense metal. While it is best known for its use powering nuclear reactors, its physical properties also make it excellent in some roles as a tool, weapon, or armor.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种硬度密度极高的金属。虽然它因为给核反应堆提供能量而闻名，但它的物理特性亦使其在作为工具、武器或者护甲用途时表现优异。
ThingDef.description=A simple vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个简单的通风孔，在平衡两个房间的温度同时保持墙体无法通过。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一個簡單的風扇，用於調節兩個房間之間的室溫。人們無法通過空調扇往來兩個房間。
ThingDef.description=Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=提高患者的治疗质量。需要放置在毗邻医疗床的位置。一个医疗床只能连接一个生命体征监测仪。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=提升患者醫療品質。檢測器必須與醫療床相鄰，一張醫療床同時只能與一台生命體徵檢測器連結。

ThingDef.description=An addictive stimulant. Fills the need for rest, and allows users to work for extended periods without getting tired. Addiction causes reduced mental performance and, sometimes, psychotic breaks with reality.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种成瘾性极强的兴奋剂，清醒丸能够强化使用者的认知能力，使得服用者在短时期内工作时更加集中，忘记疲劳。但是药物成瘾后会使得精神受损，有时还会导致精神崩溃。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種會致癮的興奮劑。能夠補足休息需求，讓居民能夠長時間持續工作。成癮後會導致負面心情，還有可能會精神崩潰。
ThingDef.description=An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一面无法通过的墙。可以支撑起屋顶。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一面無法穿越的牆，可以用來支撐屋頂。

ThingDef.description=Heavily-muscled wolf-like creatures. Scientists say wargs are the descendants of weaponized military animals created for population suppression. The superstitious see them as the tools of an angry god. They will only eat meat or corpses.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=肌肉非常发达的类狼生物。科学家说，座狼是为了抑制人口专门而创造的军用武器级动物的后代。迷信的人把它视为一件愤怒的神的工具。他们只吃肉和新鲜的尸体。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=肌肉發達的類狼生物。科學家表示，座狼是人造的軍用生物，用以控制人口成長。而某些迷信者則相信牠們是憤怒的神明派遣而來的使徒。牠們只吃肉類與屍體。
ThingDef.description=Electromagnetic pulse grenades damaging to electronic equipment.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=电磁脉冲（EMP）手榴弹可以对电子设备造成损害。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=電磁脈衝炸彈可以對電子設備造成極大影響。
ThingDef.description=Glass bottles filled with flammable liquid, with a burning cloth in the neck. A favorite weapon of hooligans and desperate warriors from rim to rim.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=装有易燃液体的玻璃瓶，瓶口有一块燃烧的布。恶棍的最爱武器。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=裝有易燃液體的玻璃瓶，瓶口有一塊燃燒的布。屬於惡棍的最愛。
ThingDef.description=Although considered impure by some cultures, this hairy ancestor of the domesticated pig is prized for the gamey flavor of its meat.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=尽管在某些文化里这是不洁的动物，这种长毛的家猪祖先因为它们味道浓烈的肉而备受青睐。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=雖然被某些文化被視為不潔​​，這種家豬的毛茸茸祖先的價值在於牠野生的味道。
ThingDef.description=A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一个风力驱动的发电机，前后需要较大的空旷空间，以获得最理想的气流。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=利用風力產生電力的發電設備，其前後必須保持開闊以便空氣流通。
ThingDef.description=An arctic variant of the old Earth wolf. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种生存在古老地球上的狼的极地变种。作为群体捕猎的动物，北极狼拥有复杂的社会结构，而且非常聪明。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=雪狼屬於灰狼的極地品種，作為群居動物，具有複雜的社會系統並且非常聰明。
ThingDef.description=A rugged predator long feared by many ancient Earth cultures. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=森林狼、大灰狼，一种强健的肉食动物，一直以来被许多古老地球文明所畏惧。狼作为群体性猎食动物动物，具有复杂的社会结构，而且非常聪明。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=自古以來便受到許多古老地球文化敬畏的天生獵人，作為群居動物，具有複雜的社會系統而且非常聰明。
ThingDef.description=Wood from trees or other fibrous plants. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=源自树或其他纤维性植物的木材。可以用来建造建筑、武器甚至简单的假肢。一根原木做的木棒在危急时刻也能作为武器使用。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=從樹木或是其他木本植物採伐得來。用來建造建築、武器，甚至簡單的義肢。木材的原料，可在緊要關頭做為武器使用。
ThingDef.description=The remarkably soft wool of an alpaca. It is very warm.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=非常柔软的羊驼毛。非常保暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=The remarkably soft wool of an alpaca. It is very warm.
ThingDef.description=Camelhair clothing is usually worn by desert travelers to protect them from the heat. It provides excellent insulation due to its thermostatic properties.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=骆驼毛服装通常被沙漠旅行者穿戴以抵御炎热。由于它的恒温特性，它提供了良好的隔温性。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=Camelhair clothing is usually worn by desert travelers to protect them from the heat. It provides excellent insulation due to its thermostatic properties.
ThingDef.description=While somewhat coarse, megasloth wool's long fibers make it very strong. It is very warm.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=虽然有点粗糙，巨型树懒毛的长纤维使其非常坚固，非常保暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=While somewhat coarse, megasloth wool's long fibers make it very strong. It is very warm.
ThingDef.description=Soft, light and provides very good insulation. Wool clothes can keep the body warm even in extreme conditions.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=柔软、轻盈，并有很好的隔温性。即使在极端条件下，牦牛毛衣服也可以保持身体温暖。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=Soft, light and provides very good insulation. Wool clothes can keep the body warm even in extreme conditions.
ThingDef.description=Beer before fermentation. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable beer.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=各种材料混合在一起，还未发酵的啤酒，需要放在发酵桶里酿造后才能变成真正的啤酒。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=尚未釀造的啤酒原料。麥汁需要被裝進釀酒桶中發酵才能成為可飲用的啤酒。
ThingDef.description=A fine white powder snorted to produce a euphoric high. Yayo reduces the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. It is, however, addictive.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种精细的白色粉末，用鼻子吸入后可以使人高度兴奋，服用者会精神倍增并且能够抑制疼痛。但是却极易成瘾。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種粉末狀的藥物，吸食後會產生強大的亢奮效果。Y他命能降低使用者的休息需求並減輕痛覺，當然，還有高度成癮性。
ThingDef.description=A small, even-tempered dog. Originally bred to hunt rats, it later became a show and companionship animal.
ThingDef.description.zh-cn=一种性情温顺的小型犬。它最初培育用于猎杀鼠类，后来变成了一种观赏和伴侣型动物。
ThingDef.description.zh-tw=一種個性溫和的小型犬，原本被飼養來狩獵老鼠之類的小型獵物，後逐漸轉變成為玩賞犬。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of drinking.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=感觉天旋地转，所有事情都糟透了，我还想再喝一口。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我感覺頭昏腦脹，看什麼都不順眼。我只想著再喝個幾杯。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=That ambrosia makes me feel a little bit more relaxed, but with more energy too.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=仙馐果让我感到一点点放松，但也更有精力了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=That ambrosia makes me feel a little bit more relaxed, but with more energy too.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I just feel heavy and cold all the time. I never thought I'd want a piece of fruit so much.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我总是感觉沉沉的，还发冷。我从来没像这样想再来一片果子。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=I just feel heavy and cold all the time. I never thought I'd want a piece of fruit so much.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My outfit is looking pretty bad. Can't I get something decent to wear?
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的衣服看起来有点破，我就不能有件体面的衣服吗？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的衣服破爛不堪，難道我不能穿件體面點的衣服嗎？
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm wearing a tattered piece of trash. Can't I get something decent to wear?
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我的衣服就是几条破布，我就不能有件体面的衣服吗？
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我正穿著的只能算是衣服的碎片，難道我不能穿件體面點的衣服嗎？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I feel strange, but also very relaxed.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我有种奇怪的感觉，但同时这感觉又让我很放松。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我有種奇妙的感覺，不過這讓我感到放鬆。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的卧室就应该是这个样子，简单，虔诚。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我正是想要這樣的房間，簡單又低調。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我的卧室就应该是这个样子，简单，虔诚。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我正是想要這樣的房間，簡單又低調。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=My bedroom is very humble and simple. I like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我的卧室简单又虔诚，我喜欢。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我的房間簡單又低調，我喜歡。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.10.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.10.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.10.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.11.label.zh-cn=令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
ThoughtDef.stages.11.description=I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.11.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to eat a disgusting, tasteless meal. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不得不吃下一顿又恶心又没味道的饭，我知道这是为了活下去，但是真的是没法下咽。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了噁心又無味的食物，我知道這能讓我活下去，但真的沒有人願意吃這玩意兒。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to eat a corpse without even butchering or cooking it. It was horrible.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不得不像动物一样吃尸体，真是太特么恶心了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我不得不像動物一樣去啃食屍體，這簡直是惡夢！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我吃了一份很不错的食物，好吃！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了一份很不錯的料理，美味！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我吃了用人肉作出的饭，这简直太可怕了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了用人肉作出的料理，這簡直太可怕了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. So pleasurable. If only I had some fava beans and a nice chianti.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我吃了用人肉作出的饭，味道好极了。要是配上蚕豆和红酒就更好了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了用人肉作出的料理，味道棒極了。若能配上些蠶豆和紅酒就更棒了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我像野兽一样吃了一个人的肉，生的。这简直是个噩梦。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了一個人的肉，生的，就像一只動物一樣。這簡直是個惡夢。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. It was so... succulent.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我像野兽一样吃了一个人的肉，生的。那肉实在是鲜美多汁，太棒了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了一個人的肉，生的，就像一只動物一樣。這簡直太棒了。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I ate my meal in a decent dining room.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我在一间体面的餐厅吃的饭。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I ate my meal in a slightly impressive dining room.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人小有印象的餐厅吃的饭。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=I ate my meal in an impressive dining room.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象有些深刻的餐厅吃的饭。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我在一個充滿驚喜的地方用餐。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=I ate my meal in a very impressive dining room.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象非常深刻的餐厅吃的饭。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人印象深刻的地方用餐。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=I ate my meal in an extremely impressive dining room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象极度深刻的餐厅吃的饭，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人無法忘懷的地方用餐。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=I ate my meal in an unbelievably impressive dining room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人难以置信的餐厅吃的饭，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人難以置信的地方用餐，要我永遠待在這裡都願意。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=I ate my meal in a wonderful dining room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我在一间最好的餐厅吃的饭，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我在世界上最棒的餐廳用餐，要我永遠待在這裡都願意。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in there that I can't identify.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我吃了一顿由那种灰灰的发粘的虫子肉做成的饭，尽管调料掩盖了部分味道，但是我还是吃到了很多诡异的囊泡。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了蟲肉作成的料理，雖然調味醬汁已經蓋過了部分味道，但因為和一堆昆蟲分泌物混在一起，我也分不太出來。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我生吃了一些那种灰灰的发粘的虫子的肉，这可能，是我这辈子吃过的，最特么恶心的玩意了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了生的蟲肉，這真是史上最噁心的東西。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不得不吃下动物饲料。感觉如同我没法再做人一般。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我只有飼料能吃，好像我是頭畜牲一樣。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这食物简直太棒了，我觉得我的身体和灵魂都被滋养了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這料理簡直太棒了，我覺得我的身體和靈魂都被滋養了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to eat raw food. Can't we cook it, or at least synthesize some nutrient paste?
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不得不吃下生的食物，难道我们就不能稍微烹饪一下，甚至合成一些营养膏也好啊？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我只有生的東西可以吃。難道我們就不能稍微烹飪一下，至少合成一些營養膏也好啊？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I ate some disgusting, putrid food. It was melting in my mouth - but not in a good way.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我吃了一些变质腐烂的食物。它在我嘴里融化，让我很难受。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我吃了噁心、發霉的食物，真是個不愉快的體驗。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to eat a meal off the ground. Can't we get a table around here?
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不得不在地上吃饭。我们不能弄张桌子吗？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我不得不在地上用餐。我們不能弄個桌子嗎？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had a good time at that party.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It was great to see two people come together to build a future like that.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=看着两个人能走在一起共同为未来而努力真的是一件幸福的事情。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我很高興見證兩人牽手步向未來。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My bonded animal was abandoned in the middle of nowhere!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的牵绊动物被抛弃在了荒无人烟的地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的動物夥伴被拋棄在茫茫荒野之中。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=它是那么温柔又独一无二，命运真是太残酷了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=牠是那麼的討人喜歡，命運真是太殘酷了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Being together with my bonded animal makes me feel better.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=跟我的牵绊动物在一起让我感觉很好。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=和我的動物夥伴在一起讓我感覺好一些。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I hate shooting from a distance. I want to get up close and personal!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我可讨厌远程攻击敌人了。我想和敌人正面单挑！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=噁...我討厭拿著會射出東西的武器，我要一把肉搏武器！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I was just dumped like a load of garbage.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我就像一包垃圾一样被甩了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I butchered someone up like an animal.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我把一個人像動物一樣屠宰了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我在这里被关了好几天了，我必须要出去。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我在這裡被囚禁好幾天了，我想要出去！
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside!
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我像只老鼠一样在这里被困了好久了。我要是再不出去就要发疯了！
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我像隻老鼠一樣在這裡被困了好久了。我要是再不出去就要發瘋了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It felt good to finally unbottle my feelings.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=把压力发泄出来的感觉真是不错。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我剛做了什麼？那不是我，我明明可以做得更好的。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=How could someone cheat on me!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm a nudist but I have to wear these clothes. It's not unbearable - but I still feel constrained and uncomfortable.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我崇尚裸体主义，但是我却不得不穿着衣服。虽然能勉强忍受，但我就是觉得浑身难受也不自由。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我是個裸體主義者，但我竟然得穿著衣服。雖然不是無法忍受，但我仍感覺綁手綁腳而且十分不舒服。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We just left someone behind. I hope they'll make it, but I'm worried.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们刚刚把某些人抛下了。我希望他们能好好，但我实在担心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們剛拋下了某些人，我很擔心，只希望他們能堅持下去。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We left someone behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们刚刚就这样把某些人抛下了，他们几乎不可能活下来。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們在幾乎沒有生還可能的情況下拋棄了某些人，他們幾乎不可能活下來。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们中的一员去世了，然而尸体就那么放在露天里。没人应该被这样对待。死者需要有一个体面的葬礼。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有同伴去逝了而我們卻將屍體留在這裡。沒人應該受到這種待遇。死者最起碼要被埋起来。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I am wearing apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我穿着一件死人的衣服。这让我毛骨悚然，总觉得有什么脏东西。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我現在穿的其中一件衣物是從某個死人身上剝下來的，光想就讓人背脊發涼，真是噁心。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我穿着两件死人的衣服。这让我毛骨悚然，总觉得有什么脏东西。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我現在穿的其中兩件衣物是從某個死人身上剝下來的，光想就讓人背脊發涼，真是噁心。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我穿着三件死人的衣服。这让我毛骨悚然，总觉得有什么脏东西。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我現在穿的其中三件衣物是從某個死人身上剝下來的，光想就讓人背脊發涼，真是噁心。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I am wearing more than three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我穿着好几件死人的衣服。这让我毛骨悚然，总觉得有什么脏东西。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我現在穿的好幾件衣物是從某個死人身上剝下來的，光想就讓人背脊發涼，真是噁心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=They were leading efforts to destroy us, and I took them down!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=他们被带领着妄图摧毁我们，然后我解决了他们！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=他們打算毀滅我們，而我把他們打得落花流水！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I took down a big threat! I'm a hero!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我解决了一个大威胁！我是英雄！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我擊潰了敵方的攻擊！我是英雄！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We made a commitment, and they just tore it apart.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=曾经的山盟海誓，在现实面前狗屁都不是。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們達成了協議。現在，我們之間再無瓜葛...。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm so cold. Shivering. Can't get warm.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我好冷啊，一直在发抖，身体暖和不起来。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=My teeth are chatting so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我上下牙齿一直控制不住地在打架，几乎无法说话，我脚指头已经全木了，我需要取暖。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我的牙齒不停打顫，連話都說不清；我的腳趾已經沒有任何感覺了，我需要取暖！
