ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我已经在黑暗中待了一段时间了。我不太喜欢这样。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我已經在黑暗中待了一段時間了。我不太喜歡這樣。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=This heat is unpleasant. I'm sweating.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这温度让人不太舒服，我在出汗。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這個溫度熱得讓人不高興，我汗流浹背了。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=感觉我就在一个烤箱里，我说不准我还能坚持多久。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我感覺身在烤箱，我不確定我還能忍受多久...
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I'm burning up. I think I could die from this heat!
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我快要被烤熟了，在这种温度下我肯定会死的。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我感覺快要燒來起了，我覺得我會就這樣烤焦。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Someone I don't like tried to romance me.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我不喜欢的人想要和我谈恋爱。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=某個我不喜歡的人向我告白了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=For no apparent reason, I just feel great right now.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=没有什么特别的原因，我现在就是觉得超级开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=不知道什麼原因，我的心情特別好。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=For no apparent reason, I just feel good right now.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=没有什么特别的原因，我现在就是觉得挺开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=不知道什麼原因，我的心情不錯。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=For no apparent reason, I just feel bad right now.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=没有什么特别的原因，我现在就是不太爽。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=不知道什麼原因，我的心情不好。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=For no apparent reason, I just feel terrible right now.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=没有什么特别的原因，我现在心情就是特别低落。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=不知道什麼原因，我的心情特別差。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm a teetotaler; I would never take drugs by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我厌恶成瘾品。我绝对不会出于自己选择地服用成瘾品。但我被强迫了！我觉得我不洁了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我是無癮主義者，若非被強迫才不可能會用毒品！我覺得我被玷汙了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm a prosthophobe; I would never take luciferium by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我恐惧仿生学。我绝对不会出于自己选择地服用路西法合剂。但我被强迫了！我觉得我不洁了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我是仿生排斥者，若非被強迫才不可能會用毒品！我覺得我被玷汙了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Feeling pumped but calm. I am the sniper bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=感觉棒极了，但是非常冷静，我是战场中致命的子弹，随时准备取你性命。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=Feeling pumped but calm. I am the sniper bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy, I'm tired and hungry, everything hurts. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=简直昏头了，无法正常思考，我的腿变得好沉重，浑身上下都疼痛难忍，为什么我的眼睛什么也看不清？
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我的腦袋一片混亂，完全不能好好思考。四肢無力，又累又餓、全身痠痛。為什麼我的視線就是無法對焦！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I got married! Life is full of possibility!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我结婚了！我的未来充满了动力！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=There's nothing like a tumble between the sheets to lift the mood.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=再也没有什么比滚床单更开心了，嘿嘿！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=再也沒有其他事比得上滾床單了，爽！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.label.zh-cn=没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm greedy. I want a really impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我很贪婪。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我很貪心，我想要更高檔的房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.label.zh-cn=没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm greedy. My room is pathetic! I want a really impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我很贪婪。我的房间很可怜！我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我很貪心，我的房間也太可憐了，我想要更高檔的房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.label.zh-cn=没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I'm greedy. My room isn't nearly good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我很贪婪。我的房间很不好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我很貪心，我的房間算不上好，我想要更高檔的房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.label.zh-cn=没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I'm greedy. My room isn't good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我很贪婪。我的房间不够好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我很貪心，我的房間遠遠不夠好，我想要更高檔的房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.label.zh-cn=没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I'm greedy. My room isn't quite good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我很贪婪。我的房间还是不够好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我很貪心，我的房間還不夠好，我想要更高檔的房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=What the world needs is more plants!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个世界最需要的就是更多植物！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這個世界需要的就是多一些、更多一些植物！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我裸体我快乐！我感到如此的自由和不受约束，感受到与四周环境的紧密结合！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我愛裸體！我感到無拘無束，和環境好親密。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It's so wonderful to be starting a new life together!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=能一起开始一段新的生活真的是太棒了！
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm stuck in a dull hospital.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My hospital is slightly impressive. It makes me feel a bit better.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的医务室看起来是个好地方，让我感觉好点了。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我住的醫院還挺新奇的，讓我感覺好點了。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=My hospital is impressive. It makes me feel better.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我的医务室令人印象深刻，让我感觉好多了。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我住的醫院令人驚奇，讓我感覺好多了。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.label.zh-cn=令人印象非常深刻的医务室
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=My hospital is very impressive. It makes me feel better.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我的医务室令人印象非常深刻，让我感觉好多了。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我住的醫院令人印象深刻，讓我感覺好多了。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.label.zh-cn=令人印象极度深刻的医务室
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=My hospital is extremely impressive. It makes me feel better already.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我的医务室令人印象极度深刻，待在这样的地方让我感觉已经康复了。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我住的醫院令人無法忘懷，光是這樣就讓我感覺好多了！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=My hospital is unbelievably impressive. It makes me feel better already.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我的医务室真是令人难以置信，待在这样的地方让我感觉已经康复了。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我住的醫院令人難以置信，光是這樣就讓我感覺好多了！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=My hospital is wonderful! It makes me feel better already.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我的医务室是一个人能想象出来的最好的地方，待在这样的地方让我感觉已经康复了。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我的醫院太完美了，光是這樣就讓我感覺好多了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=别人的苦难作为衣服真是享受。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=This will scare them. All will know my power.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=这可以吓到他们。所有人都会知道我的厉害。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我衣服上的脸并没有在笑，但他们令我愉悦。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=穿着人皮真是渗人。谁能做到？
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm dressed like an insane person.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh, no, my clothes *are* a face.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我想我的衣服上可能有一张脸。哦，不，我的衣服就是一张脸。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我看起来就像恐怖片里的怪胎，而且我感觉我就在恐怖片里。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=My head hurts from all that liquor.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=这感觉就像一群鹅在啄我的头。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=這感覺就像有一群鵝猛力的叮啄我的頭骨。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=喝了点酒后我感觉轻松了一点。那太好了。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=喝了這瓶酒以後我感到放鬆多了，真是不錯。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我有点摇晃！这是相当愉快的。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我有點搖搖晃晃，哇！這真是超過癮！
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我感觉如此的不羁和无所畏惧！这是一个伟大的时代！
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我感到豪放又無懼！這真是個美妙的時刻！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我想吐，头好晕，一切都在旋转。耳朵嗡嗡嗡响个不停，我不能控制自己的方向。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=嗚呼~~整個世界都在翻轉，我的手腳不聽使喚，到底發生了什麼事？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I've been directly insulted! What an awful person!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我被羞辱了！這討人厭的傢伙。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I need to have the best one!
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I had fun in a decent rec room.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我在一间体面的娱乐室玩的很开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I had fun in a nice rec room.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我在一间不错的娱乐室玩的很开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=I had a great time in an impressive rec room.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象有些深刻的娱乐室度过了一段美妙的时光。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我在一個充滿驚喜的地方遊玩。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=I had a great time in a very impressive rec room.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象非常深刻的娱乐室度过了一段美妙的时光。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人印象深刻的地方遊玩。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=I had a great time in an extremely impressive rec room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人印象极度深刻的娱乐室度过了一段美妙的时光，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人無法忘懷的地方遊玩。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=I had a great time in an unbelievably impressive rec room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我在一间令人难以置信的娱乐室度过了一段美妙的时光，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我在一個令人難以置信的地方遊玩，要我永遠待在這裡都願意。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=I had a great time in a wonderful rec room. I could stay there forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我在一间最好的娱乐室度过了一段美妙的时光，我都不想回来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我在世界上最棒的娛樂室遊玩，要我永遠待在這裡都願意。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I killed someone! What a rush!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我剛剛殺了人，這實在是太爽了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I've been bestowed with kind words! What a nice person!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=有人对我说了一些关怀的话！这人真好！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=This colony buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. May their soul rest in peace.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地刚刚将人埋在华丽的棺材当中，愿其灵魂能够安息。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們把人好好的安葬在華麗的棺材內，願他的靈魂安息。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We butchered someone up like an animal.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们把人像动物一样屠宰了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們把人像動物一樣宰殺了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们中的一员死了，我们本应照料好自己人。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們失去了一名同伴。我們應該多關心居民們的狀況。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=某位殖民者被处决了，虽然合理，但是还是让人悲伤。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有犯罪的居民被處死了，這是正義的制裁，但仍然感到遺憾。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=某位殖民者被安乐死了，虽然还算人性，但是还是让人悲伤。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=有居民被安樂死了，這雖然非常人道，但仍然感到遺憾。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=A colonist was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=某位殖民者被冷血的杀害了。这个殖民地似乎一天比一天更邪恶了。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=有居民被冷血的處決了，真是殘忍。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.label.zh-tw=有居民因器官被摘除而死亡了
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=某位殖民者因为被摘取了器官而死去，这太可怕了。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=有居民因器官被摘除而死亡了，真是邪惡。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.label.zh-tw=得知有居民的器官被摘除了
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地会摘取殖民者的器官，在人毫无选择的情况下把人拆成零件，这真是太可怕了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有個居民的身體器官被摘除了，在他們毫無選擇的情況下分解他們的身體，這真是太恐怖了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=某个罪犯或是访客被处决了，虽然合理，但是还是让人悲伤。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有犯罪的俘虜或是訪客被處死了，這是正義的制裁，但仍然感到遺憾。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=某个囚犯或是访客被安乐死了，虽然还算人性，但是还是让人悲伤。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=有俘虜或是訪客被安樂死了，這雖然非常人道，但仍然感到遺憾。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=某个囚犯或是访客被冷血地杀害了，这个殖民地似乎一天比一天更邪恶了。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=有俘虜或是訪客被冷血的處決了，真是殘忍。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.label.zh-tw=有人因器官被摘除而死亡了
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=某个囚犯或是访客在这里被摘取了器官然后死去，这太可怕了。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=有俘虜或是訪客因器官被摘除而死亡了，真是邪惡。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地会摘取囚犯或访客的器官，在人毫无选择的情况下把人拆成零件，这真是太可怕了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有個囚犯的身體器官被摘除了，在他們毫無選擇的情況下分解他們的身體，這真是太恐怖了！

ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=有一名囚犯无辜死亡。我们应该对囚犯好一点，就算我们要他们死，至少要有一个正式的处决，而不是用这种野蛮的手段。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們的一名俘虜無辜死亡了。我們應該更加善待俘虜，如果我們要他們死，至少也要有一個正式的處刑，而不是使用這種野蠻的手段。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地会把囚犯卖给奴隶贩子，这真令我担忧。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=他們把俘虜賣给奴隸商人了，這真令我擔憂。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=This place isn't quite rich. I can't expect to be totally pampered.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个地方并不富裕。我也不能指望凡事都被惯着。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這地方真是糟透了，我不敢期待在這裡生活會有多舒適。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=This place doesn't have the wealth for many luxuries. I need to keep myself strong.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=这个地方有点穷，我需要学的坚强一些。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=這裡真是個不毛之地，我得要堅強才能活下去。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=This place is poverty-stricken. I can't expect any comfort here; I need to keep myself strong.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=这个地方非常贫穷。我不指望能过得很舒适；我要使自己坚强起来。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=這裡簡直是個貧困災區，我不敢期待在這裡能有一點舒適，我得要堅強才能活下去。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I'm out here with little to no shelter. I'd better steel myself to survive.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=这个地方连个遮风挡雨的棚子都没有，我必须如钢铁般坚强才能活下去。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=這個地方的所有資源只夠勉強維持生存，我最好再更堅強才能生存下來。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=噢...嘿 嘿 嘿...我習慣了這種痛苦！
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=啊呀……有点疼，但是我喜欢，继续！
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=啊...這好痛，但我喜歡！再多來一點！
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=嗷啊……我觉什么地方断了……但是这个感觉真的美好！
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=啊噢...好像有哪裡壞掉了，這是多麼奇妙的感受啊！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=抑郁症特性带来的心情惩罚。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=因為「憂鬱」特性而降低的心情。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=因為「樂觀」特性而得到的心情加成。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=因為「悲觀」特性而降低的心情。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=乐天派特性带来的心情加成。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=因為「樂天派」特性而得到的心情加成。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.label.zh-cn=我的姨妈（姑姑/伯母/舅母）{0}死了
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的姨妈（姑姑/伯母/舅母）死了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My brother died. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的兄弟死了。我的亲兄弟啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的兄弟去世了，我的親兄弟啊...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的堂表兄弟姐妹死了。我的亲人啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的堂(表)兄弟去世了，我的親友啊...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的女兒去世了，我的親骨肉...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My father died. He's gone forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的父亲死了。再也见不到他了……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的父親去世了，從此天人永隔。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的未婚夫死了。这样的男人……我再也见不到了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的未婚夫去世了，再也找不到他這樣的男人了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的未婚妻死了。这样的女人……我再也见不到了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的未婚妻去世了，再也找不到她這樣的女人了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的孫子(女)去世了，我的孫子啊...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的异胞兄弟姐妹死了。我的亲人啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的半胞兄弟姐妹去世了，我的親友啊...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My husband is dead. I am alone.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的丈夫死了，留下了我孤身一人。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的丈夫去世了，丟下我走了...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My lover died. I am so alone.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My mother died. She's gone forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的母亲死了。再也见不到她了……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的母親去世了，從此天人永隔。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的侄子（外甥）死了。多优秀的一个孩子啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的姪女去世了，這麼優秀的孩子。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的侄女（外甥女）死了。多优秀的一个孩子啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的姪子去世了，這麼優秀的孩子。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=The colony harvested body parts from me! They're breaking me down like an old engine!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地摘取了我的器官！他们正像拆掉一具老发动机一样拆掉我！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這些人奪走了我身體的器官！把我當作一部舊引擎一樣拆解！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的姐妹死了。我的亲姐妹啊……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的姊妹去世了。我的親姊妹啊...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的兒子去世了，我的親骨肉...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.label.zh-cn=我的叔父（伯父/姑父/姨父）{0}死了
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的叔父（伯父/姑父/姨父）死了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My wife is dead. I am alone.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我的妻子死了，留下了我孤身一人。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的妻子去世了，丟下我走了...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我身上一件衣服都没有，一丝不挂。真是太丢人了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我身上一件衣服都沒有，全身赤裸，簡直太羞辱了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个地方简直无法忍受。赶快让我出去……
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=这个地方太差了。我不想待在这里。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=這個地方太差勁了。我不想待在這裡。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=This place is unpleasant to be in.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=待在这种地方真是浑身难受。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我無法忍受這個地方。趕快讓我出去！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I really like this place. It's beautiful.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我真的很喜欢这个地方。太漂亮了。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我真的很喜歡這個地方。它太漂亮了。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=这个地方真是很美丽。让我振奋起来精力十足。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=這個地方真是很美麗。它讓我振奮起來精力十足。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I've been kind of uncomfortable recently. We need to get something soft to sit on around here.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=最近我过得不舒服。我们这需要有点软东西坐坐。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這個地方真不夠舒適，起碼應該有個柔軟的東西能讓人坐得舒服點。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=這個地方讓人感到非常舒適。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=最近我过得格外舒服，这个地方真是安逸。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=任何東西都是舒適的，這個地方真是超讚的！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I am resting on clouds of heaven.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我正窩在天堂的雲朵裡休息......
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=食物...食物...什麼都可以...拜託...給我一口就好...
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我感觉饥饿难忍，再不吃东西我就要饿死了。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我有很长一段时间没吃饭了。我头昏眼花，没法集中精神。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我有一段時間沒吃東西了，我的腦袋昏昏沉沉，注意力無法集中。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I can feel my body wasting away. My stomach hurts like never before.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我能感觉到我的身体日渐消瘦。我的肚子从未这么疼过。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=I can feel my body wasting away. My stomach hurts like never before.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我没法想食物以外的其他事情。我都要瘦得皮包骨头了。我快死了吗？
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我饿得没法动了，也没法想食物以外的其他事情。我的肚子从未这么疼过。我觉得我快要晕倒了。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=Food... food... just a bite to eat... anything... please...
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=吃的……食物……一口就行……任何东西……求求你了……
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=Food... food... just a bite to eat... anything... please...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It's been so long since I did anything I truly enjoyed.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我很久没有做过一件我真正喜欢做的事了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=從我最後一次做我真正喜愛的事情後已經過了很久。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I never get to relax and enjoy myself around here.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我在这里基本上就没有放松享受过什么东西。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我一直沒有時間享受一點放鬆以及娛樂。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I could really use a break for something enjoyable.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我真想闲下来做点什么我喜欢做的事情。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我需要找個休息時間做我喜歡的消遣。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=I've been having a great time here recently.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=最近我在这个地方很是开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我剛剛享受了一段美好的時光。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的生活真是丰富多彩，我好喜欢！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我享受了好多的歡樂時光，真是太幸福了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I haven't slept in a while.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我好累阿。我真想躺下休息几分钟……
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我好累阿。我真想躺下休息幾分鐘...
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我累的不行了，快站不住了，我的眼皮一直在打架……我要睡觉……
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我實在是疲憊不堪，我都快站不起来了。我覺得眼皮像是鉛做的一樣。讓我睡一會兒...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个地方简直会引发幽闭恐惧症，我都没地落脚，感觉就像一只被关在小笼子里的老鼠。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我覺得我就像一隻困在小籠子裡的老鼠。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I wish I had more space to move around and breathe.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=这个地方好挤，感觉快喘不过气来了。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我真希望能有一點能夠活動跟呼吸的空間。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=This is a really comfortably open indoor space.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=这真是一间让人感到舒服的大房间。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=這個寬敞的室內空間真讓人感到舒適。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我已经开始习惯这里了，但是依然还有很多令人兴奋的挑战，我希望未来一切顺利……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我漸漸習慣這裡了，但這個局面對我來說還是比較新的。希望一切都能順利...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We just landed here. It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们刚抵达这里，还有很多问题要克服，但是我对能够建立一块新殖民地感到兴奋。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們剛剛降落在這裡，情况不是很好，但是我仍然對建立一個新殖民地感到激動。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I don't like working during the day.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I feel much better at night.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I should be together with my bonded animal.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我应该跟我的牵绊动物在一起。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=動物夥伴應該要和我一起行動。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=一只可爱的动物刚才过来蹭了蹭我。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw a dead body laying on the ground. It was disturbing.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我看见地上躺着一具尸体，真是让人不舒服。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我看見一具躺在地上的屍體。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. It was disgusting.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我看见地上躺着一具正在腐烂的尸体。太恶心了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我看見地上躺著一具腐爛的屍體。真是令人作嘔。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Being with my lover makes me feel this way.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=和我爱的人在一起让我有这种感觉。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=和我的戀人在一起讓我有這樣的感覺。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.label=in a moderate amount of pain
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=噢......這些痛苦要持續到什麼時候？
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=快停下來...快停下來...快讓這個痛苦停下來...！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Serves them right. Things are looking up.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Such a wonderful person. The universe gets darker every day.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=多好的一个人啊，少了他的世界无滋无味。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=多麼好的一個人啊，少了他的世界無滋無味。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My prison barrack is an awful place.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我住的集中營是個糟糕的地方。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm living in a dull barrack.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房真是枯燥无味。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My prison barrack is slightly impressive.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房令人小有印象。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=My prison barrack is impressive. I like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房令人印象深刻，我喜欢这里！
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我住的集中營令人驚奇，我喜歡！
ThoughtDef.stages.6.label.zh-cn=令人印象非常深刻的监狱营房
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=My prison barrack is very impressive. I like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房令人印象非常深刻，我喜欢这里！
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我住的集中營令人印象深刻，我喜歡！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.label.zh-cn=令人印象极度深刻的监狱营房
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=My prison barrack is extremely impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房令人印象极度深刻，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我住的集中營令人無法忘懷，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的房間裡。我愛這裡！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=My prison barrack is unbelievably impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房真是令人难以置信，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我住的集中營令人難以置信，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的房間裡。我愛這裡！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=My prison barrack is wonderful! I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我住的监狱营房是一个人能想象出来的最好的地方，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我的集中營太完美了，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My prison cell is an awful place.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=My prison cell is pretty decent.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My prison cell seems to be a nice place.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的牢房看起来是个好地方。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=My prison cell is impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我的牢房令人印象深刻，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我的牢房令人驚奇，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的房間裡。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=My prison cell is very impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this. I love it!
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我的牢房令人印象非常深刻，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方，我喜欢这里！
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我的牢房令人印象深刻，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的房間裡。我愛這裡！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=My prison cell is extremely impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this. I love it!
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我的牢房令人印象极度深刻，我不敢相信他们把我关在这种地方，我喜欢这里！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我的牢房令人無法忘懷，不敢相信他們把我關在這樣的房間裡。我愛這裡！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=My prison cell is unbelievably impressive. This is the best place ever!
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我的牢房真是令人难以置信，没有地方比这里更好了！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我的牢房令人難以置信，這是我見過最棒的地方。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=My prison cell is the best place one can ever imagine. I can stay here forever.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我的牢房是一个人能想象出来的最好的地方，我不想出去了！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我無法想像還能有更好的地方，要我永遠待在這裡都願意。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=We left a prisoner behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我们刚刚就这样把囚犯抛下了，他们几乎不可能活下来。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我們在幾乎沒有生還可能的情況下拋棄了俘虜，他們幾乎不可能活下來。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I'm a product of modern technology! I can do everything better!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我是现代科技的产物了！我比之前活的更好了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我是現代科技的創造物，再也找不到比這更棒的事了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Flesh is so limiting. I wish I had some kind of artificial body part.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=肉体是如此地脆弱，我想要一个人造的肢体！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=人類的肉體處處受到限制，我多希望能有一支仿生義肢。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=They turned me into a technological abomination... If only they had given me a choice...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=他们把我变成了一个科技怪物……也不问问我的意见……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=他們將我變成一個可憎的科技產物...如我他們當初有給我選擇的話...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=一种使人平静的声音在我脑内回荡，抚慰着我，让我感到十分放松。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有個溫柔的聲音出現在我的腦海裡，安撫我的情緒，消除我的緊張。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=似乎有什么东西在侵扰我的思想，一个声音，在我耳边，我只能听清几个字，这很讨厌。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=一個久久不散的聲音在我腦子裡迴盪。我只能聽懂其中幾個詞，這聲音真讓人討厭。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我感觉总是有看不见的人在跟我说话，声音一直在变但是内容不变，说我应该去伤害他人，让这声音停止吧！
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我感覺有個看不見的東西在不停和我說話。說話的聲音會變但說的内容始终相同，慫恿我去殺掉别人，讓這聲音消失吧！
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=说话的声音太响了，难以承受，精神也无法集中，我试图跟它说话，对着它吼叫，但是都毫无效果！
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=這聲音簡直響到到不能忍受，現在我集中精力都很困難。我發現我有時候甚至還會和這個聲音說話，甚至對它吼叫，但它就是不消失！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的心脏在疯狂跳动，我浑身上下都是汗，我现在只想杀掉我周围的这些敌人，他们是我的噩梦……噩梦……噩梦……
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我的心臟不停跳動而且我在不斷冒汗。我腦子裡唯一的事就是這些恐怖的敵人。它們簡直就是我的惡夢，我的惡夢，我的惡夢………………
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=God I'm tired. And nothing feels good any more.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=神啊我好累，我什么都感觉不到了。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=天哪我好累好累，對什麼都提不起勁了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=It makes me think of flame and fire. I'm so happy.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这让我想起了激情与火焰。我很开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=這讓我聯想到燃燒和火焰，我好開心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I attempted to create a romance, but I got the cold shoulder. Feels bad man.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我想谈次恋爱，却被冷淡对待，真是让我难过。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我嘗試告白了，卻被一口拒絕，這感覺不是很好。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I thought we were meant to marry. But I was just shot down.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我以为我们是真心相爱的，我以为我们能厮守终身。然而这只是我一厢情愿。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我以為他是特別的，以為我們能廝守終身...但是我錯了...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我得和我不想一起睡的人共用一张床。我想有些隐私。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我得和一個我不願同床的人一起睡。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I don't feel very well, I'm sick.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I was disturbed during sleep by people moving around nearby. A private room would solve this.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我睡觉的时候有人在附近走来走去，我希望有一间私密的房间。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我睡覺時有人在房裡走來走去，這影響到我了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My barrack is an awful place, and I have to share it!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我住的营房不但可怕，而且还要和别人睡在一间屋子里！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個糟糕的地方，甚至還得和別人共用。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I'm living in a dull barrack with other people.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=我和别人一起住在一间枯燥无味的营房里。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我和別人一起生活在乏味的營房裡。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=My barrack is mediocre, and I have to share it too. I really don't like this.
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我住的营房平平庸庸，而且还要和别人睡在一间屋子里。我真的不喜欢这样。
ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我的營房很平庸，而我還得和別人共用，我真的不喜歡這樣。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=My barrack is decent, but I really dislike sharing a sleeping space.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=我住的营房还算体面，但我真的不喜欢和别人睡在一间屋子里。
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個有趣的地方，但我真的不喜歡和別人共用房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My barrack is a nice place. But I really don't like sharing a room with others.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我住的营房是个好地方，但我真的不喜欢和别人睡在一间屋子里。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個新奇的地方，但我真的不喜歡和別人共用房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=My barrack is impressive. It sucks that I have to share it, though.
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我住的营房令人印象深刻。尽管如此，和别人睡在一间屋子里还是很糟糕。
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個令人驚奇的地方，但我還是不想和別人共用房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=My barrack is very impressive. I'm annoyed I have to share it, though.
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我住的营房令人印象非常深刻。尽管如此，和别人睡在一间屋子里还是让我恼火。
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個令人印象深刻的地方，但我還是不想和別人共用房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=My barrack is extremely impressive. It almost makes up for having to share it.
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我住的营房令人印象极度深刻。差不多抵消了和别人睡在一间屋子里的不快。
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個令人無法忘懷的地方，我都想跟別人共用房間了。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=My barrack is unbelievably impressive. I don't even mind sharing it.
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我住的营房真是令人难以置信。我甚至可以不介意和别人睡在一间屋子里。
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我的營房是個令人難以置信的地方，我根本不在意和別人共用房間。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=My barrack is the best place one can ever imagine. It makes me happy, even sharing it.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我住的营房是一个人能想象出来的最好的地方。就算和别人睡在一间屋子里也很开心。
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我無法想像還能有更好的地方，即便要和別人共用房間也讓我很開心。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My bedroom is an awful place.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=My bedroom is very interesting. I like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個有趣的地方，我喜歡！
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My bedroom is actually slightly impressive. I like it.
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的卧室是个好地方，我喜欢。
ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個新奇的地方，我喜歡！
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description=My bedroom is impressive. I love it!
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-cn=我的卧室令人印象深刻，我非常喜欢！
ThoughtDef.stages.5.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個令人驚奇的地方，我愛這裡！
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description=My bedroom is very impressive. This is the best place ever!
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-cn=我的卧室令人印象非常深刻，没有地方比这里更好了！
ThoughtDef.stages.6.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個令人印象深刻的地方，世上最棒的地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description=My bedroom is extremely impressive. This is the best place ever!
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-cn=我的卧室令人印象极度深刻，没有地方比这里更好了！
ThoughtDef.stages.7.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個令人無法忘懷的地方，世上最棒的地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description=My bedroom is unbelievably impressive. This is the best place ever!
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-cn=我的卧室真是令人难以置信，没有地方比这里更好了！
ThoughtDef.stages.8.description.zh-tw=我的臥室是個令人難以置信的地方，世上最棒的地方！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description=My bedroom is the best place one can ever imagine. It's wonderful.
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-cn=我的卧室是一个人能想象出来的最好的地方，太厉害了！
ThoughtDef.stages.9.description.zh-tw=我無法想像還能有更好的房間，太完美了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to sleep in the cold. We really need some heaters.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我睡觉的时候太冷了，我们应该有些加热器才对。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我别無選擇只能睡在寒冷的地方，我們真的需要一台電暖器。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have air conditioning?
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我睡觉的时候太热了，我们的空调哪去了？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我别無選擇只能睡在炎熱的地方，就不能裝台冷氣嗎？
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我别无选择只能睡在外面，没有东西可以保护我。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我别無選擇只能睡在外面，沒有東西能夠保護我。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I really wish I could smoke.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=My special bonded animal was sold to a trader!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我相依相伴的动物被卖给了一个商人！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我的動物夥伴被賣給了商人！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=Someone I love was sold to a trader like a piece of meat!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我爱的人像一块肉一样被卖给了一个商人！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=有個傢伙把我的愛人賣給了商人，就好像他是一片肉一樣。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=I feel all fuzzy and unfocused.
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=头昏脑胀，注意力完全无法集中。
ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=我感覺頭昏腦脹，精神無法專注。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I don't like sleeping apart from my partner.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我想和自己的爱人睡在一起。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我不希望和我的伴侶分開睡。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=The colony had me in jail for a while, like a caged animal.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=这个殖民地把我丢进监狱关了起来，像只笼子里的动物一样。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我看见我们有人死了，他们前一刻还活着，然后就死了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我看見我們有人死了，他們剛才還好好的，然後就倒下了。
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw someone die! That was intense!
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=我看見有人死了！哇！這真是太刺激了！
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw a member of my family die. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我眼睁睁地看着我的家人死掉了……
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-tw=I saw a member of my family die. My own flesh and blood...
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description=I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
ThoughtDef.stages.0.description.zh-cn=我看见有人死了，他们前一刻还活着，然后就死了。
TrainableDef.description=The animal will randomly haul items from time to time (though it can't be directed to haul specific items).
TrainableDef.description.zh-cn=动物会偶尔随机搬运物品，但你无法控制它搬运特定物品。
TrainableDef.description=The animal can be assigned a master who it will follow and defend.
TrainableDef.description.zh-cn=动物可以被指派一个主人，它将跟随并保护主人。
TrainableDef.description.zh-tw=動物將可被指派給一名主人，並會跟隨及護衛主人。
TrainableDef.description=The animal can be released to attack distant targets instead of just defending the master.
TrainableDef.description.zh-cn=动物可以主动出击，攻击远处的目标，而不是仅仅保护主人。
TrainableDef.description.zh-tw=動物將可前往攻擊遠處的目標，而不只是護衛主人。
TrainableDef.description=The animal will rescue wounded allies and drag them to safety.
TrainableDef.description.zh-cn=动物会援救受伤的盟友，并将他们拖到安全地带。
TrainableDef.description.zh-tw=動物會救援倒地的友軍，並將他們搬到安全處。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME always says exactly what's on HIS mind, especially if it's bugging HIM. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME总是想到什么就说什么，尤其是那些招惹到HIS事。HIM说话的方式会让其他人不开心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME總是有話直說，特別是有人在偷聽HE說話的時候。這往往與其他人造成摩擦。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and HE tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike HIM.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME的声音听起来很怪里怪气，HE说话时习惯发出一些叽叽咕咕的怪声，这使得其他人不喜欢HIM。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME說話的語調怪裡怪氣，有很重的鼻音，說話大聲又語意不清。這導致沒有人喜歡與HIM相處。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME prefers to live in asceticism. HECAP will be put in a poor mood if HE has a bedroom that's too impressive. HECAP also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw - and raw food won't bother HIM a bit.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢清苦的生活，如果卧室过于令人印象深刻就会不开心。HECAP还不喜欢奢侈的食品，更喜欢吃生食，生食对HIM没有副作用。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME寧願住得簡單點。房間太過高檔會讓HE感到不高興。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to HIM before HE even opens HIS mouth.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME有一张非常精致的脸蛋，HE甚至不需要开口，人们自然而然地会被HIM吸引。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME長得非常可愛，有一張獨特卻又親切的臉蛋，在HIM開口之前，人們已經自然而然地被HE吸引。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like HIM.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-tw=NAME長得很醜，這會在社交上產生障礙。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description=NAME is staggeringly ugly. HISCAP face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at HIM while conversing.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-cn=NAME相当丑陋，HE的脸就像是智障儿童画的画，让人无法直视，唯恐避之不及。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-tw=NAME長得奇醜無比，HIS臉就好像一個沒藝術天分的小孩的塗鴉、泡在甲醛保存罐裡的畸形胚胎、還有一點現代藝術風格。其他人與HE交談時總是不忍直視HIS臉。(譯註：醜上了天)
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. HECAP is twice as likely to start a social fight.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢伤害别人带来的那种快感而且从来不在意看见受伤的人和死人。HECAP挑起打架的可能性是一般人的两倍。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME透過獵殺人們得到快感，即使血流成河也毫不在意。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME likes to fight up close and personal. HISCAP accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but HE'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢近身格斗，HISCAP的近战命中率比一般人要高得多，但用起远程武器来就会很不开心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME喜愛近身搏鬥，HISCAP近身攻擊命中率大大的增加，但當你想讓牠帶上遠距離的武器，HE可是會非常不悅。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, HE tried it... and HE liked it.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=小时候NAME学到了吃人是很糟糕很不对的事情。但是很久以前，HE试了一次……而且HE觉得很不错。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=小時候NAME學到了吃人是很糟糕很不對的事情。但是很久以前，HE試了一次……而且HE覺得很不錯。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME呼吸很粗重，而且发出像是擤鼻涕的声音。让人恶心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME的呼吸聲十分沉重，不斷發出像是擤鼻涕的聲音，真是噁心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME really dislikes and distrusts men.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME十分讨厌男人，认为所有男人都不能信任。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME really dislikes and distrusts women.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME十分讨厌女人，认为所有女人都不能信任。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume much more of them, and will sometimes go on hard drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME非常迷恋化学成瘾品带来的乐趣，毫无节制。HECAP相比其他人要消耗特别多，更可能无视成瘾品方针进行烈性成瘾品狂欢。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME極度迷戀酒精成分帶來的刺激。HECAP會追求更多的刺激，在酒精的助興之下繼續狂歡。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume more of them, and will sometimes go on social drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME很享受化学成瘾品带来的乐趣。HECAP相比其他人要消耗较多，更可能无视成瘾品方针进行社交成瘾品狂欢。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=酒精成分對精神的刺激對NAME來說有種不尋常的吸引力。HECAP會追求更多的刺激，在酒精的助興之下繼續狂歡。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-cn=NAME憎恶任何从化学成瘾品中获得乐趣的念头，拒绝一切社交成瘾品。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-tw=NAME厭惡從化學物質中獲取快感的想法，排斥任何酒精與興奮藥物。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is romantically attracted to people of HIS own gender.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME只会和与HE性别一样的人坠入爱河。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME在愛情方面受到同性別者的吸引。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME needs a really impressive bedroom. HECAP gets a mood loss if HE doesn't get what HE wants.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME需要一间令人印象深刻的卧室，如果不能满足就会不开心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME必須擁有一間高檔的房間。如果得不到HE想要的會讓HE感到不悅。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME has a passion for gardening. HECAP gets a mood bonus for every plant HE sows.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME对园艺有一种特殊的爱好。HECAP每种一株植物都会变得更开心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME對於園藝有極高的熱情。每當HE種植植物時都能獲得心情加成。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME很容易集中精力工作，HECAP工作完成得比一般人要快得多。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME辦事積極，這使HE工作速度比一般人快得多。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME天生工作很勤奋，HECAP工作完成得比一般人都要快。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=NAME是天性勤勞，努力工作使HE總是比他人早先完成工作。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME is a little bit lazy.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description=NAME loves idleness and hates anything productive. HECAP moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢无所事事，讨厌任何实质工作。HECAP工作完成得非常缓慢而且精力也不集中。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-tw=NAME喜歡偷懶且厭惡任何麻煩事，做事拖拖拉拉，注意力又不集中。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=For NAME, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. HECAP gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=对于NAME，HE需要拥有比其他人更令人印象深刻的卧室，如果不能满足就会不开心。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=對NAME來說，住得比別人差是對HE的侮辱。如果有任何居民擁有比HE更好的房間都會讓HE感到不悅。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is a nice person. HECAP has a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insults others.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME是个好人。HECAP倾向于为每个人的生活增添光彩，并且从不羞辱他人。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME是個善良的人，HIS開朗總是像太陽一樣照耀著所有人，從不說傷人的話。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=For NAME, there's something exciting about getting hurt. HECAP doesn't know why, HE's just wired differently.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=对于NAME来说，疼痛会让自己十分兴奋。HECAP不知道为什么，HE就是和别人不一样。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=對於NAME來說，受傷是一件令人興奮的事。也不知道為什麼，HE就是與眾不同。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is just naturally upbeat about HIS situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME天生就能积极看待HIS的情况，无论什么时候，无论什么情况。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=不論任何時候、任何狀況，NAME總是以正面的態度面對眼前的情況。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get HIM down.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME对于生活乐观看待。让HIM失落是很难办到的事情。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=NAME是天生的樂天派，發生任何事情也不會讓HIM感到絕望。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME tends to look on the bad side of life.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description=NAME is perenially unhappy. HECAP has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-cn=NAME一直都不是很开心。即使一切都很好的情况下，拥有一个好心情对他来说仍然是件很难的事情。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-tw=NAME總是悶悶不樂，即使是一切都明朗的情況下也難以維持HECAP的心情。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME's will is an iron shield. HECAP keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME的意志如同钢铁盾牌。在其他人早就崩溃的时候，HECAP依旧能毫不动摇，度过难关。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME有著鋼鐵般的堅定意志，即使其他人早已崩潰，HECAP仍然可以保持堅定。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME的意志比较坚定。在一般人都崩溃的时候，HECAP仍然能保持振作。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=NAME的堅定精神使HE能在足以讓其他人都崩潰的情況下持續振作。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME tends to crack under pressure.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description=NAME is on a hair-trigger all the time. HECAP is the first to break in any tough situation.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-cn=NAME非常容易出现失常，一般出了情况第一个崩溃的就是HECAP。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-tw=NAME非常容易失常，狀況不好時HECAP往往是第一個崩潰的人。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME likes to have things squared away. HECAP will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can get the better of HIM.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢把事情都安排妥当。HECAP会为此比一般人更努力地工作，但是HIS的神经质可能会压倒HIM。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME喜歡打理好一切，這使HE比其他人更專注工作，但這種性格卻也使HECAP比一般人更接近崩潰。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. HECAP will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can easily get the better of HIM.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME永远都在担心那些未完成的工作。HECAP会为此万分努力地工作，但是HIS的神经质可能会压倒HIM。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=NAME無法忍受一點缺陷，為此HECAP比其他人加倍努力工作，卻也因為這種性格使HECAP比其他人更容易崩潰。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

HECAP gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢在夜间工作。HECAP在夜间（23时-6时）心情不错而白天（11时-18时）会有点低落。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME喜歡在夜間活動。HE在夜間會得到心情加成，反之在白天會感到不悅。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. HECAP can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢由裸体带来的自由感。HECAP可以忍受穿衣服的感觉，但是HECAP没有衣服会更开心一些。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME領悟了天體奔放的自由，HECAP能接受穿上衣服，但若沒有衣服，HECAP會感到更快樂。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME feels limited in HIS feeble human body. HECAP often dreams of going bionic.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME深深感受到了人类虚弱的躯体对自身的限制。HECAP经常梦想着能装上一些仿生部件。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME覺得自己軟弱的人類身體是某種限制。HECAP總是夢想裝上仿生肢體。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME believes the human body is limited for a reason. To HIM, bionic body parts are unethical.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME觉得人的能力有限是有原因的，对于HIM来说仿生部件是违反伦理道德的。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME相信，因為某種因素，人類身體存在某種界限，對HIM來說，仿生科技是不道德的。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. HECAP is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME的心灵就像一个心灵音叉，摇摆不定。HECAP对心灵感应非常敏感。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME的內心如同一支心靈音叉，HECAP幾乎無法抗拒干擾電波的影響。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME的心灵相比一般人对心灵感应更加敏感。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=比起一般人，NAME更容易受到干擾電波的影響。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME's mind is psychically out of tune with others. HECAP isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-cn=NAME的心灵频率和一般人有些差异，HECAP对心灵感应不太敏感。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-tw=NAME的心靈頻率和其他人有點不同，干擾電波對HE的影響響對於其他人小得多。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description=NAME's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. HECAP just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-cn=NAME的心灵频率和一般人完全不一样。HECAP完全不受心灵感应影响。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.3.description.zh-tw=NAME的心靈頻率和其他人完全不同，以至於HECAP對干擾電波的影響完全免疫。

TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother HIM at all. HECAP doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects HIM. HECAP also feels no mood boost from socializing.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME从来不同情任何人。别人的痛苦对HIM来说毫无意义。除非会影响到自身，HE从来不在意谁被宰了还是被埋了，又或者是被卖了。HECAP和别人聊天时也不会提升心情。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME從不同情任何人，别人的痛苦和HE沒有任何關係。HECAP不在意别人被屠宰了、被賣给奴隸商人了或是慘遭屠殺了。除非受牽連的人是HIM。HECAP也不會從聊天獲得任何心情加成。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME loves fire. HECAP will occasionaly start fires and will never extinguish them.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME迷恋火焰。HECAP偶尔会放火且从不扑灭火焰。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME喜愛火焰，HECAP偶爾以縱火為樂，而且從沒有滅火的打算。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME takes more time to aim when shooting. HECAP shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME在射击时会花更多的时间来瞄准。HECAP射得比别人慢，但打得更准。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME是個相當優秀的射手，但HE需要多一些時間來瞄準HIS目標。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=Pew! Pew! Pew! NAME just likes pulling the trigger. HECAP shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=砰！砰！砰！NAME只是喜欢扣动扳机。HECAP射得比别人快，但打得不准。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=乓！乓！乓！NAME是個糟糕的射手，但HE毫不在意，因為槍實在太好玩了！
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is always falling behind the group whenever HE goes anywhere.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME无论去哪里总是因为走得太慢而掉队。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME不論去到哪裡，HE總是落在隊伍的最後。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description=NAME likes to be where HE's going. HECAP walks quicker than most people.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-cn=NAME喜欢快速到达HE想去的地方。HECAP比一般人走得要快些。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.1.description.zh-tw=NAME快點到達HE想去的地方，HECAP走得比多數人都快。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description=NAME always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-cn=NAME走动时总是带着一种急迫感。HECAP实在走得太快了以至于一般人都追不上。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.2.description.zh-tw=NAME總是走得很急，經常讓一般人都追不上HE。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is too smart for HIS own good. HECAP learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME实在是机灵过人，HE学起东西来比谁都快，但是性情比较古怪。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME非常的聰明。HE學習事物的速度總是比他人快上許多，但個性也古怪許多。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description=NAME is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize HIM.
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-cn=NAME软弱且胆小。一点小伤小疼就能让他晕过去。
TraitDef.degreeDatas.0.description.zh-tw=NAME is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize HIM.
WeatherDef.description=A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=天气晴朗，没有任何惩罚或者加成。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=晴朗的天氣，沒有任何屬性加成。
WeatherDef.description=Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=旱天雷很危险，因为闪电会引发火灾，同时又没有扑灭火焰的雨水。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=雷暴非常危險，它會導致火災且雷暴天氣不會下雨，因此火焰不會被自然撲滅。
WeatherDef.description=Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=雾会降低远程武器的命中率。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=濃霧降低遠程武器的命中率。
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=大雾和大雨会降低远程武器的命中率和移动速度。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=降低遠程武器的命中率並使移動速度變慢。
WeatherDef.description=Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=雨会降低远程武器的命中率，扑灭火焰，同时还会降低移动速度。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=雨天降低遠程武器的命中率，澆熄火焰並使移動速度變慢。
WeatherDef.description=The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=闪电会引发火灾，但是雨水会把火扑灭。同时大雨会降低移动速度和远程武器的命中率。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=閃電會導致火災，但是雨會把火撲滅。雨會降低移動速度和遠程武器的命中率。
WeatherDef.description=Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=小雪会降低远程武器的命中率，扑灭火焰，同时还会降低移动速度。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=雪輝降低遠程武器的命中率，撲滅火焰並使移動速度變慢。
WeatherDef.description=Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
WeatherDef.description.zh-cn=大雪会降低远程武器的命中率，扑灭火焰，同时还会降低移动速度。
WeatherDef.description.zh-tw=雪輝降低遠程武器的命中率，撲滅火焰並使移動速度變慢。
WorkGiverDef.label.zh-cn=完成机械加工台的清单
WorkGiverDef.label.zh-cn=在药物试验台制作药物
WorkGiverDef.label.zh-cn=完成手工加工点的清单
WorkGiverDef.label.zh-cn=打开低温休眠舱或棺材
WorkGiverDef.label=go to bed for emergency treatment
WorkGiverDef.label.zh-tw=到床上接受立即的治療
WorkGiverDef.label=take beer out of fermenting barrels
WorkGiverDef.label=take patients to bed for operations
WorkTypeDef.description=Create beautiful works of art from raw materials.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=艺术家负责用原材料创作出优秀的艺术品。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=藝術家會創作優秀的藝術作品。
WorkTypeDef.description=Clear snow and clean the floor in the home area.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=清洁工负责清理居住区的污渍、清除除雪区的积雪。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=清潔員會將垃圾清理乾淨，讓殖民地成為一個更舒適的地方。
WorkTypeDef.description=Build things that you've designated, and fix damaged or broken-down buildings.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=建造者会建造你指定的建筑，并修理损坏的建筑、家具、工作台等。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=建造者會建造你指定的建築。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=厨师负责烹饪食物、屠宰尸体、填充储料器。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=廚師會填充儲料槽、屠宰動物並製作料理。
WorkTypeDef.description=Do general low-skilled labor at work stations. This includes stonecutting, smelting, and more.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=工匠负责把原材料制成成品。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=工匠可以把原材料製成成品。
WorkTypeDef.description=Treat the sick, bring them food, cheer them up, and perform assigned surgeries. Doctors will care for both colonists and prisoners.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=医生负责治疗病人和伤员、给无法行动的人喂食、进行手术。医生会同时照顾殖民者和囚犯。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=醫生會將食物送给無法動彈的人。包括居民和俘虜。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=消防員會撲滅殖民地内的火焰。
WorkTypeDef.description=Flick switches. For example, when you designate toggling power on a turret, a flicker must manually flick it to toggle the power.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=电工负责开关电源。当切换用电设备或电路开关的供电状态时，电工将会前往拨动开关。
WorkTypeDef.description=Plant seeds and harvest grown crops.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=种植者负责管理种植区、花盆和水栽培植物盆，种植或收获作物。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=農夫會播種並收穫成熟的植物。
WorkTypeDef.description=Tame, train, harvest resources from and slaughter animals.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=驯兽师负责驯服野生动物、训练已驯服的动物、收获畜产品、宰杀已驯服的动物。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=馴獸員馴服、飼養以及宰殺動物，此外他們也負責擠奶、剃毛及撿拾雞蛋。
WorkTypeDef.description=Carry things to where they need to be.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=搬运工负责把物品运送到目的地。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=搬運員會將東西送到它們該去的地方。
WorkTypeDef.description=Kill animals which are designated to be hunted.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=猎人负责狩猎你指定的野生动物。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=礦工會開挖你指定的方塊。如果你指定的方塊是礦石方塊便能收穫到有用的金屬礦石。
WorkTypeDef.description=Rest in bed to recuperate from not-immediately-life-threatening medical problems.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=非致命的疾病可以通过卧床休养得到恢复。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=在不需要迫切的醫療照顧的狀況下在床上療養。
WorkTypeDef.description=Go to a medical bed for treatment if you have an immediately life-threatening health condition.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=当有威胁生命的健康问题时，躺到医疗床上接收治疗。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=需要立即醫療照護的居民將會移動到病床或醫療床上接受治療。
WorkTypeDef.description=Cut or harvest plants as designated.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=收割者负责割除并收获你标记的植物，砍伐你标记的树木。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=採收者會裁剪或收穫你指定的植物。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=研究员负责研究工作。因为研究是一项长期工作，专门的研究员需要降低其他工作的优先度。
WorkTypeDef.description=Create weapons and tools from raw materials, either as a blacksmith or by machining.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=铁匠负责将原材料锻造成武器和工具。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=鍛造師會將原料打造成武器或工具。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=裁缝负责将原材料缝制成衣物。
WorkTypeDef.description=Manage, feed, chat with, and recruit prisoners.
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-cn=狱卒负责给囚犯送餐、和囚犯聊天、招募、殴打或是处决囚犯。需要在「囚犯」菜单内选择对应的选项。
WorkTypeDef.description.zh-tw=獄卒可以和招募俘虜，和俘虜聊天，毆打俘虜或是處決俘虜——只要你選擇對應的選項。獄卒也會替俘虜送食物。
WorldObjectDef.description=An abandoned base of one of the factions.
WorldObjectDef.description=A base of one of the factions.
WorldObjectDef.description=The location of a hidden ship which can help you escape the planet.
WorldObjectDef.description.zh-cn=一处隐藏着能让你离开这个星球的飞船的地点。
WorldObjectDef.description.zh-tw=一艘能夠帶你逃離這座星球的星艦藏匿地點。
WorldObjectDef.description.zh-tw=前往最終目的地前的中途點。
